I perceive gods and ghosts,
No detail hidden.
Attuned to the numinous, attaining sagehood,
Ears keen, eyes bright.
Today I summon and invite,
Beseeching descending blessings.
Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with statutes and ordinances!*

For the method of drawing the six Ding directional qi: if it is Ding-mao, inhale nine breaths into the kidneys. At night, visualize them residing in the kidneys; by day, visualize them emerging to follow your movements. On the sixth night of each month, as before, recite the *Kuigang*, *Qianyuan*, and *Tianzhen* incantations three times, then recite the Five Peaks incantation over cinnabar, and blow onto paper inscribed with the six Ding taboo names. Cut it into three segments: swallow the first two characters in the first ten-day period, the middle two in the second, and the last two in the third. On the sixth day, place them by the bedside along with the consecrated water. At the fifth watch, rise, dress, sit facing the Ding direction of the ten-day period, take the first two characters, and swallow them with water. Recite the taboo name repeatedly until someone passes outside the door. Upon hearing their footsteps, cough, then face the direction of the sound, inhale their qi, and swallow it. Visualize the two Ding entering the heart. Proceed similarly on the twelfth and eighteenth days until all three periods are complete.

For submitting petitions, making requests, dispelling evil, or healing afflictions: light incense, place the written petition before you, face the Ding direction, recite the taboo name, inhale qi, and draw in the petition. Recite the taboo name again, inhale qi, and blow it onto the petitioner. Recite the taboo name once more, inhale qi, and swallow it. Visualize the six Ding spirits in the heart. Inhale a breath of the petitioner’s qi, store it in the heart, calm the spirit, and quiet the mind. After a long while, when a thought arises in the heart, discern whether the afflicting demon exists, its number, and the illness’s condition—all will be precisely revealed. Do not entertain stray or impure thoughts, nor a second notion, or the insight will fail. If doubt or hesitation arises, the revelation will be neither accurate nor true. Beware, beware!

**Qi Talismans Governed by the Four Upright Yang Spirits**
**Qi Talismans Governed by the Four Upright Yin Spirits**
For these two talismans, employ the Eight Trigrams mudra: Jia corresponds to yang trigrams, Ding to yin trigrams. Draw qi from the northern direction and blow to form them.

Recite the incantation:
*Pivot and turning mechanism, authority of yang,
Yao’s balance, Wen’s pattern.
Four Upright Messengers,
Duty officers of the day.
Year spirits, month generals,
Hourly attendants of the day.
Report matters when they arise,
Present urgent affairs swiftly.
Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with statutes and ordinances!*

Face the Tai Sui direction and swallow the talisman. Visualize the Four Upright Messengers: on yang days, red and yellow; on yin days, blue-green and purple. They wear crossed-scarf headgear, embroidered headbands, and stand in the four directions.

Recite the incantation:

The Cui, Lu, Deng, and Dou clans—hasten, hasten, deliver my words!
The Four Upright Messengers of Li and Wei—hasten, hasten, deliver my words!

Recite this incantation one hundred times while drawing qi, then knock the teeth four times. Visualize the four spirits in attendance.

Recite the incantation:
*I command the Four Upright Messengers,
Duty officers of the day.
Await my summons to ascend—
For me, swiftly go to the Heavenly Courts.
Await my summons to descend—
For me, swiftly go to the Earthly Prison.
Await my summons to enter water—
For me, swiftly go to the Watery Palaces.
Go swiftly, go swiftly, do not linger long.
Ever attend my side, guard my body’s form.
Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with statutes and ordinances!*

On the day of Tai Sui, inscribe these eight characters and wear them on the right elbow. Each morning after burning incense, swallow the talisman and continue wearing it behind the elbow. Remove it at night. In the morning, wear it again, drawing the talisman’s qi and blowing it onto the body. At night, draw the body’s qi and blow it onto the talisman.

**Five Bureau Secret Taboo Talismans**
Mengzhang: Prolongs life and secures essence.
Jianbing: Bestows rank and secures spirit.
Lingguang: Preserves life and secures the soul.
Zhiqu: Guards the body and preserves truth.
Qionglong: Refines form and stabilizes the heart.

**Three Generals Secret Taboo Talismans**
Tang Hong: Harmonizes the Three Fields of the Upper Elixir.
Ge Yong: Divides the Eight Sceneries of the Middle Elixir.
Zhou Wu: Activates the Nine Yang Spirits of the Lower Elixir.
Press these upon the upper, middle, and lower joints of the middle finger.

**Three Paths Jade Taboo Talismans**
*Xingsheng Taixia Fusang*—Qian, the Human Path.
*Duli Xiazhen Fengdu*—Kun, the Earthly Path.
*Kehan*—Han the Elder, who guides people to immortality. (Press upon the middle line of the middle finger, the Heavenly Path.)
Draw the qi of the Three Heavens, inhale through the nose into the mouth, hold the breath to inscribe, then blow or exhale three times each.

Recite the incantation:
*Xingsheng turns, Duli shifts,
Kehan shines, Gongdu completes.
Corners aligned, souls gathered and captured.*

Each day, face the Heavenly Gate, recite the incantation, and swallow the talisman. Press the Three Paths Five Sufferings Seal, drawing three mouthfuls of qi from the northwest into the crown, three from the southwest into the spleen, and three from the northeast into the Cinnabar Field.

**Five Emperors Jade Taboo Talismans**
Hongxing: Supreme Flowerwood Lord of the Nine Qi of the Eastern Wood Bureau.
Mohei: Balancing Fire Lord of the Three Qi of the Southern Fire Palace.
Mozhen: Golden Flower Metal Lord of the Seven Qi of the Western Metal Bureau.
Wala: Mount Heng Water Lord of the Five Qi of the Northern Water Bureau.
Lingbao: Mount Song Earth Lord of the One Qi of the Central Earth Bureau.

Recite the incantation:
*Eastern Green Emperor, Azure Essence of Mount Tai.
Southern Red Emperor, Cinnabar Spirit of Mount Huo.
Central Yellow Emperor, Lofty Song of Mount Song.
Western White Emperor, White Stone of Mount Hua.
Northern Black Emperor, Mystic Nourishment of Mount Heng.
Five Directions, Five Emperors—
Each descends with true qi.
Consume the Five Stones to replenish true qi.
Hundred channels flow freely, longevity and eternal vision.*

On days corresponding to Metal, Wood, Water, Fire, or Earth, recite the two lines of the incantation for that direction. Face the direction, visualize the five-colored qi, and see the Emperor and his attendants stationed there. Draw qi from the five directions and consume it—these are the nine-colored essences of the five directions. Perform this after the hour of *chou*. Then proceed to the Five Directions Cave Vision.

**Thunder God Secret Taboo**
With the *chen* mudra, recite: *Thunder One, Thunder Two, Thunder Three, Thunder Four, Thunder Five*—the formation rests upon *zi* as the key. After inscribing, blow with *xun* qi.

Recite the incantation for swallowing the talisman:
*Mysterious Jade Inner Consort, union of yin and yang.
Three Masters’ discipline, Four Saints’ sharpness.
Six Jia yang spirits, Six Ding yin officers.
Four Upright Lords, Five Bureau Commanders.
Three Paths, Five Peaks—
Stabilize the earth’s chariot.
Xun and Zhen thunder quake, yin and yang constrained.
Dui and Qian radiate light, Kan and Li exchange positions.
Below, open the Ghost Gate, purge filth and defilement.
Ascend to the Immortal Realm, stride without fear.
Primal, prosperous, beneficial, true—
Reversed or aligned, the divine qi.*

**Method for Receiving the Jade Tablet Formula**
To receive this method, prepare on New Year’s Day. Bathe and purify in advance, select a clean chamber, and set up a table facing north. Inscribe all secret taboos, bow twice, then store them in a clean vessel, arranging them in three to five places. Memorize them without error.

On the *jiazi* day, take the Three Heavens’ secret taboos, Heaven and Earth Jade Characters, Three Perfected Inner Taboos, and Supreme Emperor’s Inner Taboos, and consume them.
On the *jiayin* day, take the Seven Luminaries, Northern and Southern Dippers, Three Terraces, and Central Dipper Inner Taboos, and consume them.
On the *jiachen* day, take the Three Sovereigns’ Inner Taboos, Three Generals’ Two Beginnings, and Three Masters’ Secret Taboos, and consume them.
On the *jiawu* day, take the Six Jia and Six Ding, Four Upright Duty Officers’ Inner Taboos, and consume them.
On the *jiashen* day, take the Divine Tiger and Divine Officers, Mysterious Woman Inner Consort, and Heavenly Person Inner Taboos, and consume them.
On the *jiaxu* day, take the Thunder God’s Inner Taboos and consume them.

**Method for Consuming Talismans**
Set up an incense burner, sword, basin, and bell. Upon retiring, rise at the *chou* or *yin* hour, light candles, rinse the mouth, and wash. Draw a basin of well water and place it before the sacred space. Retrieve the talismans, arrange them on the table, and memorize their order. Step back, exit the chamber, form the Jade Purity mudra with both hands, and pace the Dipper to the table. In spring and summer, step from *Kui* to *Ao*; in autumn and winter, step from *Dou* to *Piao*. Offer incense, bow three times toward the Heavenly Gate, and silently present a memorial, burning it in the incense burner. Bow again, form the Jade Purity mudra with both hands, face north, and consecrate the water. Proceed as before.

**Silent Memorial**
*Great Ming, [Year], [Month], [Day],
Your subject [Name], kowtows and bows twice to memorialize.
I humbly reflect: born in the lower realm, I traverse the dusty world. By past karmic fortune, I bear the registers of this method. I have presumptuously received the profound grace of the Great Dao, overstepping to serve in the Three Caverns’ pure office. My original vow is to assist Heaven’s transformations and aid the nation to save the people. I swear to pray for blessings, repent for transgressions, dispel calamities, deliver the living and the dead, and eradicate evil to establish righteousness. This sincere resolve shall never waver.*

**Memorial of Gratitude and Supplication**

I, your subject, prostrate myself in profound gratitude, yet deeply reflect: though I sincerely uphold Heaven’s decrees, my intentions often stray from the true principle, failing to penetrate the subtle and profound or manifest divine responsiveness. This arises from my impure mortal form—a being of flesh and blood—how could I fully perceive the celestial realms, let alone clearly behold spirits and gods? Rarely do I turn demons toward rectitude, seldom do my deeds benefit others. My eyes are as though blind, my ears as though deaf.

Formerly, I received from my masters the transmission of the Primal Jade Tablet of the Hunyuan, the Inner Writ of the Three Sovereigns, the esoteric names of the sagely perfected, and the divine scriptures of penetrating insight, which I was commanded to uphold. Today, I have chosen an auspicious day to henceforth maintain perpetual abstinence, ingesting these texts in accordance with the method. Within, I purify the filth of the heart; without, I refine the essence of the eyes. Thus may I clearly perceive the Three Realms and pierce the vision of spirits and gods.

I humbly beseech the Ancestral Master, the Root Master, the Perfected Master, the Most August Supreme Emperor, and the True Sages of the Three Treasures beneath Your Jade Majesty: deign not to regard my presumption, but bestow upon me Heaven’s grace. May You specially descend the vital *qi* of true purity, the luminous wisdom of the Great Dao, the blessings of the Three Treasures, and the wondrous transformative radiance of the six divine penetrations into my body. Within, dispel the dust and obstructions of the heart’s realm; without, remove the defilement clouding my eyes. Refine and dissolve the yin obscurations of the hundred spirits, illumine the viscera and bowels, absolve karmic hindrances and calamities, and sever the knotted roots of the womb’s origin. Subdue demonic trials, and may the myriad perfected ones lend their accord.

After ingesting the esoteric names, seated, I shall observe the Three Realms; standing, I shall illuminate the ten directions. I shall clearly behold the immortals and perfected, distinctly perceive spirits and gods, foreknow incipient signs, and lucidly discern celestial patterns. Forever shall I escape the eight difficulties and three disasters, resolve the thousand misfortunes and nine calamities, and wherever I turn, encounter auspiciousness. My vows shall be proclaimed and transmitted, the Great Dao shall flourish, and all beings shall turn toward faith.

I vow that life after life, I shall deliver the living and liberate the dead, subdue demons and evil. Through ten thousand kalpas and a thousand aeons, I shall remain a disciple of the Three Treasures. Should I receive the response of the mysterious radiance, I shall never dare to reveal even a word or half a phrase of Heaven’s secrets.

With reverence, I prostrate myself and present this memorial of my heart, ascending through the Three Heavenly Gates. May it follow the incense smoke to be conveyed and memorialized before the Most August Supreme Emperor of the Great Dao and the Three Treasures.

I, your subject, can scarcely contain my fervent prayers and yearning for grace. Overwhelmed with awe, I kowtow twice in supplication.

**Incense Prayer**

On this [Year], [Month], [Day], I, [Name], holding the dharma rank, make my plea to Heaven. With utmost reverence, I invoke and beseech:

The Three Clarities and Supreme Sages,
The Jade Emperor of Heaven,
The Great Emperor of the Purple Tenuity,
The Sun, Moon, and Five Planets,
The Southern Asterism and Northern Dipper,
The Three Terraces and celestial stars,
The Perfected Ones of the Three Heavens,
The Four Sagely Marshals,
The Five Emperors of the Five Peaks,
The Seven Celestial Consorts,
The Venerable Elder of Southern Prosperity,
The Divine Lords of the Six Dings,
The Divine Lords of the Six Jias,
The Thunder Gods and Rain Deities,
The Divine Tiger and Great Sage Envoys,
The Four Upright Merit Officers,
The Four Upright Divine Generals,
The Divine Generals of Penetrating Vision,
The Youths of Clarity and Insight.

Today, I strictly adhere to the *Lingbao* Great Method and the Primal Jade Tablet of the Hunyuan, the Hidden Writ of the Highest Clarity.

On each day of the Six Jia, swallow the inner secret names of the Highest Perfected Ones, the hidden jade characters. Through fasting and ingestion, one petitions the divine Perfected Ones of penetrating vision and all-seeing insight, commanding immortals and spirits, summoning souls and seizing spirits. Humbly beseeching the sagely compassion not to fault this transgression of recitation, permit the consumption of the secret names and jade talismans.

Today, encountering the day of Jiazi, I reverently ingest the inner secret names of the Highest Perfected Ones, bestowed with the Dao-black dharma eye, seeing through the hundred spirits and commanding the thousand Perfected Ones. To the left, I summon the Six Jia; to the right, I invoke the Six Ding. Seated, I conjure traveling kitchens and foreknow the yet-to-be. My body generates water and fire, transforming without limit.

I cannot fully express my prayers to Heaven, my longing for the sagely presence.

The ritual concludes with repeated bows.

**Six Ding Formula**
The inner Six Ding formula states: On a Six Ding day at noon, write in cinnabar script the true secret names of the Six Ding on yellow silk. From the original six-character secret name, form talismans with every two characters. Face the direction of the current旬 as the head, following in sequence. Inhale qi and distribute it to form three talismans. On the seventh day of this night, at the hour of Chou (1–3 a.m.), don robes, face the Ding direction, take one talisman, hold it roundly, recite its name, and swallow it with water. When someone first makes a sound at the appointed time, swiftly and urgently face the direction, inhale qi six times, and swallow it, repeating seven times in the middle. After seven days, the merit is equal, and three旬 suffice.

For any matter, face the direction, recite the name, inhale qi and swallow it, close the eyes briefly, and the spirit will reveal the intent in the heart. All petitions will pertain to future events, each one manifesting as predicted.

**Six Jia Formula**
The outer Six Jia formula states: On a Six Jia day at dawn, write the names of the Six Jia in cinnabar on white silk. Face the direction and swallow with westward-flowing water, or water from a well unseen by the Three Luminaries. Once done, clench both fists, sit upright, and strike the heavenly drum thirty-six times. Knock the teeth twenty-four times, interlock the hands, crane-peck six times, and rotate the two passes nine times. Part the hands to the top of the head, visualize the cinnabar field, where a radiant sun blazes, the entire body luminous as fire, internally and externally suffused with red.

Recite the name thirty-six times, inhale qi and blow it onto the body, constantly visualizing the six spirits attending. On the day the Six Jia cycle completes, future events will be revealed in dreams. The Six Jia will always attend the body, and with time, they may be seen and commanded at will.

For minor demonic disturbances, write in cinnabar, burn with gold coins, and the six generals will immediately dispatch the evil into the sea, with strange reports appearing in dreams.

**Six Ding Formula (for Exorcism)**
When encountering malevolent ghosts causing confusion, recite the formula once in the heart, close the eyes for a long moment, and the Six Ding will report to the heart’s spirit. The words arising in the mind will reveal the cause of the ghost’s calamity. Even details such as clothing colors and the number of people will match the verification.

**Merit Officers Formula**
For poisoning by toxic substances, abscesses, cinnabar tumors, or illnesses of the five viscera and six bowels, write the formula on the afflicted area, either ingesting or applying it externally. Recovery will occur within three repetitions.

**Three Heavens Secret Names Formula**
The comprehensive matching formula states: On the day before the year’s end, bathe and don clean clothes in advance. At dawn the following day, sit upright in a secluded chamber, face the heavenly gate, and recite the Three Heavens’ hidden secret names *Hong Dian* until twelve hours have passed, completing three hundred thousand repetitions. Remain silent for the entire following day. Thereafter, whenever reciting memorials or petitions, recite the method once, blow the eastern qi onto the text, and it will be conveyed. Responses will arrive promptly.

This method, when recited ten thousand times on the last day of the month, will instantly reach the Three Heavens, with responses descending directly to the mortal world.

**Three Heavens True Secret Names Formula**
The formula for rescue from peril states: On the eight seasonal nodes, fast and purify. At the transition between Xu and Hai (9–11 p.m.), enter stillness and sit, reciting the true secret names of the first heaven, *Fang Zhong Yuan Qiu De*, accumulating one hundred thousand repetitions. When encountering tigers, wolves, or poisonous creatures, hold the breath for seven cycles, recite thirty-two times, and all toxins will silently dissipate, unable to cause harm.

This method, when recited ten thousand times on the first day of the month, will manifest responses within three days, dispersing all calamities. Silently reciting thirty-two times will resolve disasters.

**Five Peaks Formula**
The Five Peaks body-preservation formula states: On the ninth day after the beginning of spring, the third day after the beginning of summer, the seventh day after the beginning of autumn, the fifth day after the beginning of winter, and the day after the earth’s vigor in each season, face the respective direction at the hours of Zi, Wu, Mao, You, Yin, Shen, Si, or Hai. Knock the teeth according to the number of the direction, visualize the Lord of the Eastern Peak leading the officials and clerks of the Four Peaks before you, grasp the Five Peaks formula, recite the secret names, inhale the qi of the five directions and swallow it. After a year’s practice is complete, when seeking matters, facing fear or urgent peril, meeting nobles, or traversing mountains and waters, first knock the teeth five times, recite the names, inhale the qi of the five directions and swallow it, then blow it onto the body and distribute it to the directions. Thus, peril will be averted, and all endeavors will be supremely auspicious and as wished.

**Five Peaks Three Paths Formula**
Left hand: Zhen (thunder), red apricot, Eastern Peak.
Middle finger: Li (fire), ink-black, Southern Peak.
Fourth finger: Dui (lake), grinding ink, Western Peak.
Middle finger root: Kan (water), wax, Northern Peak.
Middle finger center: central script, Lingbao, Central Peak.
Middle finger middle: Ke Han, Heavenly Path.
Kun script: Du Li, Earthly Path.
Xun script: Xing Sheng, Human Path.

The Five Peaks Three Paths seal: With the left and right hands, the three little fingers and fourth fingers face upward and interlock. Then, with the index fingers, hook the little fingers on the opposite sides. With the middle fingers of both hands, hook the fourth fingers of the opposite hands. Press the left and right middle fingers with the thumbs, each pressing the middle joint of the middle finger.

**Five Peaks Pacification Talisman**
The Five Peaks’ secret names pacify the five directions. The Human Path lies in the southeast, the Heavenly Path in the northwest, and the Earthly Path in the southwest. The general merit lies in the northeast. Write the complete talisman to subdue all inauspicious spirits, demons, and monsters, as well as temple altars, haunted grounds, water sprites, jiao dragons, and li serpents. Inscribe it on a large stone and sink it, or bury it. Within a hundred days, heavenly thunder will shatter it.

Inscribe the talisman in vermilion, perform the Five Peaks Three Paths mudra, and draw the qi of the Five Peaks Three Paths to blow upon it.

**Northern Dipper Talisman Mudra**
The *Dongming Wanhui Jue* states: On the fifth day of the fifth month, inscribe the Northern Dipper’s secret names in vermilion without counting their number. Seal them with red wax, place them in a green bamboo tube, and wrap them tightly with layers of paper. Conceal them in a chicken’s nest where a brooding hen sits, and retrieve them once the chicks hatch. Consuming one talisman enables recitation of ten thousand words, granting penetrating wisdom and divine communion—daily recitation of ten thousand words will never be forgotten.

For the method on the right: Inscribe on yellow silk, mix with yellow wax to form the Seven Primes, and consume one daily with pure water. After forty-nine days, wisdom will naturally illuminate, and recitation of ten thousand words will flow effortlessly.

**Southern Dipper Talisman**
For the method on the right: Inscribe in vermilion on yellow paper and ingest or wear it to cure all illnesses.

*The Great Method of the Numinous Treasure Unlimited Salvation Upper Scripture, Scroll Twelve* ends here.
*The Great Method of the Numinous Treasure Unlimited Salvation Upper Scripture, Scroll Thirteen*

**Tools for Cultivating Penetrating Vision**
Yang-day Jade Characters
Yin-day Jade Characters

The Supreme One of Heavenly Perfection, the Supreme Simplicity of Heavenly Perfection, the Supreme Each of Heavenly Perfection. The Three Ones are named the Supreme Beginning of Heavenly Perfection, the Perfected Immortals and Perfected Persons. All the above are to be inscribed in vermilion on thin yellow paper and used according to yin and yang days. After twenty-one days, write upon a fragrant tablet and lick it with the tongue. After forty-nine days, inscribe within a porcelain vessel and wash with water to drink. After forty-nine days, add the names of the thirty-two Heavenly Emperors. After seventy-two days, incorporate them into the middle section of the Numinous Writ.

For all practices of penetrating vision, choose an auspicious day when the first yang arises before the winter solstice. First, prepare a memorial to the Celestial Court, the Sun and Moon, the Southern and Northern Dippers, the Five Palaces, and the Ancestral Masters. Submit a petition to the registers of the divine immortals within the method for their illumination and response. On the appointed day, follow the usual rites to pay homage to the Perfected, offer incense, and silently memorialize the practice of penetrating vision.

Upon completion, pace the Dipper’s seven stars. In spring and summer, begin with the right foot; in autumn and winter, begin with the left. Enter the Dipper’s mouth, bow three times, offer incense, and strike the ritual drum twenty-four times. Blow upon the incense burner, and silently present a memorial.

For the *Penetrating Vision Inscribed Jade Tablet*:
The practitioner burns incense and bows nine times, clicks the teeth thirty-two times, and summons the Three Qi. Visualize the body enveloped in clouds of three colors, both within and without resplendent. To the left, the Azure Dragon; to the right, the White Tiger; before, the Vermilion Bird; behind, the Dark Warrior. Lions and white cranes array to the left and right. The sun and moon illuminate brightly, the chamber radiant within. A circular image arises above the head, its light suffusing the ten directions.

The secret incantation states:
*"Supreme Mysterious Origin, Most High Dao Lord, summon forth from within my body the Three and Five Merit Officers, the left and right official messengers, the incense-attending Golden Lads, the message-transmitting Jade Maidens, the Five Thearchs’ direct talismans, and the incense officials of the day—thirty-two of each—forth. Let them emerge in solemn attire, adorned with caps and pendent tassels, their dignity arrayed. Station them to my left and right, before and behind, to convey my sincerity. Today, at this hour, I devote myself within the altar to the practice of penetrating vision, inscribing the jade tablet with celestial script. All secret intentions have been set forth in the silent memorial. I humbly beseech the Three and Five Merit Officers, the left and right official messengers, and all others to transmit my words directly to the august presence of the Three Treasures, the Most Honored before the Celestial Thearchs."*

Three times offer incense, three times bow, then rise and kneel to memorialize. State the practitioner’s name and dharma rank, prostrate in reverence, and with utmost awe, address the Jade Augustness of the Three Treasures Thearchs:

*"I, your humble servant, dwell in the lower realm yet have encountered this enlightened age, long bound to the true net by karmic affinity, personally receiving the transformation of the Dao. Through a thousand kalpas of fortunate convergence, I have been initiated into the registers of the method, presumptuously overseeing the Three Caverns and attaining the ranks of the Perfected. Now, by great fortune, I have encountered the practice of the Numinous Treasure Great Method. In such-and-such a year, so-and-so transmitted to me the *Hunyuan Jade Tablet*, the divine script of the Numinous Treasure’s penetrating vision, and the inner names of the numinous Perfected. Today, at this hour, I devote myself within the altar to the practice of penetrating vision, the method of descending Perfection and summoning the numinous, inscribing the inner names and true script. I humbly beseech the Ancestral Masters, the Three Treasures, and the Heavenly Thearchs not to deem me presumptuous..."*

May the celestial hearing not deem this a transgression. I humbly beseech the descent of the primordial true qi of life, the radiant light of the Great Dao’s wisdom, the grace of the Three Treasures, and the vast wisdom of the six penetrations, to flow into my body, purging the filth of my heart within and refining the clarity of my eyes without, that I may perceive the Three Realms with penetrating vision and behold the spirits and gods with unobstructed sight. Furthermore, I implore the issuance of a sacred decree to the divine bureaus and their subordinate offices—those of the penetrating vision script, the celestial courts, and all attendant hosts—to dispatch them into this altar, that I may forever serve as a disciple of the Three Treasures, universally delivering the hidden and the manifest, and fostering the transformations of life and creation.

From the moment I practice penetrating vision, I dare not violate the luminous statutes, nor lightly disclose or profane them. Should I transgress, I willingly submit to the celestial judgment. With these earnest entreaties, I respectfully present this oral memorial to the Great Dao, the Three Treasures, and the Jade Thearchs of the Imperial Heavenly Court. I prostrate myself before the celestial grace, awaiting the granting of my petition. Bowing deeply before the altar, I await the response with reverent trepidation.

Upon receiving the decree, I perform nine prostrations, rise, and form the Jade Thearch mudra with both hands. I then summon the three qi, inhaling thirty-two times through the nose, facing the Qian direction. With my eyes, I trace the True Form Talisman of the Three Heavens, drawing it into the Three Palaces, where it transforms into the Three Clarities, riding forth upon the three qi.

Next, I visualize my body transforming into the form of a divine lord: crowned with a golden-green cicada coronet, clad in a crimson rosy-feathered robe, a grand sash, vermilion shoes, and a deep-red skirt, seated amidst clouds of three hues. My left hand casts the Seven Dipper Seal of the Purple Tenuity, while my right hand forms the Three Fires, grasping the Jade Clarity mudra. I then recite the inner names of the Thirty-Two Heavenly Thearchs—from the Yellow Emperor of the Supreme August Jade Clarity Heaven, Yu Lan Yu Ming, to the Emperor of the Supreme Ultimate Pacifying Nurturing Heaven, Jia Yi—and select the dharma gate.

The Thirty-Two Heavens, the Thirty-Two Thearchs, extending to the Five Thearchs of the Three Realms, are all invoked in the Upper Clarity. *Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the ordinance of the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning and the statutes of the Most High Dao Lord.*

**Summoning the Celestial Courts Spell:**
*"Jade Clarity Treasury Bureau, governing all true numina.
Open the eyes and gaze, penetrating to behold spirits and gods.
Let the true numina descend, revealing their true forms.
Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes!"*

**Incense Offering and Summoning the Celestial Courts General Invocation:**
*"In the heavens most high..."*
*(Full incantation as found in the "Penetrating Vision, Descending Perfection, and Summoning the Numinous" section.)*

Next, with my eyes, I trace the True Talismans of the Three Heavens and Three Realms at the Gate of Heaven, visualizing them as three-colored radiance. I inhale the three qi through my mouth, allowing them to flow into the Three Palaces.

**The True Talismans of the Three Heavens and Three Realms:**
The Three Realms are the primordial true essence of the Three Qi, the wondrous qi of the numinous void, crystallized into true script at the dawn of the Three Heavens and Five Kalpas. They are the root and origin of the natural sounds of all heavens, never transmitted to the lower worlds. Yet, when imparted by the true ones through oral transmission and heart-to-heart instruction, those who encounter this script are destined by past lives’ Dao bones. If one diligently practices it, they shall attain immortality. Should one maintain a prolonged fast in the purity of mountain forests or secluded halls, practice the truth of the Eight Wefts, cultivate the wonders of the Seven Classics, and ingest the true script, then within nine days, the Three Corpses shall perish of themselves, the qi of grain shall naturally cease, the body shall be at peace, the countenance shall glow with jade-like radiance, and the form shall gleam with golden luster—unlike the fleeting effects of medicinal stones or salivary qi, for this arises from the natural true qi. Through enduring practice, one shall attain longevity and transcend the world, forever free from decline and decay, and ultimately achieve immortality.

**Silent Incantation for Inscribing the Talisman:**
*"Numinous qi, divine qi, qi connecting to the Three Clarities.
Six Ding and Six Jia, the mighty sword is merciless.
The Nine Paths are natural, aiding and delivering all beings.
The celestial talisman is evenly inscribed, safeguarding peace and tranquility.
What demon would not submit? What ghost would not reveal its form?
Fire bells and celestial stems, the White Beast and Golden Essence.
Circulating in protection, fiercely guarding the Three Clarities.
By the talismanic command of the Celestial Thearch, the concealed essence is decreed.
Malevolent spirits perish, those of the Dao’s qi find peace.
Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes of the Three Realms of the Upper Clarity!"*

I then recite the preceding General Invocation once more, blowing the qi to the ten directions. Reciting it again, I gather the qi of the ten directions, blowing to the east, south, west, and north, and knock my teeth nine times.

**Penetrating Vision Celestial Courts Spell:**
*"Jade Clarity Treasury Bureau."*
*(Full incantation as previously recited, seven times.)*

I respectfully invoke the Celestial Worthy of Great Compassion and Salvation, the Most Exalted Great Director of Destinies of the Golden Watchtower, the Azure Lads of Azure Radiance, the Divine Lads of the Azure Mystery’s Numinous Response, the Divine Lord of Penetrating Vision of the Azure Empyrean, the Left Divine Tiger Penetrating Vision Great Spirit, the Right Divine Tiger Penetrating Vision Divine Lad, the Jade Maidens Receiving Decrees of the Ten Heavens, the Jade Maidens Receiving Decrees of the Three Heavens, the Numinous Officials Reporting to the Ten Heavens, the Numinous Officials Reporting to the Three Heavens, the Numinous Officials Reporting to the Five Thearchs, the Numinous Officials Reporting to the Great One, the Numinous Officials Reporting to the Grand Clarity, the Jade Maidens of Penetrating Vision, the Jade Maidens of Distant Vision, the Immortal Officials Governing Celestial Script Talismans, the Immortal Officials Governing Cloud Script Celestial Texts, and the Jade Maidens Discerning Demons.

I humbly beseech their united descent, bestowing the true qi to flow into my body, that I may inscribe the Jade Tablet and the penetrating vision script. Upon ingesting them, I shall instantly attain unobstructed vision of all numina and penetrating sight of the ten thousand directions, with all spirits vividly present before my eyes.

**Next, the □ Stem Incantation:**
*"The divine and sacred dharma of the Most High Lord Lao,
The sagely and efficacious dharma of the Mysterious Woman of the Nine Heavens.
□ Stem numinous, □ Stem sagely,
Encountering demonic spirits, swiftly act in accordance with the decree to subdue them!"*

Drawing the qi of the north, I blow it into the inkstone.

**Next, the Qian Yuan Incantation:**
*"Qian Yuan, origination, flourishing, advantage, and perseverance,
The sun and moon accompany me.
I am neither hungry nor thirsty,
Relying on the clarity of divine water.
Metal, wood, water, fire, earth,
The numbers of the Five Phases, the essence of the Six Jia.
The Three Qi of the Celestial Granary,
The turbid qi is ever full.
Yellow Father and Red Child,
Guard the center without inclining.
Divine water enters the Five Viscera,
Forever ensuring peace and tranquility.
Immortals together ascend in transformation,
Penetrating vision beholds the Upper Clarity.
Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes!"*

Drawing a breath, I exhale it into the inkstone.

Next, I visualize the fire wheel of the Great Yang within the water, arriving from the east and revolving within it, its brilliant radiance illuminating the entire chamber.

**The Great One Celestial Perfection Incantation:**
*"I respectfully invoke the Celestial Perfection of the Great One.
The Celestial Perfection of the Primordial Beginning,
True immortals and true perfected,
Corresponding above to the Qian position."*

The Six Ding auxiliary spirits, □□□□□□.
The Six Jia guardian generals, □□□□□□.
For me, ascend to receive the celestial mind,
Universally deliver all spirits.
The Great One’s divine incantation,
The fire wheel of the southern quarter.
Expel evil and heal illness,
Penetrating vision beholds the myriad spirits.
Empower the luminous water with command.

Drawing the southern qi, blow it into the water.
Next, recite the Heavenly Ford Incantation:
*"Heavenly Ford, Celestial Perfection,
Preserve the divine fluid, the spirit’s clarity.
One recitation severs ghosts,
Forever repelling demonic essence."*

Recite again:
*"The True Qi of the Celestial Stem,
Severs baleful influences and pestilential vapors.
The true Yang’s water,
Banishes them ten thousand leagues away."*

Drawing the northern qi, exhale it into the water.
Again offer incense, then with the middle finger,
grind the cinnabar in the vessel forty-nine turns to the left.
Recite:
*"Jiao, Kang, Di, Fang, Xin, Wei, Ji,
Dou, Niu, Nü, Xu, Wei, Shi, Bi,
Kui, Lou, Wei, Mao, Bi, Zi, Shen,
Jing, Gui, Liu, Xing, Zhang, Yi, Zhen.
□□□□□□□,
Tan, Ju, Lu, Wen, Lian, Wu, Po,
The Great Primordial’s true pivot, the net’s guiding cord."*

Drawing a breath of the Five Directions’ qi, blow it into the water.
With the left hand tracing the twelve branches,
and the right hand holding the brush,
recite:
*"Now this disciple, thrice yearly, receives the qi:
The celestial qi and the earthly qi,
The solar qi and the lunar qi,
The qi of the Five Stars,
The numinous qi of the Northern Dipper,
The life-generating qi of the Southern Dipper,
The yielding qi of the Six Ding,
The martial qi of the Six Jia,
The qi of wind and clouds,
The qi of thunder and rain,
The qi of the Four Upright,
The wondrous qi of the Five Peaks sustaining the body,
The Dao qi of the Three Heavens’ Three Treasures,
The divine tiger’s qi of the Northern Dipper.
Heaven cannot cover me,
Earth cannot bear me.
Those who strike against me die,
Those who collide with me perish."*

Swiftly command the gathering.

Set down the cinnabar brush and water. Next, with the left hand execute the Mudra of the Five Emperors, reciting the incantation in accord with the mudra:

*"Vermilion apricot, mao.
Ink-black, chou.
True grindstone, dui.
Stocking-skin, li.
Numinous Treasure, center of the middle finger.
Flourishing life turns to yin.
Solitary attendant shifts to mao.
Permitted Han, bright chen.
Meritorious capital completes at si."*

Precisely at noon, move the finger from the tip to the middle joint of the middle finger, then press firmly.

*"Gather the hun-souls, seize them."*

Next, draw the qi of the Three Paths of Heaven, Earth, and Humanity, and blow it onto the paper and into the cinnabar brush. Recite again:

*"Meritorious capital gathers the hun-souls,
Summon the swift messengers of the Eight Directions,
Celestial spirits and earthly deities,
Myriad numina unite in return.
Conform to the Celestial Emperor’s decree.
Conform to the Radiant Celestial Emperor’s sun,
Conform to the Radiant Celestial Emperor’s sun.
Swiftly manifest, swiftly manifest.
□li □li, embed-fall embed-fall embed-fall,
Hasten here, hasten here, hasten here."*

Then draw a breath of the Eight Directions’ qi and blow it onto the paper, without releasing the mudra. With the right hand hold the brush to the mouth, three inches away, invoke the Three Qi in one breath, and blow it onto the brush. Inscribe the Jade Tablet and the Talisman for Summoning the Perfected and Calling the Numinous. Upon completion, offer incense again and report to the officials.

*The Great Rites of the Numinous Treasure’s Limitless Salvation of Humanity, Upper Scripture, Scroll Thirteen Concludes.
The Great Rites of the Numinous Treasure’s Limitless Salvation of Humanity, Upper Scripture, Scroll Fourteen.*

**The Rite of Penetrating Vision and Divine Perfection**

First offer incense, kindle the brazier, and visualize as prescribed. Assume the Mudra of the Supreme Emperor, invoking the Three Heavens Most High, the Primordial Three Qi of the Grand Supreme Elder Lord. Draw the mudra from within your body, shifting it to the root of the middle finger, then trace along the roots of the two adjacent fingers to their nails and press.

The Thirty-Five Merit Officers, the Left and Right Attendant Messengers, the Left and Right Incense-Bearers, the Courier Dragon Riders, the Golden Lads Attending Incense, the Jade Maidens Scattering Flowers, the Five Emperors’ Direct Talismans, and the Incense Officials of the Day—thirty-six of each—emerge. Release the mudra, then resume the Mudra of the Supreme Emperor, pressing firmly with the middle finger.

Swiftly ascend the Pass and petition the Jade Emperor of the Three Heavens Most High, the Void and Spontaneous Perfected One. Now, as I enter the oratory to burn incense, at this very hour within the altar, I perform the rites of penetrating vision, summoning the Perfected and calling the Numinous. All secret intentions are set forth in the memorial.

May the upright qi of the Ten Directions’ Perfected Ones descend and flow into my body, that my petition may swiftly reach the presence of the Three Pure Ones of the Utmost True and Boundless Dao, the Jade Emperor of the August Heaven.

Again bow, kneel, and silently present the memorial:

*On the [day] of the new moon in the [month] of [cyclical sign], in the year of the [celestial stem-branch] under the Grand Year, I, your servant, [name], holder of the dharma rank, kowtow and bow again to submit this memorial.*

I humbly reflect: born in the lower realm, I have wandered the dusty world, my sins heavy and karma deep. Willingly I would sink into the ghostly path, having no merit to redeem my offenses, awaiting only the executioner’s blade. Yet by the grace of a peaceful age and the fortune of past vows, I have been entrusted with the precious scriptures of the Mystic Covenant and the jade registers of the Dao. I have presumptuously received the profound favor of the Great Dao, unworthily assuming the pure office of the Three Caverns. Overwhelmed by the gift of rebirth, I long to revive my withered and decayed honor. Day and night, I am moved and alarmed, yet can repay not one ten-thousandth. I vow to assist Heaven’s transformative work, aiding the state and saving the people. My resolve is to repent transgressions and pray for blessings, dispel calamities and invoke fortune, cut away evil and establish rectitude, and deliver the souls of the departed. This is my unflagging intent, never daring to slacken, that I might slightly contribute to the great transformation and atone for my accumulated faults.

I am truly awestruck and fearful. Yet though my heart is sincere and my will steadfast, adhering to Heaven’s rules, I fear that in movement and stillness, action and concealment, I may fail to accord with the true principle, unable to move the unseen and manifest, thus lacking the wondrous efficacy of spiritual penetration. Indeed, I am but a polluted being of fleshly birth, a leaking corpse dwelling in dust, with yin qi flourishing throughout my hundred bones. The harmonious qi does not fill my four limbs, so that my eyes’ light wanes, and my vision of things grows dim. How then can I see the gods and spirits, let alone penetrate the Three Realms? How can I cause evil demons to return to rectitude and establish merit in transformative work? My eyes are as if blind, my ears as if stopped.

Formerly, my initiation master [name] transmitted to me the Jade Tablet of the Primordial Unity, along with the true names of the Three Sovereigns, the inner appellations of the Numinous Perfected, and the divine texts of penetrating vision. I am now to cultivate these. Today, having chosen an auspicious day, I henceforth maintain perpetual abstinence and, in accordance with the method, ingest them.

I seek to inwardly cleanse the filth of my heart and outwardly refine the essence of the moon, desiring to penetrate the vision of gods and spirits and attain clear sight through the Three Realms. I humbly beseech:

The Jade Emperor of the Jade Clarity, Supreme Ancestral Master,
The Jade Emperor of the Highest Clarity, Supreme Lineage Master,
The Grand Emperor of the Grand Clarity, True Master,
The Jade Emperor of the August Heaven, Sacred Master,
The Grand Emperor of the Eastern Ultimate and Azure Mystery, Mystic Master,
The Perfected Lords of the Numinous Treasure Scriptures, Registers, and Salvation,
The Heavenly Lords, All the Masters of the Three Heavens and the Most High Perfected Ones,

to deign to look upon my dust-bound heart with sagely grace, not scorning my presumption, and bestow upon me Heaven’s favor. I reverently hope that you will heed my words and specially send down a hundred thousand myriad layers of Dao qi, the upright qi of the Ten Directions’ Perfected Ones, the blended radiance of the Great Dao’s wisdom, the sacred power of the Three Treasures, and the wondrous transformation of the six spiritual penetrations, entering my body.

May they scour away the dust and filth of my heart and mind, wash clean the defilement from my eyes, open the luminous passages of my viscera, absolve my offenses and karmic obstacles, and disperse stagnation from my primordial womb. May they unbind knots and open blockages, subdue all demons, and command the attendance of the myriad Perfected.

After ingesting the inner names, may I sit and observe the Three Realms, instantly illuminating the ten thousand directions, penetrating the vision of the unseen and clearly perceiving gods and spirits, secretly knowing what has not yet arisen, and brightly discerning the patterns of Heaven. May I forever escape the eight difficulties and three calamities, resolve the thousand misfortunes and nine perils. May all I undertake be auspicious, my vows proclaimed and communicated, the Great Dao flourishing, and all beings turning in faith.

I vow life after life, across kalpas and aeons, to succor the living and deliver the dead, to subdue demonic forces, and forever remain a disciple of the Three Treasures. Should I receive the mysterious radiance of karmic response, I dare not leak even a word or half a phrase of celestial mechanism. With reverence, I prostrate and present this memorial from the depths of my heart, that it may ascend directly to the gates of the Three Heavens. May it follow the incense smoke to be conveyed and memorialized before the august presence of the Great Dao, the Three Treasures, and the Most High Emperor.

I cannot but beseech your grace, my hope for the sacred is fervent, my trepidation profound. Your servant so-and-so bows his head and prostrates again to make this known.

Officials of the Incense Burner, Envoys of the Left and Right Dragon-Tiger Lords, and all attendant spirit-officials of the incense: may this place where I present my memorial spontaneously generate golden liquid elixir, azure mushroom blossoms, and the assembly of the hundred numinous Perfected, all gathered before this incense burner. May my vision penetrate and my spirit commune with the numinous, so that jade maidens and immortal youths from the ten directions attend the incense smoke, conveying the memorial I now submit directly to the presence of the Most Perfect, Primordial, and Utmost Great Dao—the Three Pure Ones—and the Supreme August Jade Emperor of the Vast Heaven.

Again bowing, I exit the oratory and enter the ritual enclosure to perform the rites.

I burn incense, knock my teeth twenty-four times, and gather my spirit. Following the previous steps, I pace the Dipper and form the Mudra of Jade Purity with both hands. Next, I recite the concealed names *hong long* and *yong jiong*, summon the Three Qi, and count thirty-two breaths through my nose.

Facing the Qian direction, I visualize the talisman of the Three Heavenly True Forms in my eyes, inhale it into the Three Palaces, where it transforms into the Three Pure Ones. They ride the Two Qi forth and stand before and behind me.

Then I imagine my body transforming into the form of a divine lord: crowned with a Jade Purity cicada-carved cap of gold and azure, clad in a crimson rosy-cloud feathered robe, sash, and vermilion shoes. Seated amidst clouds of three-colored qi, I cast the Seven Dipper with my right hand to form the Purple Tenuity Seal, and with my left, I cast the Three Fires to hold the Mudra of Jade Purity.

Next, I recite the *Esoteric Essentials of the Thirty-Two Heavens’ Divine Communication*:

"Emperor Yulan Yuming of the Supreme August Yellow Prime Heaven,
to Emperor Jiayi of the Supreme Ultimate Peaceful Nurturing Heaven,
the Great Selection of the Dharma Gate.
Thirty-two Heavens, thirty-two Emperors,
the concealed names of all heavens.
Ascend and proclaim to the Highest Clarity.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning and the Most High Dao Lord."

Again offering incense, I recite:
"Red apricot. Mao.
Ink-black. Chou.
True musk. Dui.
Socks and wax. Gao.
Numinous Treasure. Center of the middle finger."

Firmly pressing the mudra, I hold the water vessel in my left hand and the water pitcher in my right, pouring water into the vessel while reciting the *Divine Water Spell of the Northern Culmen*. With each pour, I recite the spell once, visualizing the character *ling* within the water. After seven pours and seven recitations, I inhale the northern qi and blow it into the water.

The spell:
"By the divine and sagely method of the Most High Lord Lao,
the sagely method of the Mysterious Maiden of the Nine Heavens.
Spiritual Culmen, numinous and sagely,
encountering perverse qi, it must respond to the decree and subdue."

Then, forming the Mudra of Jade Purity with both hands, I clasp them before my heart and gaze steadily at the water.

"Qian, origin, prosperity, and perseverance,
sun and moon accompany me.
I am neither hungry nor thirsty,
relying on the clarity of divine water.
The qi of the Five Phases, the essence of the Six Jia.
Numinous water enters the five viscera,
ears, eyes, and mouth become luminous.
All demons naturally return to rectitude,
longevity shares the age of heaven and earth.
Immortals together ascend in transformation,
penetrating vision beholds the Highest Clarity.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed."

Another spell:
"Qian, origin, prosperity, and perseverance,
sun and moon accompany me.
I am neither hungry nor thirsty,
wishing to obtain the clarity of divine water.
Metal, wood, water, fire, earth,
the numbers of the Five Phases, the essence of the Six Jia.
The Three True Ones of the Heavenly Granary,
impure qi is ever full.
Yellow Father and Red Child,
guard the center without inclining.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed."

Silently reciting seven times, I draw the qi of the northwest and exhale it into the water.

Next, forming the Mudra of Jade Purity with both hands, I clasp them at my waist and silently recite the *Water Spell of the Great One*, visualizing the solar fire-wheel swiftly arriving from the east, entering the water, and revolving within it—radiant and resplendent, illuminating the entire chamber.

Then I recite the *True Spell of the Great One of Heaven*:
"Reverently I invoke the Great One of Heaven, the Great One of the Primordial Beginning, true immortals and true persons, who correspond above to the Qian position.
The Six Ding assisting spirits, [missing characters],
the Six Jia guardian generals, [missing characters].
For me, receive the celestial mind above,
universally deliver the myriad numinous beings.
The numinous spell of the Great One,
the fire-wheel of the south.
Expel demons, cure illness,
penetrating vision beholds the myriad numinous.
Command the numinous water to subdue."

Silently reciting seven times, I draw the red qi of the south and exhale it into the water.

Next, forming the Mudra of Jade Purity with both hands, I clasp them before my heart and recite the *Qi-Absorbing Spell*:
"Your disciple receives qi three times a year.
Receiving the qi of heaven,
I lift my head toward the Qian direction to draw it,
responding to the Flowery Summit.
First swallowing once, then inhaling once and swallowing,
visualizing it coiling around the five viscera, filling the entire body.
Next, inhaling the qi of heaven once, I blow it into the water.
Again inhaling once, I blow it into the mirror.

The qi of earth:
I lower my head toward the Kun direction, drawing it downward,
responding to the soles of the feet.
As before, inhaling and swallowing, and blowing into the water and mirror.

The qi of the sun:
Observing the direction of the sun at that hour,
crimson qi of five colors,
responding to the left eye.
As before, inhaling and swallowing, and blowing into the water and mirror.

The qi of the moon:
Observing the direction of the moon at that hour,
silver-colored qi,
responding to the right eye.
As before, inhaling and swallowing, and blowing into the water and mirror.

The qi of the Five Stars:
Drawing from the five directions,
internally responding to the five viscera.
According to each direction, draw the five-colored qi,
as before, inhaling and swallowing, and blowing into the water and mirror.

The qi of the Three Sovereigns:
From the Zi direction, draw the azure mysterious qi;
from the Jia direction, draw the yellow qi;
from the Yin direction, draw the dark qi,
internally responding to the Three Fields.
Inhale, swallow, and blow into the mirror and water, as before.

The qi of the Venerable Gods of the Southern Dipper:
The red qi of the south,
internally responding to the heart.
As before, inhaling and swallowing, and blowing into the water and mirror.

The true qi of the Nine August Ones of the Northern Dipper..."

Drawing the five-colored qi according to each direction,
internally responding to the kidneys,
and further responding to the right hand, right elbow, right shoulder,
heart palace, left shoulder, left elbow, and left hand.
As before, inhaling and swallowing, and blowing into the water and mirror.

The true qi of the Three Terraces stars:
At the Dipper’s head, the yellow, white, and azure qi,
internally responding to the lungs.
As before, inhaling and swallowing, and blowing into the water and mirror.

The qi of the Twenty-Eight Constellations:
Consult the official almanac to determine which constellation governs the day.
If the Horn constellation governs the day—on a *yi-chou* day—
then draw the qi of the Horn star from the *chou* direction,
proceeding in this manner through the cycle.
As before, inhaling and swallowing, and blowing into the water and mirror.

The true qi of the Divine Tiger’s Seven Yin:
From the Dipper’s Yin position, visualize the black qi,
internally responding to the kidneys.
As before, inhaling and swallowing, and blowing into the water and mirror.

The inner qi of the Three Heavens and Three Perfected:
From the northwest *qian* position, the azure, yellow, and white qi,
responding to the three palaces of the head.
As before, inhaling and swallowing, and blowing into the water and mirror.

The divine qi of the Three Masters who deliver me:
From the five directions,
internally responding to the heart.
As before, inhaling and swallowing, and blowing into the water and mirror.

The wondrous qi of the Five Marchmounts that sustain the body:
The five-colored qi of the five directions,
internally responding to the five viscera.
As before, inhaling and swallowing, and blowing into the water and mirror.

The qi of the Three Paths’ General Controller:
From the *zi*, *wu*, and *qian* positions, the black and red qi,
responding to the kidneys and behind the bladder.
As before, inhaling and swallowing, and blowing into the water and mirror.

The gentle qi of the Six *Ding*:
Draw according to the *ding* cycle.
As before, inhaling and swallowing, and blowing into the water and mirror.
In the *ding-mao* cycle, respond to the liver with azure qi;
in the *ding-chou* cycle, respond to the kidneys with black qi;
in the *ding-hai* cycle, respond to the kidneys with black qi;
in the *ding-you* cycle, respond to the lungs with white qi;
in the *ding-wei* cycle, respond to the heart with red qi;
in the *ding-si* cycle, respond to the heart with red qi.

The martial qi of the Six *Jia*:
Draw according to the *jia* cycle.
As before, inhaling and swallowing, and blowing into the water and mirror.
In the *jia-zi* cycle, the liver’s qi returns to the kidneys;
in the *jia-xu* cycle, the liver’s qi returns to the spleen;
in the *jia-shen* cycle, the liver’s qi returns to the lungs;
in the *jia-wu* cycle, the liver’s qi returns to the heart;
in the *jia-chen* cycle, the liver’s qi returns to the spleen;
in the *jia-yin* cycle, the liver’s qi returns to the liver.

The divine transforming qi of the Great Unity:
According to the day’s direction—on a *zi* day, visualize *zi*—
draw the qi of each direction’s color.
Inhale, swallow, and blow into the water and mirror.

The qi of clouds, thunder, wind, rain, and lightning:
From the *xun* direction, draw the azure qi with a faint red hue,
returning to the five viscera.
As before, inhaling and swallowing, and blowing into the water and mirror.

The qi governed by the Four Directs:
From the *zi*, *wu*, *mao*, and *you* directions, the black, red, azure, and white qi,
returning to the kidneys, heart, liver, and lungs.
As before, inhaling and swallowing, and blowing into the water and mirror.

The qi of the Mysterious Woman of the Nine Heavens:
From the *zi* direction, the black qi,
internally responding to the kidneys.
As before, inhaling and swallowing, and blowing into the water and mirror.

The baleful qi of the Great Mysterious Northern Emperor:
From the *zi* direction, the black qi,
internally responding to the kidneys.
As before, inhaling and swallowing, and blowing into the water and mirror.

The fire-martial restraining qi of the Highest Clarity:
From the *qian* direction, the red qi,
internally responding to the heart.
As before, inhaling and swallowing, and blowing into the water and mirror.

Heaven cannot cover me,
Earth cannot bear me.
Those who strike me shall die,
those who collide with me shall perish.
Hasten! As the statute commands.

After ingesting the qi, recite the previous incantation three times, drawing the qi of the ten directions and blowing it into the water and mirror. Then, with both hands, move from the central joint of the middle fingers downward through the twelve cyclical signs, reciting the previous Jade Tablet of one hundred characters. Again, fix the central joint of the middle fingers, drawing the qi of the ten directions and exhaling it into the water. Next, transfer the Jade Tablet from the right hand to the left, place it into the mouth, and swallow it with the enchanted water. Take another sip of water, grasp the sword with the right hand, and facing the northeast, sigh toward the water with a commanding shout.

Inhale a mouthful of qi from the northeast and blow it into the water, then immerse both hands in the mudra within the water. Emerging from the Dipper, support the water with the right hand in the Jade Clarity mudra, and recite the *Qingxuan Heavenly Worthy’s Unifying Vision* incantation over the water:

*"Azure Youth, Spiritually Luminous, divine light perfectly radiant."*

Recite this forty-nine times, drawing the qi of the east and blowing it into the water. Then recite the *Qingxuan Divine Water* incantation:

*"Reverently invoke the Azure Mystery’s Spiritually Responsive Perfected Youth, ascending and descending in the mysterious mandate. Hasten! As decreed by the Qingxuan Heavenly Worthy."*

Recite this nine times, drawing the green qi of the east and blowing it into the water, then wash both eyes with the water. Next, offer incense and recite the *Three Heavens’ Hidden Names* thirty times, inhaling the green qi through the nose to enter the Upper Cinnabar Field from the crown. Recite the Hidden Names thirty more times, inhaling the yellow qi through the nose to merge with the green qi in the Middle Cinnabar Field. Recite the Hidden Names thirty more times, inhaling the white qi through the crown to enter the Crimson Palace, blending with the green and yellow qi in the Lower Cinnabar Field. Visualize the qi ascending and descending, circulating as one, and returning to the Lower Cinnabar Field.

**Method for Cavernous Vision in the Secluded Chamber**
For cavernous vision in a secluded chamber, first arrange the Cavernous Vision Immortal Offices along the left side, standing oneself on the right. Use a small table with incense and pure water on the right, and place a paper mirror upon it—no less than nine inches wide. Beneath the mirror, set a vessel of pure water, replacing it thrice daily. Light three pinches of incense, press the middle joints of the middle fingers together, and inscribe the Jade Clarity Summoning Seal’s true form in the air with the middle finger. Overlay the characters for sun and moon: *Yu Zhen Li* and *Jie Zhen Kan*. [Seven repetitions omitted], then write the characters for heaven and earth directly.

Next, recite the *Five Emperors’ Incantation*:
*"Hong Xing, Mo Hei, Mo Zhen, Wa La, Lingbao."*

Inhale the qi of the five directions, close the eyes, and with the left hand’s mudra, trace above the mirror. Fix the original mudra and recite the *Summoning Immortal Offices* incantation:

*"By my practice of cavernous vision, I command the officers, generals, and functionaries of the Capital of Serenity to appear in the mirror. Hasten! As the statute commands."*

Recite the invocation:
*"Jade Clarity’s Treasured Bureau, governing all true numina. Open the eyes and vision, cavernously behold gods and spirits. Let the true numina descend, manifesting their true forms. Hasten! As the statute commands."*

Reverently invoke:
*The Supreme Minister of the Golden Portals, the Great Controller of Destinies; the Eastern Ultimate Azure Radiance Emperor Lord; the Supreme One Savior from Suffering, the Qingxuan Venerable Lord; the Supreme One Savior from Calamity Heavenly Worthy; the Qingxuan Spiritually Responsive Perfected Youth Lord; the Cavernous Vision Divine Lord; the Left Divine Tiger, the Great Vision-Opening Spirit; the Right Divine Tiger, the Cavernous Vision Youth Lord; the Jade Maidens of the Three Heavens, transmitting petitions to the numinous officials; the Jade Maidens of the Ten Heavens, transmitting petitions to the numinous officials; the Supreme One’s Petition-Transmitting Numinous Officials; the Five Emperors’ Petition-Transmitting Numinous Officials; the Cavernous Observer Jade Maiden; the Distant Observer Jade Maiden; the Transcribing Talisman and Treasured Record Immortal Officers; the Cloud-Script Heavenly Writ Immortal Officers; the Demon-Discerning Jade Maidens, and all others.*

*Humbly beseech your descent to the altar, to grant me unifying vision and cavernous sight.*

Again offer incense and recite the *Great Incantation of the General Petition* (see the *Cavernous Vision Summoning and Invocation* section). Form the Jade Clarity mudra with both hands and knock the teeth nine times. Recite:

*"Supremely invoke the Cavernous Vision Immortal Offices and all others to grant me unifying vision, swiftly and clearly manifesting in the mirror."*

Knock the teeth nine more times, then recite the *First Illuminating Numinous Treasure Jade Mirror Great Radiance Divine Incantation*:

*"Hong Xing, Mo Hei, Mo Zhen, Wa La, Lingbao. Xing Sheng Zhuan, Du Li Qian. Ke Han Ming, Gong Du Cheng. Qie Jiao Zheng, Ju Hun She. Draw the qi of the three paths of heaven, earth, and humanity, and blow upon the mirror."*

Recite again:
*"Gong Du gathers the hun-souls, summoning the swift messengers of the eight directions, celestial spirits, terrestrial deities, and the myriad numina to assemble. Conjoin the celestial decree and the radiance of the Heavenly Emperor’s sun."*

Recite thrice:
*"Swiftly reveal! Swiftly reveal! [Omitted sounds] Qian Luo Qian Luo Qian Luo, swiftly come! Swiftly come! Swiftly come!"*

Draw the qi of the five directions and blow upon the mirror. Recite the incantation once more, drawing the qi of the five directions and the Ghost Gate, and blow upon the mirror. Recite the incantation again, inhale the *xun* qi, recite once more, inhale the Heavenly Gate qi, and blow into the mirror.

Next, recite the *Eight Directions’ Summoning True Incantation*:
*"Reverently invoke the great spirits of the eight trigrams—Qian, Kan, Gen, Zhen, Xun, Li, Kun, Dui—and the eight scribes. Hasten the celestial spirits and terrestrial deities of the eight directions to appear in my mirror."*

With the right hand in the Jade Clarity mudra, use the second finger to mark eight points on the mirror, beginning from the *qian* direction, blowing the qi of the eight directions to summon the spirits into the mirror. Recite:

*"Heaven and earth ascend and descend, the two qi intermingling. The yin and yang qi, the sun and moon conjoined in radiance. By my salvation and summoning, cavernously behold the numinous spirits. Above in heaven, below on earth, the yin and yang spirits. Follow my precious mirror, instantly revealing true forms."*

Draw a medium breath of *xun* qi from the southeast and *qian* qi from the northwest, blow upon the mirror—this is called the *Upper Mystery Qi*.

Next, recite the *Cutting Mirror to Behold Heavenly Spirits* incantation:
*"From whence do I gain the power to cut the mirror and behold the heavenly spirits? The yin intestines harmonize and follow, the imperial decree dispatches flying spirits. By the practice of the Numinous Treasure’s illumination, the Black Crow of the East and the Red Emperor’s spirits. The restraining force must not be heard—let the Three Terraces converge in the mirror."*

The sun and moon stir with numinous intent, and all the spirit-officials within the realm swiftly manifest their forms as commanded.

Draw *qi* from the south and blow upon it, then recite the *Purple Ultimate Incantation*:
*"Disciple So-and-So humbly petitions the Supreme Purple Ultimate, the Great Primordial Celestial Worthy of Original Commencement, the Supreme Dao-One Lord, the Supreme Lord Lao, the Great Master of the Mysterious Center, the Left Mysterious Perfected, and the Right Mysterious Perfected. Upon hearing this disciple’s invocation, open the Golden Essence, stir the Jade Portal, and illuminate all within heaven above, earth below, and the human realm—boundless and immeasurable—drawing the millions into the radiance, swiftly revealing their forms."*

Draw *qi* from the southeast and blow upon it, then recite the *Moving Scenery and Pervading Light Spirit Incantation*:
*"Spirit-light, spirit-light, illumine the eight directions. Above, it connects with the sun and moon; below, it penetrates the frigid regions. East, west, south, and north—it universally shines upon the ten thousand states. Heavenly spirits and true immortals, landscapes and mountains, rivers and seas, their sources, spectral beings and hidden abysses—wherever the Three Luminaries shine, none may conceal themselves. The spirit-light mirror seizes all, leaving no gap finer than a hair. Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Three Radiances of Supreme Purity and the Celestial Worthy of Original Commencement."*

After reciting the incantation once, visualize the sun in the east, the moon in the west, and the Dipper in the north, then summon:
*The Youth of Sunlight, the Youth of Moonlight, the Youth of Starlight, the Cavern Youth, and the Luminous Youth.*

Mobilize the essence of the Three Luminaries and the Mysterious Dipper, the sixfold-pervading spirit-light, to illuminate the ten directions and the Three Realms, drawing the myriad scenes and thousand truths into the mirror to manifest their forms. For divining persons or objects, revealing the future or the unmanifest, and communicating with spirits to invoke their numinous response, command the officials of this ministry and the celestial bureaus of vision to connect with this disciple’s sight, swiftly revealing their forms within the mirror.

Gaze intently into the mirror: if clouds of *qi* like incense smoke appear, or golden and silver specks in five colors fall like rain, then after seven days, the visions will gradually emerge. If you hear voices speaking, or faintly perceive the faces of spirit-perfected, or see impressions like embossed script on paper, or true immortals descend in traces, or detect wondrous fragrances, then within a month, the spirits will manifest their forms.

Should such signs appear in the mirror, proceed with the *Heaven and Earth Descending Qi Incantation*:
*"Heaven and earth descend with *qi*, the sun and moon unite in brightness. Illuminate the numinous spirits of heaven above and earth below, revealing their forms within this mirror. Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the statutes and ordinances."*

Draw the *qi* of heaven and earth and blow it into the mirror, then fix your gaze upon it as if discerning the eye of an embroidery needle, concentrating your spirit wholly within the mirror. At first, it may resemble incense smoke or mist veiling the mirror; after several days, five-colored golden stars will scatter and dazzle the eyes. After more days, you will see clouds of *qi* and human shadows moving to and fro. Later still, five-colored clouds of *qi* will come and go, and the celestial perfected will gradually emerge.

Recite the *Heaven and Earth Conjoined Qi Incantation*:
*"Heaven and earth conjoin their *qi*, the sun and moon unite in brightness. Humbly summon the descending true *qi* to swiftly reveal their forms within the mirror."*

Recite this incantation three times. Upon completion, reverently summon the *Descending True Talisman* to manifest forms, then the *Summoning Spirit Talisman* to appear. Next, summon the *King Youth* to manifest: on yang days, the *Golden Youth*; on yin days, the *Jade Youth*, who will appear. Then summon the *Jade Maiden* to manifest, followed by the *Jade Maiden of the Current Decade*. Only thereafter may you summon at will, observing the order in which forms manifest within the mirror, then within the paper mirror, then upon the earth. Next, establish communication.

At this stage, maintain strict discipline and conduct. Continue to offer the *Descending True* and *Summoning Spirit Talismans* before the sacred altar, presenting incense and fruit on the new and full moons.

*Summoning the Hundred Spirits with the Heaven and Earth Conjoined Qi Incantation*:
*"Heaven and earth conjoin their *qi*, the sun and moon unite in brightness. Regarding such-and-such matter below heaven—whether illuminating spirits, the aggrieved, or spectral beings—swiftly reveal their forms within the mirror."*

*Moving Scenery and Pervading Light Incantation*:
*"Heaven and earth descend with *qi*, the sun and moon unite in brightness. Illuminate the spirits below heaven to manifest their forms in such-and-such place."*

Form the *Jade Purity Mudra* with both hands, draw the *qi* of heaven and earth, and blow it upon the designated location. Upon completion, invoke the *Descending True Talisman* to manifest forms, proceeding in order.

If the visions remain unclear, use consecrated water to wash the eyes and observe carefully. Recite the incantation:
*"Azure Youth, numinous and bright, spirit-light perfectly radiant."*

Perform this nine times, draw *qi* from the east, and blow it into the previously consecrated water. Wash the eyes nine times, then wash the ears nine times with the consecrated water, reciting:
*"Humbly invoke the Numinous Response Perfected Youth of the Azure Mystery, ascending and descending with the primordial mandate. Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Celestial Worthy of the Azure Mystery."*

Face east and silently recite this incantation eighty-one times, draw *qi* from the east, and blow it into the water. With the left hand, form the *Jade Purity Mudra*, and with the right hand, press the central line of the middle finger. Use the right middle finger to wash each eye twenty-one times, then wipe them dry.

Next, recite the *Heaven and Earth Descending Qi Incantation*, hasten the mudra, and gaze intently into the mirror. Proceed in order with the summons, directing and deploying as desired.

After twenty-one days, if no forms appear, maintain strict discipline and daily practice, proceeding in order with the *Seven Urgent Incantations*.

*Sequence of the Seven Urgent Incantations*
*First Urgent Incantation*:
*"Cloud-script of the Great Void, at the dawn of kalpas. Now distant, now near, now sinking, now floating. Wandering the five directions, spanning over a *zhang*. The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign took brush in hand to write. The Celestial Worthy of Original Commencement descended, and the true script unfolded. First, the Cavern Chapters were performed; next, the numinous talismans were inscribed. Brightly it exists; obscurely it vanishes. Stagnation naturally resolves, and the drowned in worldly toil may float. The hidden and the manifest, on the verge of submersion, thereby ascend to the immortal realms. Now I open both eyes to perceive the void with penetrating vision. The celestial script stretches a *zhang* in length, its forms appearing as fine script. Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Celestial Worthy of Numinous Treasure and the Celestial Heart."*

*Second Urgent Incantation*:
*"The Luminous Three Radiances are the root of heaven. Nothing is not transformed without script; nothing is not born without script. Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the statutes and ordinances of the Celestial Worthy of Original Commencement."*

*True Talisman for Penetrating Vision*:
*"Great Spirit of the Heavenly Eye, Spirit Lord of the Earthly Eye."*

**Hundred-Eyed Demon King, Penetrating Vision Celestial Worthy.**
Illuminating the eight directions, ascending to behold the Three Clarities.
Eighty-one layers deep, perceiving the tiniest speck of dust.
Ghosts, spirits, soldiers, and officials—all see my form as I see theirs.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the statutes and ordinances of the Jade Clarity.

*Third Urgent Incantation:*
The sun rises in the east, illuminating the eight directions.
All things reveal their forms; the celestial script shines with golden light.
Grant me penetrating vision, aligning above with the Celestial Stem.
Demons, evil spirits, and malevolent *qi* flee far to other realms.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the statutes and ordinances.

*Incantation for Penetrating Vision:*
Ears divine, ears divine—ears sacred, ears sacred.
To see and hear with perfect clarity.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the statutes and ordinances.
*(To the right, begin at the foot of the character "明," recite the incantation ten times, then lift the brush upward and write in cinnabar.)*

*Fourth Urgent Method:*
Left, the Penetrating Vision Youth Lord; right, the Penetrating Vision Jade Maiden.
The Great Spirit of Penetrating Vision merges with true *qi*, infusing my eyes.
Piercing vision for ten thousand *li*, penetrating sight of all numinous beings.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the statutes and ordinances.
*(For this method, face south and hold water, recite the incantation nine times, then blow into the water and wash the ears and eyes.)*

*Incantation Talisman for Penetrating Vision:*
Swallow one cinnabar-written talisman, wash the eyes with another, then apply one or two drops of water to the corners of the eyes.

*Fifth Urgent Method:*
The Supreme One’s secret incantation—patrolling the cavities, circulating the hun-soul.
Five prostrations to return the spirit and gather its power.
*(For this method, recite seven times, draw a mouthful of northern* qi*, curl the lower lip inward, and blow the* qi *onto the face—thus transforming it to attain great spiritual efficacy.)*

*Incantation for the Talisman:*
The spirit within the heart, the Cinnabar Prime Lord.
Three *cun* in length, seven *fen* in breadth.
Clad in vermilion robes, girded with crimson skirts.
Riding majestic virtue, manifesting supreme numinosity.
Mastering transformation, attaining the utmost truth.
Dwelling in the heart, never leaving the heart.
If urgent matters arise without, hasten to report to me.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the statutes and ordinances.
*(Recite the incantation seven times, perform the Upper Clarity mudra, blow northern* qi*, then recite thirty times before swallowing. Again, perform the Upper Clarity mudra and blow northern* qi.*)*

*Incantation:*
By the decree of the Numinous Treasure Celestial Worthy, I command the Heavenly Kings, Divine Kings, Dragon Kings, and Ghost Kings
to guard my will and respond to transformations without limit.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the statutes and ordinances.

*Sixth Urgent Method*

Facing the northeast, stand and hold the talisman, then pray:
The Divine Tiger’s halberd flies and moves, the Dipper’s handle follows in unison.

Recite again:
By the Divine Tiger Great Sage’s decree, the essence-light of the ten directions is drawn in one breath.

Recite the *Qingxuan Heavenly Worthy’s* *Tongmu Nishui* and wash the eyes.

**Seventh Urgent Method**
First recite the names of the Thirty-Two Heavenly Emperors, concluding with the invocation of *Shangqing*.

Next ingest the Thirty-Two Heavenly Jade Characters, forming the *Yuqing* mudra.
Before ingesting the Jade Characters, first visualize the *Yuanshi Tianzun* in the *Niwan Palace*, recite the *Great Brahma Hidden Speech* once, and envision the Heavenly Worthy entering the heart.
Recite again, and visualize the Heavenly Worthy clearly abiding in the *Dantian*, with the Azure Dragon to the left, White Tiger to the right, red above, white below, and yellow at the center.
The Heavenly Worthy descends into the Lower Field, riding atop a five-colored lion.
Recite once more, then swallow the Jade Character into the *Dantian*, visualizing it as red.

*Incantation:*
Supreme Mysterious Origin, visualize the *Dao Lord* seated opposite.
The *Taishang Daojun*.
Summon forth the Three and Five Merit Officers within my body,
the left and right official messengers,
the incense-attending Golden Lads,
the message-transmitting Jade Maidens,
the Five Thearchs’ Direct Talismans,
and the Direct-Day Incense Officials—thirty-two each—to receive and transmit my words.
Today is an auspicious day, as I maintain strict purity and practice the *Lingbao* Great Rites,
piercing the vision of the ten thousand spirits,
penetrating the sight of gods and ghosts.
May my entreaties ascend to the presence of the *Yuanshi Shangdi* before the throne of the Thirty-Two Heavens.
Conclude, then ingest and swallow the Jade Character, visualizing all the spirits of the incantation entering the *Dantian*, attending the Heavenly Worthy on left and right, ascending together into the *Niwan Palace*. The spirit will then emerge of its own accord, visible in the mirror.
Recite again the names of the Thirty-Two Heavens, the Thirty-Two Emperors, and the hidden taboos of the various heavens, concluding with the invocation of *Shangqing*. Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the golden mouth of the *Yuanshi Tianzun*.
Upon completion of the visualization, then envision the spirits re-entering the *Niwan Palace* through the eyes.
