The **Illuminating Lamp’s** wax and oil must not be tainted by **vile substances**,
nor rendered impure;
it must be full and abundant,
to complete the ritual itself—
**take care not to extinguish it prematurely.**

**The Ritual of Distributing the Lamp to Break the Darkness**

*"In the beginning, the **Primordial One** opened the **Yellow Edict Gate**.
The **Mystic Radiance** perfected its ninefold nature,
and the **Sacred Pattern** was inscribed by **Nature’s** own decree.
The **Three Manifestations**—one hidden, one revealed—
comprehend the **Three Fullnesses** of **Transformation** for **Humans and Heaven**,
their grace flowing through the cosmos,
and now they borrow the **Lamp’s** radiance,
its essence drawn from the **Great Primordial**.*

Following the **Ram’s Horn** in proper order,
and adhering to the **Celestial Compass’s** principles,
the **Upper Radiance** illuminates the **Nine Heavens**,
and the **Three Lights** increase their brilliance.
The **Lower Radiance** shines upon the **Nine Earths**,
and the **Ten Prisons** cease their torments—
its benefits extend to the **Netherworld**,
its grace touches **water and land**.

*"I humbly pray that the **Primordial Sovereign** opens the **Transformation** and issues decrees,
and that the **Celestial Master** reverently distributes the radiance.
With sincere praise and invocation,
I call upon the **Great Sage, Primordial Sovereign**.*

**Requesting the Primordial Sovereign’s Lamp**
Recite the incantation:

*"The Primordial One’s essence is the **Great Radiance**,
the **Celestial Ancestor’s** abode is vast and dark.
Merged with the **Void**, it fills the **Empty**,
faintly leaving the **Original Thread**.
The **Great Passage** opens the **Mystic Gate**,
and the **Divine Clouds** descend in solemnity.
With **Yang** and **Yin**, the **Sacred Embryo** commands the **Divine Exchange**,
the **Ten Thousands of Truths** harmonize in splendor,
awakening the **Nine Heavens’** court.
The **Nine Heavens’** talismans are decreed,
and the **Ten Billions of Aeons** transcend the **Divine**.*

*"I humbly pray that the Primordial Sovereign’s radiance descends,
borrowing the **Dao** to extend the **Celestial Emperor’s** rule.
The **Jade Capital** glows within,
and its light reaches the **Master’s** altar.
The essence enters the **Divine**,
one generates two—
with reverence and devotion,
the **Transformation** ascends in flight.
I call upon the **Great Sage, Lingbao Sovereign**.*

**Requesting the Upper Clarity’s Lamp**
Recite the incantation:

*"The **Celestial Emperor’s** truth begins its radiance,
the **Great Sage’s** essence is the **Primordial**.
The **Single Spirit** guides the *qi*,
and within, it guards the form.
The **Great Void** responds in unity,
and **Heaven and Earth** merge in light.
The **Primordial Function** is auspicious and perfect,
and the **Two Scenes** generate the **Divine**.
Today’s **Transformation** ascends,
and the **Celestial Court** is entered.*

*"I humbly pray that the **Three Manifestations** of **Ten Thousands of Beings**,
collect the **Ancestral *Qi*** within the **Void Emperor**,
all seeing the **Ten Directions**,
to awaken the **Multitudes of Lost Souls**.
The **Master’s** light is merciful and liberating,
and all who feel its touch are illuminated.
The **Law’s** power is manifest and clear,
and no darkness remains unpenetrated.
The **Pure Radiance** is distributed to the **Three Realms**,
and the **Sovereign’s** form is revealed to the **Ten Thousands**.
With utmost reverence and devotion,
the **Nine Heavens** observe with delight.*

*I call upon the **Great Sage, Bright Sovereign**.*

**Requesting the Supreme Clarity’s Lamp**
Recite the incantation:

*"The **Celestial Master** descends in floating splendor,
the **Jade Sovereign** alights in resplendent grace.
The **Sacred Embryo** nurtures the **Soul and Vitality**,
and the **Three Departments and Eight Scenes** divide its radiance.
Within the **Void**, eternal life is attained,
and with reverence, the **Mystic Gate** is entered.
The **Great Micro** returns the **Yellow Banner**,
and the **Unmatched** commands the **Divine Pennant**.
It summons the **Eternal Night Palace**,
and opens the **Transformation** for the **Received Souls**.*

**The Lamp’s Light Illuminates the Celestial Sovereign**

*"I humbly pray that the **Void and Mystic** cut through death,
and that the **Sacred Radiance** pierces the **Dark Obscurity**.
The **Jade Tablet** forms the altar,
and the **Law-Bridge** is opened for liberation.
The **Divine Light** blazes in splendor,
and the **Dark Night** becomes radiant.
The **Assembled Congregation** unites in sincerity,
and the radiance descends to the **Earthly Realm**.*

The **Celestial Sage** says:
*"If one wishes to offer and rescue the **Netherworld Spirits**,
or to light the lamp that breaks the darkness,
one must obtain the **Palm of Illumination**,
only then can the **Three Lights’** wisdom
connect with the **Common Fire’s** radiance,
and only then can they hope to summon and liberate those beings.*

*If this method is absent,
then the **Common Fire’s** light alone
cannot transcend its own limitations.*

*On the **Day of Rectification**,
at **midday’s first hour**,
burn incense to the **southwest**,
and facing the **Great Sun**, absorb its *qi* and blow upon the brush.
Perform two prostrations and kneel long,
writing the **Twelve Dao Passages**—
when the light is emitted,
use this talisman."*

**The Talisman of the Lamp’s Illumination**
*(Right side: length nine inches, inscribed in red on yellow paper,
using the **Jade Clarity’s** method, with **eastern *qi*** blown upon it,
the wax melted and applied to the talisman’s reverse,
twisted into a torch for use.)*

**The Talisman of the Three Scenes’ Illumination**
*(Incantation follows.)*

**The Talisman of the Lamp’s Illumination (Continued)**

**Incantation:**
*"Heavenly Sage of Illuminating Light,
Pierce the deepest darkness.
The Three Lights radiant,
Penetrate the cosmos’ depths.
Suffering souls, bound in corpses,
All bathe in boundless brilliance.
The Two Scenes endless,
Merciful wisdom forever preserved.
This talisman, inscribed in red on yellow paper,
With the **Three Lights’ true *qi*** blown into it—
**The Secret Method to Break the Nine Abysses**
*(The Royal Sage speaks:)*
*‘The Nine Abysses*—
*These are the transformations of the **Nine Stars of the Big Dipper** into the Nine Netherworld Prisons.
Spread across the **Nine Regions**,
*Eastern Abyss* is **Yūmíng** (幽冥), the prison of wind and thunder;
*Southern Abyss* is **Yūyīn** (幽阴), the prison of fire’s eclipse;
*Western Abyss* is **Yūyè** (幽夜), the prison of **Jīngāng** (金刚, adamantine severity);
*Northern Abyss* is **Yūhēng** (幽酆), the prison of **Mínglíng** (溟泠, boundless waters);
*Northeastern Abyss* is **Yūdū** (幽都), the prison of **Niǔtáng** (镬汤, boiling cauldron);
*Southeastern Abyss* is **Yūzhì** (幽治), the prison of **Tóngzhù** (铜柱, copper pillars);
*Southwestern Abyss* is **Yūguān** (幽关), the prison of **Túgē** (屠割, slaughter);
*Northwestern Abyss* is **Yūfǔ** (幽府), the prison of **Huǒchē** (火车, fiery chariots);
*The Central Abyss* is **Yūyù** (幽狱), the prison of **Pùluē** (普掠, universal punishment).

*Each is governed by a **Community Official** within its respective region.
Those born in **Zǐ-Hòu** (子丑) belong to the **Northern Abyss** of **Mínglíng** (溟泠).
Those born in **Wǔ** (午) belong to the **Southern Abyss** of **Huǒyì** (火翳).
Those born in **Yín-Mào** (寅卯) belong to the **Eastern Abyss** of wind and thunder.
Those born in **Wèi** (巳) belong to the **Southeastern Abyss** of **Tóngzhù** (铜柱).
Those born in **Wèi-Shēn** (未申) belong to the **Southwestern Abyss** of **Túgē** (屠割).
Those born in **Yǒu** (酉) belong to the **Western Abyss** of **Jīngāng** (金刚).
Those born in **Hài** (亥) belong to the **Northwestern Abyss** of **Huǒchē** (火车).
Those born in **Chén-Xū** (辰戌) belong to the **Central Abyss** of **Pùluē** (普掠).

*‘To practice the **Method of Summoning and Liberating** souls,
One must first understand the Nine Abysses,
And with wisdom break their darkness—
Then the lost souls may be liberated.
If one does not know these prisons,
How can they be summoned?

*The **Method to Break the Abysses** is thus:
*Focus the **middle finger of the left hand**,
And visualize the **Sage’s Form** of each direction,
Drawing upon the **native *qi* of that region** to blow and strike.
In the **East**, manifest as **Jade Treasure’s Imperial Sage** (玉宝皇上天尊),
In the **South**, manifest as **Mystic True Blessing’s Heavenly Sage** (玄真万福天尊),
And in the other directions, likewise visualize the **Holy Stations** of each.

*In the **East**, take **nine steps** of **Dīnggāng** (丁罡),
In the **South**, take **three steps** of **Dīnggāng** (丁罡),
In the **West**, take **seven steps** of **Dīnggāng** (丁罡),
In the **North**, take **five steps** of **Dīnggāng** (丁罡),
In the **Four Intermediate Directions**, take **five steps each** of **Dīnggāng** (丁罡),
In the **Center**, take **twelve steps** of **Dīnggāng** (丁罡).
*All must summon the **Three-Colored Light of Primordial Essence’s Sacred Treasure** (元始灵宝祖炁三色之光)
To pierce their depths.

*Further, visualize the **Five Emperors’ Scepters**,
Transformed into the **Supreme Decree’s Scepter** (上帝节杖),
With **Golden Boys and Jade Girls**—
Twelve on each side—
Holding **Treasure Banners**,
Upon which is inscribed in gold:
**‘Jade Emperor’s Pardon of Crimes, Illuminating Sage’** (玉皇赦罪天尊).

*In each prison’s direction,
Visualize an **Iron City** of ten thousand *zhàng* (丈),
Netherworld snares entangled,
Black mists descending,
Foul *qi* billowing—
**Copper Serpents** spitting flames,
**Iron Hounds** spewing smoke,
Ghostly guards and **Yèchā** (夜叉, night demons)
Locking the gates.
*Manifest your **Divine Form** within the **Hundred Treasures’ Radiant Light** (百宝光明),
Connect with the **Primordial Essence’s Three *qi*** (元始三炁),
And charge directly at the city.
*When the **Iron City crumbles**,
The **Mountain of Knives** snaps,
The **Swords** dissolve into **Sword Forests** (剑化骞林),
The **Mountain of Fire** extinguishes,
The **Ice Pools** still their waves,
Those who devour fire and consume charcoal
Transform into **Sweet Dew**,
The **Boiling Cauldron** ceases its heat,
The **Golden Hammer and Iron Rod** become **Lotus Flowers** (变成莲花).

*The prisoners within the Abyss—
When the **Banner points** and the **Light illuminates**,
Their **Fetters and Shackles** fall away,
Their sufferings all cease,
All awaken to their **Original Source**,
Hatred and grudges dissolve,
The prison guards strike their palms in approval,
All exclaiming: *“Good! Good!”*
Gazing upward in praise of the **Sage’s Compassion**,
They rise with the **Radiant Light**,
And exit the **Abyssal Realm** (幽冥之界).

**The Diagram of the Nine Abysses’ Lamps**
*(The Mystic Master says:)*
*‘Following the **Heaven’s Pattern and Earth’s Model**,
The **Square and Round** are its form.
*The Nine Abysses and **Yīn Cáo** (阴曹, Netherworld),
Hold authority over **punishments and laws**,
And their dominion lies in **Lóhēng Dōngnán** (罗酆东南, the southeastern nether regions).

*According to the **Teachings of the Supreme Unity’s Holy Truth** (太一圣真之科),
*Construct nine **altars** of **Nine Earth Stones** (土九石),
Each **altar two *chǐ* (尺) in size,
And the nine **altars arranged in a square** of **six *chǐ* (尺) each,
To embody the **Earth’s Symbol of Yin Extremity** (二六之象).

*Each altar bears **four diagrams in three bends**,
Like the shape of prisons.
*One altar holds **three lamps**, nine altars together **twenty-seven lamps**.

*At the **eastern center** of the altar,
Erect the **Treasure Banner for Divine Transfer** (迁神宝幡).
*Within the **nine altars’ core**, set a **tablet**,
Inscribed on its face with the **True Talisman of Jade Clarity’s Breakthrough of the Netherworld** (玉清破地狱真符),
And on its back with the **prison’s name** (狱名).
*Beside it, plant **nine green bamboo poles**, each **nine *chǐ* (尺) long,
And hang a small **banner** from each,
Inscribed with the **Holy Titles of the Twelve Treasures’ Illuminating Sages** (十方灵宝天尊圣号),
With the **Talisman of the Netherworld Capital** (酆都符) written at the banner’s top."*

When the time comes to break the prison, the attending lamp-masters shall recite the *Break-Prison Rite* in proper sequence, and the master shall wield the **Sacred Treasure Staff**, chanting the *Break-Prison Spell*, while the assembly responds with the *Holy Titles of the Twelve Treasures’ Illuminating Sages*. Then, at the lamps, they shall burn the talismans and banners over the prison.

The master shall strike the eight directions of the Netherworld with the staff, completing all sides before reaching the center, where the second talisman and banner are burned—following the same method as the other directions.

The *Essentials of Jade Clarity* are invoked, summoning a yellow cloud to cover one direction, and the master assumes the form and bearing of a Celestial Sage.

For each prison, nine *kòu* (叩) strikes are delivered before and after the spell.

Thus shall the Netherworld open, and the departed ascend to the Dao.

**Jade Clarity Talisman for Breaking the Nine Prisons**
With vermilion script on the green banner’s top,
The Celestial Sage’s title of the respective direction inscribed on the body,
The *Nine Joy Talisman’s Proclamation* written on both hands,
And the *True Talisman of the Highest Clarity’s Sacred Scrolls* on both feet—
Declaring to the **prison of such-and-such direction and place**.

When inscribing the talisman, hold the *Divine Essence Secret* in the left hand,
Recite the *Opening-Light Spell* seven times,
Draw qi into the brush,
Then chant the original spell once more,
Seal the qi, and write in sequence.

Upon completion, again command with the spell of the respective direction.

---
**Opening-Light Spell:**
*"Three stars radiant, Primordial Origin opens the light—
Guilty or innocent, all are pardoned in every direction.
Swiftly, as the Law decrees!"*

**Ascend to the Heavenly Realm.**

**East Direction Wind-Thunder Underworld Talisman of Jade Purity**
*Proclamation:*
Nine breaths of Azure Brilliance,
Illuminating the Wind-Thunder.
Jade Treasure of Compassionate Sage,
Crushing spears and halting blades,
Guiding the Morning Dawn to radiance,
Soul ascends to the Taiwei.
Spirit and consciousness undergo refinement,
Enjoy boundless blessings.
As the command is declared,
Swiftly transmitted by Wind and Fire.

*Spell:*
Azure Yang, Azure Sovereign,
Essence of the Thunder Palace.
Radiant light descends,
Piercing the depths of darkness.
Crushing the Underworld,
All Wind-Thunder ceases.
Swiftly, as the Dao decrees!

**South Direction Flame-Obscured Underworld Talisman of Mysterious Purity**
*Proclamation:*
Three breaths of Vermilion Brilliance,
Piercing light through the Flame-Obscured.
Ten Thousand Blessings of Compassionate Sage,
Dissipating the Fire Pool.
Transformed into pure gardens,
Sweet coolness permeates the flesh.
Suffering souls receive grace,
Adrift in effortless ease.
As the command is declared,
Swiftly transmitted by Wind and Fire.

*Spell:*
Southern Yán, Crimson Essence,
Luminous Palace of the Li Fire.
Light descends through all layers,
No darkness, no obscurity remains.
Flame-Obscured ceases its blaze,
Deep heat finds its clarity.
Swiftly, as the Dao decrees!

**West Direction Golden-Jar Underworld Talisman of Supreme Purity**
*Proclamation:*
Seven breaths of White Brilliance,
Illuminating the Golden-Jar.
Supreme Marvel of Compassionate Sage,
Crushing edges and extinguishing gleams.
Knives turn into bamboo groves,
Swords into mulberry forests.
Souls and spirits receive salvation,
Sharing light with the sun.
As the command is declared,
Swiftly transmitted by Wind and Fire.

*Spell:*
White Sovereign, Rigid Mount,
Pursuing and beheading demons.
Riding the *qi* to expel,
Flying spears and swift officers.
Breaking the Rigid Wind,
Protecting all beings.
Swiftly, as the Dao decrees!

---

**North Direction Boundless-Frost Underworld Talisman of Highest Purity**
*Proclamation:*
Five breaths of Azure Brilliance,
Piercing light through the Boundless-Frost.
Jade Morning of Compassionate Sage,
Melting ice and dispelling snowy cities.
Warmth arises from cold expanses,
Poisonous brews turn clear.
Souls attain wondrous fruits,
Ascending to fragrant groves.
As the command is declared,
Swiftly transmitted by Wind and Fire.

*Spell:*
Layered darkness, shadowed,
Black Dragon holds the talisman.
Reaching the Nine Abysses,
Guilt shall not be long detained.
The Northern Sovereign commands,
Disobedient shall be slain.
Swiftly, as the Dao decrees!

**Northeast Direction Cauldron-Simmering Underworld Talisman of Celestial Purity**
*Proclamation:*
Sacred *qi* of Morning Brilliance,
Piercing light through the Cauldron-Simmering.
Celestial Salvation of Compassionate Sage,
Power felt in all directions.
Boiling subsides, clarity descends,
Transformed into sweet nectar.
Lost souls regain divinity,
Ascending to Heaven’s Hall.
As the command is declared,
Swiftly transmitted by Wind and Fire.

*Spell:*
Realm of shadowed darkness,
Gate of guilt and karma.

**Incantations for Breaking the Ten Directions of Hell**

**Incantation for Breaking the Southern Fire-Obscuration Hell**
Three *qi* of elixir brilliance, ten thousand blessings of primordial truth.
Blowing forth solar breath, liberating suffering souls.
Fire-obscuration vanishes instantly, life-giving winds arise from flames.
Scorching paths of torment, lawful rain of mercy-clouds.
Graceful light spreads transformation, guilt and retribution dissolve.
As the proclamation is declared, all spirits heed with reverence.

**Incantation for Breaking the Western Iron-Body Hell**
Seven *qi* of pure essence, supreme mystery at its peak.
Golden radiance resplendent, universally liberating souls and consciousness.
Iron rods of torment, eternally granting escape.
Golden hammers and spears, crushed at the moment.
Heaven’s mercy pardons all—none dare disobey.
Souls ascend to the Pure Expanse, free in divine form.

**Incantation for Breaking the Northern Dark-Frost Hell**
Five *qi* of profound essence, celestial jade dawn.
Nine harmonies of solar light, universally saving souls.
Pure fragrance pervades, evil miasmas disperse.
Ice-lances and frost-blades, eradicating their roots.
Nine-Heaven Dao-*qi*, eternally removing cold bonds.
Guilt and retribution dissolved, ascending to the Southern Palace.

**Incantation for Breaking the Northeast Boiling-Caulron Hell**
Stabilizing kalpas, preserving divine aura—
Holy Sage of boundless mercy, transforming form to relieve suffering.
Divine grace flows, extinguishing the boiling cauldron.
Seething, roasting, and burning—restored to pristine form.
Soup transforms to sweet coolness, lotus blooms with green stalks.
Eternally freed from torment, universally ascending to Primordial Response.
As the proclamation is declared, ghostly officials heed with reverence.

**Incantation for Breaking the Southeast Bronze-Pillar Hell**
Life-giving *qi* of the Brahman Sun, one *qi* of benevolent creation.
Great Sage of liberation, universally saving the boundless.
Scorched flesh regenerates, heat-torment disperses.
Flames consume the Bronze-Pillar, eternally extinguished.
Suffering and guilt removed, ascending to the Celestial Palace.

**Incantation for Breaking the Southwest Butchery Hell**
Emperor of the Void, lofty and luminous.
Primordial radiance descends, illuminating the nether palaces.
Wind-blades slice and sever, crushing edges and blades.
Guilty souls scatter, flesh restored, spirit revived.
Eternal cessation of torment, following the path to the Daoist sect.

**Incantation for Breaking the Northwest Fire-Wagon Hell**
Heavenly Pure Jade Essence, boundless Great Hua.
Primordial *qi* rectified, illuminating the boundless.
Fire-wagons shattered, traces of sin erased.
Rotten souls dissolve, transformed into jade blossoms.
Divine gathering of souls, ascending to the immortal realm.

**Incantation for Breaking the Central Universal-Torture Hell**
Supreme Jade Void, Radiant Sovereign of Purple Court.
Descending into the Nine Abysses, True Sovereign of the Cavern.
Merciful dual lights, universally liberating lost souls.
Mountains of blades and forests of swords, instantly transformed into cypress groves.
Torments of retribution removed, acid and bitterness eradicated.
Sawing and inverted suspension—eternally no longer endured.
Iron cities shattered, ghostly officials ascend to truth.
Billions of kalpas of guilt cleansed, universally ascending to the Vermilion Mound.
Ten-Heaven proclamation—all spirits obey.
Dare they disobey? Their transgressions will be recorded before the Jade Court.

**Prayer for the Staff**
Humbleness to the boundless benevolence, demonstrating the precepts of mercy in the dark.
In the endless night of the underworld, all have received protection.
With reverence, the Celestial Teacher of the Mystic Middle, the Quiet Old Heavenly Lord—
His virtue and Dao are exalted, revered by gods and mortals.
The nine abysses’ records of guilt have been erased by the sacred torch’s light.
The Six Paths of rebirth have eternally awakened to the truth of the Eternal.
Exhausting this mortal form, returning to the boundless truth.
With reverence, returning the staff to the sacred altar, eternally fortifying its威风 for ten thousand generations.
This subject is unworthy of such grace, prostrating twice in homage.

**Prayer for the Lamp**
Since the two forms divide and the Five Phases originate,
The revolving *qi* of supreme yang fuses into divine fire’s flame.
Its radiance spreads to illuminate the obscure and penetrate the depths,
Its brilliance shines to dispel darkness and dissolve ignorance.
Its transformations are boundless, its merits infinite.
The Most High Sage’s nature is inherently luminous, free from the shackles of darkness.
The vulgar and impure are obscured by dust and toil, thus falling into the faults of darkness.
Therefore, the Most High opens the gate of compassionate means,
Enabling submerged souls to see the path of light and joy.
The Three Primordials’ sacred talismans rank first in lamp offerings.
The Nine Nights of darkness are best dispelled by this merit of breaking obscurity.
Its blessings permeate infinitely, benefiting all sentient beings.
At this hour, [name] humbly offers, having completed the pure merit of fasting.
All share in the fruits of goodness, thanks to the divine radiance illuminating the submerged and suffering.
Lost souls now seek light and see the Dao; the dark gates behold the sacred torch and release the imprisoned.
From one lamp to nine hundred million lamps, the light continues endlessly.
From this realm to the great thousand-worlds, blessings flow without bound.
Humbly following the jade scroll’s rites, I pray the golden lotus flame be restored.
With reverence, I wish for [the deceased’s name], whose thousand lives of guilt
Fall like ashes and are consumed,
Whose ten thousand kalpas of calamity
Are extinguished by the descending light.
Ascending to the realm of light, eternally leaving the land of darkness.

Supreme Yin opens the light, the long night continues to brighten.

Sun and Moon, the Two Truths, merge with me.

**Chapter on the Burning Lamp to Break the Prisons**
**Ritual of Radiant Return and Descending Light**

The Mystic Master said:
*"The Ritual of the Radiant Return and Descending Light* adheres to the *Alliance of the True*—
It expiates the Five Bonds of Suffering,
Opens the Dao of birth-and-death,
And shatters the court of darkness where crimes are tried.

*The Method:*
A wheel is crafted from *zhi-mu* wood,
Resembling a chariot’s axle.
Its upper tier holds twelve lamps in bowls,
Its middle tier sixteen,
Its lower tier twenty-one—
A total of forty-nine lamps.

At the center stand the Five Bonds of Suffering.
Each prison’s name is inscribed on tablets.
According to the *Radiant Return Lamp Ritual*,
Forty-nine small silk banners are made—
Alternating yellow and white—
With the sacred titles of the Celestial Honored Ones
Emblazoned at their heads,
And the *Talisman to Break the Tartarus Realm* inscribed in vermilion.

The Master of the Law intones the *Lamp Ritual*,
While the Great Master wields the staff,
His left hand holding the *Jade Purity Decet*,
His right gripping the staff.
Following the expiatory rites, he stands before each prison,
Plants the staff upright,
Recites the *Hidden Mantra of the Great Brahman*,
And sprinkles with willow-branch purified water.
Then, at the lamps, he burns the small silk banners.

Thus, the tormented spirits of these prisons,
Riding the yang-light,
Are instantly liberated from all suffering,
Severed from the Five Bonds of affliction and malevolent obstructions,
And forever freed from the roots of dusty toil.

Moreover, on the wheel’s east and west,
A crimson banner thirty-six *chi* long is crafted—
Its top adorned with a golden mudra,
Depicting the *Central Dipper* constellation.
The banner’s body bears, in large seal script,
The four characters *Radiant Return Sacred Banner*,
Followed by three empty spaces,
Then the title *Turning Wheel Celestial Sovereign*.
To its left, a sun is painted in color,
With the six characters *Idyllic Compliance Emperor of the Great Yang*.
To its right, a moon is painted in color,
With the six characters *Jade-Luster Sovereign of the Great Yin*.
At its base, the *Hymn of Radiant Return* is inscribed:

*"Radiant Return to the Purple Micro Palace,*
*Curved reflection at the Nine Abyssal Gates."*

Lofty and cold the barren hills and chilly pool,
Reflecting the encircling ice-bound shores.
Blazing the fiery hells’ torment,
Yet the Dao’s rain descends, refreshing and pure.

From endless night’s dark bonds I lift the soul,
Ascending to the Crimson Peak’s celestial hall.

This ritual stems from the *Tongxuan*’s forbidden lore—
Unless one’s merit calls it forth to reveal,
How could mortals hope to glimpse its light?

Who can restore the radiance of the Three Luminaries,
And bend the Nine Abyssal Gates to open wide?

Let water’s wrath and fire’s venom fade,
Let steel blades dull and iron fortresses melt,
Let ghostly judges cease their grim decrees,
And vanish the karmic debts of aeons past—
From endless suffering, raise the lost in throngs,
And those who see these lights shall rise to heaven’s path.

Tsai Zhi and Lu Shi, in ritual form,
Forged no wooden wheel but shaped it from sand—
Square without, round within, nine *chi* in span,
Three concentric rings like chariot wheels entwined.

The outermost ring bears twenty-four spokes,
The middle ring fifteen, the innermost nine.
At its heart stands the *Radiant Return Sacred Banner*,
And one lamp burning bright within its glow.

The nine inner spokes hold nine lamps alight,
Behind which stand inscribed the *Three Evil Gates*,
The *Three Emptiness Paths*, and the *Three Tutor Realms*.

The fifteen middle spokes bear fifteen lamps,

The twenty-four outer spokes hold twenty-four lamps,
Behind which stand inscribed the *Twenty-Four Hells*.

**Scripture of the Eight Hardships Talismans and Incantations**
The Celestial Sage rescues all the lost,
Liberating them from the Eight Hardships.
Celebrating their rebirth within the human realm,
The Five Sufferings vanish in an instant.
Forever extinguished from the main currents of hell,
Their retribution conforms to the **Dao/Way**’s eternal law.
The **Xīyí** (Mysterious Sage) nurtures the young and tender,
Endless calamities are averted.

This talisman shall be inscribed on **green paper with white ink**,
Invoking the **Supreme Secret Formula**.
Once inscribed, it shall be burned at each gate of hell.

**Incantation for Burning:**
*The **Jade Clarity Sacred Treasure Talisman** ascends beyond the Eight Hardships,*
*Liberating from endless depths,*
*Attaining the far shore.*
*The **Dao/Way**’s profound mysteries,*
*Radiant as the sun’s light,*
*Reborn within the human realm,*
*Uttering great praises.*
As decreed by the **Jade Clarity Sacred Treasure Talisman**,
Conforming to the **Supreme Secret Formula**’s grand edict.

The **Dao/Way**’s Master declares:
*"Diligently observe the *Qīngwēi Bǎo Gé* (Pure Clarity Sacred Treasure Canon):
Yin **virtue/power** with merit surpasses ancestral trials,
Yang **virtue/power** manifests blessings for oneself.
Why not establish meritorious deeds to save those in the **Wujiàn** (No Interval) Hell,
Naturally, the Heavenly Emperor will bestow upon you the True **Dao/Way**?

Rebellious ministers and treacherous bandits sink forever into ruin,
Yet still cling to the **Qiúzé** (Differential Grace) and transform into insects.

For nine years, all the celestial realms rejoice and celebrate,
Clad in white armor, ascending clouds to pay homage to the **Jade Clarity** (Yùqīng).

The **Wujiàn** Hell is the realm of **Yōuyīn** (Dark Obscurity) and bitter suffering.
The Heavenly Emperor’s secret edicts for **Yōuyīn** (Dark Obscurity) punishments
Each have their fitting measures.

The four births and six paths of the mortal world,
Like a revolving wheel of death,
Have no rest or respite.
Unless one transcends the Three Realms,
Entering the natural **Dao/Way**,
How could they escape the suffering of rebirth?

Even the human realm extends to the **Róngmán Yídí** (barbarian lands),
Where the **Dao/Way**’s proper transformation does not reach,
And the sun’s light does not shine.
Yet all who bear the Three Karmas,
Six Roots, and Five Bondages,
Are still born as humans,
And universally governed by the Northern Heaven.

The Northern Heaven has three officials:
The Ghost Official, not the **Qīnglíng, Qīnghuá, Zǐqú** (Three Pure Officials).
This Ghost Official specializes in the Three Trials and retribution.

If one’s bodily karma is grave,
The Fire Official conducts the trial;
If one’s mental karma is grave,
The Recording Official conducts the trial;
If one’s verbal karma is grave,
The Water Official conducts the trial;
If all six roots and twofold karma are grave,
Then the **Wind Knife** (Fēngdāo) Official conducts the trial.

When humans are born,
From father’s essence and mother’s blood,
Congealing bones and nurturing flesh,
They form into body and shape.
The womb and embryo nurture,
Ten months of full completion,
When the **Tàiwēi** (Great Minute Star) descends its **qi** to generate the spirit,
The **Fēngxìng** (Wind Nature) follows the transformation,
And the soul and consciousness coalesce—
Only then is birth complete.

If born male, the Celestial Sage holds rank;
If born female, the Primordial Sovereign is named.
Yet due to their own threefold karma,
Six roots entanglement,
When their allotted time is exhausted,
They receive retribution according to their deeds:
Their flesh and sinews sink into the earth,
Their soul and spirit are bound in the netherworld,
Not from a past life’s horizontal death,
But by the **Shèlìng** (Community Order) and the **Tǔzhǔ** (Earthly Sovereign),
Confined in endless night,
Forever without escape.

If their karmic debts are repaid,
They are sent to the Ghostly Capital,
Yet even after ten thousand kalpas,
They cannot transcend rebirth.

If their crimes are many and merits few,
They endure the Five Sufferings before any chance of transformation arises.
If their merits are many and crimes few,
After one hellish cycle,
They shall attain the blessings of rebirth.
If both merits and crimes are sparse,
They are reborn according to their karma.
If there are no merits and crimes are grave,
They sink into endless ruin for ten thousand kalpas.

If the Fire Official conducts the trial,
Then the retributions of the Copper Column,
Iron Bed, Golden Soup Furnace Charcoal,
Fireous Marsh and Ash River,
Fire Chariot and Boiling Cauldron
Shall be met.

If the Water Official conducts the trial,
Then the retributions of the Ice Pool,
Frigid Pond, Poisonous Filth,
And foul stench
Shall be met.

If the Recording Official conducts the trial,
Then the retributions of the Golden Hammer,
Iron Rod
Shall be met.

If the **Wind Knife** Official conducts the trial,
Then the retributions of butchery and saw cleavage,
Flying lances and whirling spears,
Tongue extraction and field plowing,
Swift thunder and fierce winds,
Eightfold crossfire,
Severing body and mind,
Knife Mountains and Sword Trees,
Dismembering the form,
Fire Hounds and Poisonous Serpents,
Gnawing flesh and bone,
Burning bones and scorching skin,
Ash and dust consuming the spirit,
Day and night between endless birth and death,
Karmic winds scattering and reforming at will—
If the crimes are shallow,
The sufferings exhausted,
They still do not lose the human path,
Being reborn as lowly or base individuals,
Lacking proper features,
Or in the **Sìjí** (Four Extremes) of barbarian lands.

罪重业轻，生为六畜之形，
Tenfold or fivefold rebirths as beasts,
Yet still to return to the human path.

若也罪业重大，
But if crimes and karmic burdens are grave,
风刀考掠之后，
then after the Wind Knife’s trial and torment,
散飘神魂，
the soul scatters and drifts,
飞扬万方，
wafting across the ten directions,
随其胎卵湿化四生，
taking form in wombs, eggs, dampness, or rebirth in the four realms,
分形微细昆虫，
becoming minute insects of varied forms,
永无再生人身之路。
forever barred from human rebirth.

更有罪业少而过名大者，
There are those whose transgressions are slight
yet whose reputation of sin is vast—
备经三涂五苦之后，
after enduring the three realms’ torments and fivefold sufferings,
方入饿鬼之门，
they enter the realm of hungry ghosts,
再生劫运，
to undergo endless karmic cycles,
拘为长夜之徒，
bound as eternal night’s prisoners,
担沙负石，
hauling sand and bearing stones,
涟汲溟波，
sipping waves of the boundless ocean,
驱雷役电之后，
after being compelled to summon thunder and command lightning,
托生鬼道丑恶之报，
they are reborn into the ghastly paths of ghostly torments,
亿劫之中，
through countless eons,
永沉阴冥。
they sink into eternal darkness.

於是辛亥子酆都记云：
Thus, in the *Xīnhài Zǐ* records of the **Yùndū** (Netherworld),
有胎生之鬼，
there are ghosts born from wombs—
是此也。
these are the ones described above.

既生人世，
Once born into the human world,
举足动步，
every step and movement,
惟罪是修，
are but karmic retributions,
意志情累，
stemming from past intentions and afflictions,
皆为根业。
all rooted in past deeds.

善事善业，
Good deeds and virtuous actions—
彼求报此。
others reap their rewards.
恶事恶业，
Evil deeds and sinful actions—
此求报彼。
these bring retribution upon themselves.

一失人身，
A single loss of human form
便有此境。
brings such a fate.

至於酆都北帝启陈，
As for the **Northern Emperor of Yùndū**’s revelations,
尚云先缘不幸，
He still declares:
先缘不幸，
that past karmic connections were ill-fated,
身任冥司，
and one must serve the Netherworld’s officials,
动经亿劫，
through eons of toil,
不睹光明。
never seeing the light.

况其下鬼罪魂乎。
How much more so for lesser ghosts and sinful souls!

是以遵承太上慈训，
Thus, in accordance with the **Supreme Daoist Lord’s** compassionate teachings,
示此因缘，
to reveal these causes and effects,
使学士睹此苦报旨趣，
and let scholars behold the intent of these bitter retributions,
体太上慈悲之念，
grasp the **Supreme Lord’s** merciful intent,
发慈悲之智慧，
awaken compassionate wisdom,
行慈悲之法门，
practice the methods of compassion,
证慈悲之妙道，
realize the wondrous path of mercy,
使苦爽获慈悲之恩德，
so that suffering beings may receive the blessings of compassion,
岂不乐哉。
is this not joyous?

是故祖师起救苦度人之法门，
Therefore, the **Ancestral Master** established the **Method of Saving Suffering and Delivering Beings**,
百千万篇，
with countless scriptures,
作苦海之舟楫，
as vessels and oars for the sea of suffering,
为成真之径路。
providing the direct path to enlightenment.

凡是学士发斯慈心者，
All scholars who cultivate this compassionate heart
慎无旷慢。
must be vigilant and never negligent.

The Master says:
In this world, many are **cursed by hexes**,
and **tainted by demonic afflictions**—
though their **lifespans** are not yet complete,
they **die prematurely**,
all **ensnared by grievances**.

They must be **searched for and pursued**,
and their **grievances** explained.
The **Five Peaks’** **Divine Officials and Soldiers** must be summoned to **pursue and retrieve**.

**crimson script**, and the **Taoist Seal of the Emperor’s Decree**.

*The **Jade Extremity Sacred Talisman** descends,
reaching down to **Zhengshan**.
The **Five Peaks’** **Divine Officials**,
pursue and retrieve the **departed soul**.
Explain and harmonize—
**mutually becoming virtuous**.
Hexes and curses **dissipate**,
together ascending to **Heaven’s** halls.
The **Peaks’** **Divine Officials and Soldiers**,
receiving the talisman, **search and retrieve**.
Swiftly, as the **Jade Clarity Heavenly Emperor** decrees.*

The Master says:
In this world, mortals often perish

thus cut down before their time,
before their years are fulfilled.

Inscribe this talisman on yellow paper, five *cun* long,

The noose shall loosen itself.

**The Rescue Talisman**
*Held souls, oh spirits, respond!*
*Above, you align with Heaven’s court.*

*By this talisman’s command,*
*harmonized, released, ascend.*

all who died by hanging, bearing grudges across lifetimes.
Receive this command, explain their feuds.
Ascend at every moment, as decreed.

Receive this command, explain their feuds.

their bodies enter the Underworld,

lonely spirits and stagnant souls—

whether by food or drink,

sinking into the Underworld’s depths,
their hatreds lingering through countless ages.
By this talisman’s power, their grudges are resolved.

as decreed.

**The Talisman for Resolving Feuds and Quarrels of Souls in the Underworld**

how then shall they find release?

Now, with this true talisman,
let them ascend and be delivered.

O souls of the Underworld, o souls of the Underworld,

bearing grudges in the dark Underworld.

**The Talismans for Pursuing Souls Lost in Childbirth**
The Master says:
Among mortals born into this world,
women bear the greatest sorrow—
for they are bound by past karmic debts,
taken as brides into foreign households,
where *yin* and *yang* forces gather,
forming the embryo.
Thus, childbirth brings countless hardships.

Sometimes the mother dies while the child lives,
sometimes the child dies while the mother lives,
sometimes both mother and child perish,
or even when still unborn—
the child remains in the womb while both die together.

All such souls are entangled by past-life grudges,
endlessly repaying debts,
silent in the Underworld’s endless night,
crying out in the depths of darkness—
*"Hóu! Hóu!"*—
their suffering unbearable,
no path to liberation,
their bodies stained with blood, foul and reeking before Heaven.
How then can they be released?

If practitioners act without understanding,
merely reciting formulas for ascension,
they struggle to evoke response,
and deliverance is unattainable.

Thus, use these talismans
to summon them from the *Xuěhú Yù* (血湖狱, Blood Lake Prison),
commanding their return to the altar,
cleansing their forms,
preserving their bodies intact,
so that their shapes and essences are whole,
and they may ascend the Heavenly Path,
finding natural joy.

**The Talisman for Pursuing the Mother’s Soul When the Child Lives**
**The Talisman for Pursuing the Child’s Soul When the Mother Lives**
**The Talisman for Pursuing Both Mother and Child’s Souls When They Die Together**
**The Talisman for Pursuing the Child’s Soul When Still Unborn and Both Perish**
**Incantation for All Childbirth Talismans:**
*"By the Jade Purity’s sacred script,*
*Ascend and deliver the souls lost in childbirth.*
*Extract them from the endless night’s prison,*
*Transcend the gates of rebirth.*
*Unbind their past-life karmic debts,*
*Sever their accumulated sins.*
*Riding this talisman to the Crimson Court,*
*They undergo refinement, transformed into humans.*
*Swiftly, as the Jade Purity Supreme Decrees."*

The Master says:
All who die in childbirth
have past-life grudges that harm them.
Even in this life,
each debt must be repaid—
silent in the Underworld’s night,
crying out in the depths of darkness—
*"Hóu! Hóu!"*—
their suffering unbearable,
no path to liberation,
their bodies stained with blood, foul and reeking before Heaven.
How then can they be released?

Within the Underworld,
there is a prison at the bottom of the Northern Yin Sea,
named the *Blood Lake Prison*.
Such souls are all confined there.
There is a divine overseer,
called the *Great God of Blood Lake*,
dwelling beneath the *Wújí Water* (无极水),
where the currents flow above,
and the stench reaches the heavens.
Now, practitioners and masters alike
do not know their true affiliations,
and merely summon the *Shenhu* (神虎) retinue to pursue them.
How can they arrive?
If the gods see them,
they too must be defiled,
and cannot approach.

But if one invokes the **Great God of Blood Lake**,
let the divine officials—along with the *Shenhu* (神虎) retinue—
escort them to the base of the *Blood Lake Prison*,
then still must petition the **Heavenly Physician of the Great Void** (斗下天医君),
with the full likeness,
before they may pursue and summon the guilty to the altar.

Practitioners of the **Dao** (道) should proceed with caution.

**Summoning the Souls of Those Who Died by Breaking the King’s Law**
The Master says:
*"All mortals are foolish and deluded,
unaware of the King’s Law’s existence,
using their hearts recklessly,
slaying others and harming life.
Some fight and quarrel,
one as an old adversary,
the other as a grudge-bound tormentor.
Though their rage may be fleeting in the moment,
how could they know they forfeit their own lives?
Their souls guard the battlefield,
their spirits await their turn as adversaries.
In this life, they suffer repayment,
and in the next, the torment continues—
pair by pair, endlessly entangled,
with no respite in sight.

How then can such souls be released?
Even if they ascend by the **White Register** (白简),
the roots of their crimes cannot be avoided.
This sacred talisman should be used for their absolution.

with vermilion text,

Where the talisman’s command arrives,
forms appear swiftly.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the **Supreme Daoist Sovereign of the Ultimate Pole** (太极真王) decrees.
Release the **True Talisman** from the grip of evil spirits,
dispel all wrongful entanglements."*

**Talisman for Resolving All Three Worlds’ Grudges and Debts**
*"The talisman’s command is urgent—
ascend the souls and **po** (魄) trapped in the Six Paths and Four Generations,
dissolve the grudges and debts of the Three Worlds.
Some are seized by temple deities or evil spirits,
some by ancestral resentments,
some by curses binding them to deities,
some by youthful vitality ensnared by lustful ghosts,
some forced as wives or concubines,
some driven as servants or ghostly soldiers—
their lives unaccounted for,
their deaths unrecorded.
Accept this talisman’s command,
resolve their grudges.
Ascend at every moment,
as if summoned by decree.
Dissolve the Three Worlds’ grudges and debts."*

**Talisman for Resolving All Three Worlds’ Grudges and Debts (Right Side)**
*"The talisman’s command is urgent—
ascend the souls and **po** (魄) trapped in the Six Paths and Four Generations,
dissolve the grudges and debts of the Three Worlds.
Some perish for wealth or lust,
some for riches, some for poverty—
within the inner chambers,
jealousy and rivalry rage,
among friends and associates,
deceit and betrayal fester,
and even now, through the Three Worlds,
they still confront the Nine Springs."*

*"Accept this talisman’s command,
resolve their grudges.
Ascend at every moment,
as if summoned by decree.

**Right Law from the *Zishu* and *Jingming* Scriptures**
*The talisman of the Dao/Way’s Supreme Treasure,
descended to the netherworld.
Those who transgress the law and linger in ignorance,
shall answer before the Hall of Cold.
Bearing grudges and debts,
with no path to resolution.
Now, by this talisman’s decree,
release them and grant transcendence.
As virtuous companions,
refine their essence in the Vermilion Mound.
Swiftly, as the edicts of the Jade Purity Emperor of the Supreme Dao.*

**Talisman for Resolving All Three Worlds’ Grudges and Debts (Right Side)**
*Now, by this talisman’s command,
extract and elevate the solitary souls and **po** (魄) trapped in the Six Paths and Four Generations,
dissolving the grudges and debts of the Three Worlds—
even those condemned to the Nine Springs.

**Talisman for Resolving Wrongful Death in Prison**
*Accept this talisman’s command,
resolve their grudges.
Ascend at every moment,
as if summoned by decree.

*The Master says: All thieves and robbers arise from poverty.
Some perish by blade while breaking and entering,
some are slain by their own victims after plunder.
Greedy for small gains,
they lose their heavenly years.
Once in the underworld’s bureaucracy,
their lamentations find no path.
Though rooted in past lives,
they are also past connections.
With this true talisman,
proclaim their release and resolution.
The Jade Purity Edict.

*The talisman’s decree descends:
It universally proclaims the underworld’s ways.
Those who perish in nightly plunder,
the wrongfully harmed—
grudges echo through the ages,
calling forth retribution.
Now, past grudges cease,
accumulated offenses lighten.
Souls and **po** (魄) undergo refinement,
ascending to the Vermilion Mound.
Swiftly, as the edicts of the Jade Purity Emperor of the Supreme Dao.*

**Supreme Scripture of the *Lingbao* Method for Liberating Countless Beings (Upper Volume), Chapter 53 Complete**
**Universal Liberation Talisman (Section on Talismans)**

*The Emperor of the Void Sovereign’s golden talisman and white tablet,
by decree, established the Nine Abysses,
pardoning and extracting from the Five Torments.
Swallowing fire, consuming charcoal—
transformed into sweet nectar.
Boiling cauldrons, furnace coals—
turned into clear waters.
Golden hammers melt into lotuses,
iron rods become no rods.
Officials of the Three Realms bow in homage,
burning incense and dancing in reverence.
Tormented souls ascend,
entering the celestial court.

*Those who abide in serenity—
they are the Three Realms’ Emperor’s gracious blessings,
who expounds the *Golden Talisman Scripture of Commanded Liberation*,
breaking the torments of the Nine Abysses, Three Realms, and the Five Courts of *Tangdu*.
By decree, the ghostly officials all obey the edicts,
extinguishing the flames of Fire Mountain,
calming the waters of the Abyssal Pools,
burning the black ledgers,
forever free from scrutiny and punishment.
Liberating departed souls,
granting rebirth in the Southern Palace.

*From ancient times,
those who follow it reap blessings like mountains,
those who defame it sink into the depths without number.
Begin with diligence, end with neglect—
the retribution for evil is not light.
Embrace the decree and uphold it,
renewing longevity and fortune.
Though worldly transmission may lead to errors,
now verified and corrected,
no discrepancies remain.
Thus, all may clearly understand,
and all may follow in accordance."*

「The Mystic Master speaks: In the Three Heavens, there is the peerless luminous *True Treasure* of the Golden *Dao* and Jade Tablets, the *True Seal* of Rescue from Suffering. The Jade Strategy states: *"The Eastern Extremity, the Azure Palace of Nine Dragons, the Golden Dao Seal of Rescue from Suffering."*

This is the威章 (*Weizhang*) of *Yuan Shi* and the曲恩 (*Quen*) of the Celestial Sovereign. It is truly the法药 (*Faoyao*)—the remedy for those ensnared in darkness, a decree as urgent as the command itself, allowing one to traverse the太虚 (*Taihu*, Great Void).

**Right: The Spell for Horizontally Slain Suffering Souls**
*Imperial Truth* is blended and refined, the spirit is tempered and the vital essence is nourished. Left and right officials comply with the order, the *Sima* (司马) of the *Dongyao* (洞谣) responds. Nine nights of submerged souls dissolve, and malignant roots are transformed. The *Zihu* (紫户) seals the records, and the *Shenfu* (神府) ascends to the *Xiao* (霄). The long night is opened, and the *yin* (阴) aligns with the *yang* (阳) standard. The Three *Zhang* (章) are unified under the sovereign’s rule, bringing harmony to the *afu* (幽寥) and the Six *Qi* (炁) all obey. The *Sima* (司命), *Silu* (司录), *Sigong* (司功), and *Sisha* (司杀) oversee the Three Sovereigns and reveal the *Dufu* (都府).

The *Zhongli* (中理) of the Five *Qi* (炁) blends harmoniously with the hundred spirits. The *Tan* (昙) chant extends beyond, receiving the decree from the Three *Qing* (清). The Nine *Yang* (阳) govern transformation, nurturing souls beneath the clouds. The *Daming* (大明) unites with the sun, obtaining the *Tianjing* (天晶) of celestial brilliance. The radiant Jade Sovereign ascends, and the Nine Abysses all rise together. The *Quanqu* (泉曲) receive the decree, and the abyssal souls are pardoned by imperial edict. As swift as the *Qingxuan* (青玄) laws, this is the decree.

**Right: The Spell for Souls Lost in Childbirth**
The three souls return to their *Ying* (英), and the *lüzì* (绿字) souls are reborn. The nine orifices are opened, and the five seals welcome the spirit. The gates of the ghosts are severed, and the *Huangdao* (皇道) is made clear. The Three *Tai* (台) are spread with brilliance, and the Six *Yi* (仪) are blended into unity. *Yin* and *yang* are harmonized, and the *Huangda* (皇达) unites with the *Yuanling* (元灵). The Five Sovereigns and Great Demons serve as attendants, escorting and welcoming. The *Hunben* (混本) returns to *Yiyī* (一), ascending the Three *Qing* (清). The Nine Clans are all liberated, and the Three *Jing* (景) are pure. My body is liberated from this realm, and my essence merges with nature. My living form receives the decree, and thus I endure through countless *jia* (劫). The Nine Abysses cannot contain me, nor can the *Youguo* (幽廓) restrain me. I reflect upon the *Huanghe* (皇河), and gallop through the *Yu Xu* (玉虚).

**Right: The Spell for the Long-Living Seal, Dissolving the Vital Orifices**
The *True Treasure* of Rescue from Suffering is invoked as follows:
*The Most High Dual-Luminous* (俩明), *Yuan Shi* the Illuminating Sovereign (元始明真). The Five Elders and Celestial Sovereigns (五老上帝), with their *Chishu* (赤书) and Jade Texts (玉文), extract and remove sins and malignant roots. All are granted liberation, and the scrutiny and punishment cease. The soul ascends to the Nine Heavens, and the spirit crosses the *Zhuling* (朱陵). Today, I make my report to the heights, and all spirits hear it. As swift as a *Tongming* (告命) decree, transmitted by wind and fire.

**The Long-Living Seal Chant**
*Yuan Shi* the Celestial Sovereign (元始上帝), with *Chishu* (赤书) and Jade Texts (玉文), dissolves and consumes *yin* obstructions. By refining fire, one attains true essence. The blade is sharp at the *Nanji* (南极), and the *Fuyan* (浮阎) spirits are summoned to the divine court. The essence of fire is refined and flows, and the *Chan You* (禅猷) preserves life. The *Poni* (婆尼) True Child (真童) cleanses the defilements within. The inner and outer are radiant, revealing the form of the Jade Infant (玉婴). Ascending the *Chanli* (禅黎), one enters the *Dongyang* (洞阳) court. As swift as a *Tongming* (告命) decree, transmitted by wind and fire.

**The Dispatch of the True Seal of Rescue from Suffering**
When invoking the seal, chant over the incense:
*The Most High Dual-Luminous* (俩明), *Yu Di* the High Spirit (玉帝高灵). The Jade Texts report the decree, saving the dead and granting rebirth. The Golden *Dao* Seal’s wondrous precepts rescue and protect the abyssal realms. The White Tablet and Precious Seal are the *Jiuzhen* (九真) *Xuanjing* (玄经). They dissolve and extinguish sins and debts, and grievances are pacified. The *True Person* of Rescue from Suffering removes punishments. The *Cha Ming* (察命) Child records names for rebirth. The *Huojie* (护戒) Spirits guide them to the *Futing* (福庭). Beyond the Five Sufferings, they ride the cloud palanquin. The *Zhuanlun* (转轮) attain the *Dao*, and ascend to the *Shangqing* (上清). This is the dispatch of the Long-Living Seal.

**The Decree of the Long-Living Seal**
The *Huangren* (皇人) says: *"The souls bound by sin are under the jurisdiction of the Northern Dipper’s Seven Elements (北斗七元). Therefore, first inscribe the characters of the peerless Seven Elements and the Nine Abysses’ sinful souls (九幽罪魂之字), then apply the *qi* (炁) of the Three Lights (三光) to illuminate the Ten Directions (十方), and the Three *Tai* (台) shine brightly. Hence, inscribe the light of the *Xuanxiang* (玄象) to illuminate the Eight Prisons and Five Prisons (八狱五狱), the Five Sovereigns overseeing life (五帝监生), and the Six Spirits (六神) animating the souls (运灵). Next, inscribe the light of the *Hedai* (合日), which the Three Lights illuminate. The *Zifu* (紫府) marks the names, the Celestial Lords hold the seals, and the decree is proclaimed in the *Huating* (华庭). The *qi* (炁) of *Tianshui* (天元) and *Taimian* (太山) nourish the Southern Dipper (南斗). The Three Officials (三官) receive the edict, and beneath the Nine Earths (九地), within the Nine Waters (九水), and across the Nine *Yin* (阴) landscapes (九阴之景), all witness the radiance."*

**The Decree of the True Seal of Rescue from Suffering**
*The Huangren* (皇人) says: *"When humans fall into ruin, it is due to the control of the Three Corpses and Nine Vermin (三尸九虫). All are subject to the movements of the Five Phases (五行), thus entering the gates of the Five Sufferings (五苦) and the cycle of rebirth (轮回). Therefore, the *Taiyi* (太一) first employs the *qi* (炁) of the Three Lights (三炁) to shatter the Nine Abysses’ prisons (九幽之狱). Inscribe the *qi* (炁) of the Nine Stars (九星) to purge the corpses and defilements, making the Five Viscera (五藏) internally luminous. As swift as the sun’s movement, the *yin* and *yang* return to their souls and spirits (魂魄). Hence, inscribe the *qi* (炁) of the *Dian Shi* (砀尸) and *Yan You* (演由), then arrange the Eight Trigrams’ stars (八卦之星), the *Xuanxiang* (玄象) manifesting their forms, the Two *Yi* (仪) harmonizing, and the Three *Qi* (炁) flowing to subdue the Three *Tian* (田). The Heart rules *Kan* (坎) and *Li* (离), ascending to the court of the Three *Qing* (清). Then, array the True *Qi* (炁) to fill and overflow, and all spirits respectfully listen. The Nine Abysses are destroyed, blending into One *Qi* (炁), the corpses return and life is reborn—hence, inscribe the 曲赦 (*Qushè*, "curved pardon").*

**The True Precepts for Practice and Use**
Carefully following the *Jiuyou Bazui Zhenjing* (九幽拔罪真经), the Northern Sovereign (北帝) once widely proclaimed the request for rescue, extracting all sufferings. The *Xu Huang* (虚皇) Celestial Sovereign, with golden mouth, spoke to the Four Assemblies (四众). Now I proclaim to you the Nine True Precepts (九真妙戒), the Golden *Dao* Seal (金箓) and White Tablets (白简), the True Seal of Rescue from Suffering (救苦真符), and the Long-Living Seal (长生灵符). By receiving and upholding these, you gain merit, extract difficulties, and rescue suffering—spiritual power beyond measure. All spirits bow in reverence, receiving the teachings and the *Xu Huang* (虚皇) Celestial Sovereign’s benevolent pardon (天尊宸泽曲赦).

Now, for the establishment of the *Huangji* (黄箓) Great Fast (大斋), you must use the *Qingzhang* (青章) and *Huangbiao* (黄表), presenting them to the *Xu Huang* (虚皇) Celestial Sovereign’s presence.»

Then one may proclaim to the Ten Directions of the Boundless World, rescuing and extracting all sufferings. If the petitions are not properly presented, merely establishing the fast in vain yields little spiritual efficacy.

Together with the *Succhāra* (素车) and *Baima* (白马) petitions, the *Shangqing* (上清) *Taixuan* (太玄) True Seal, bearing the *Taixuan* (太玄) Seal Command, is sent to the Ten Directions to open pathways and rescue lost souls—this is the harmonious accord of heaven and humanity, the model of celestial and human law.

The *Huangji* (黄箓) Nine-Yin Great Fast is not to be taken lightly. Moreover, the chief officiant and high-ranking priests, whose daily virtues are outweighed by transgressions and whose conduct is thin in virtue, have their crimes recorded in the Northern Bureau, their spirits confined within shackles—how could they rescue lost souls from the underworld?

Merely arranging food for the altar and decorating the platform risks profaning the lofty immortals. If, at the outset of the Great Fast, the officiating Daoists and the Six Officials of the Law first adhere to the Nine True Precepts, receive the *Nanchang* (南昌) *Lianzhi* (炼质) Soul-Seal of Long Life to refine the yin with the yang, their sins may also be absolved. On the day of dismantling the altar, they must return the precepts and seals. If they do not uphold the precepts or bear the seals, their fast will be in vain, and no response will be granted.

The two seals of *Tiāolóng* (茭龙) and *Yìlì* (驿吏) accompany the petition, ascending to *Xuandu* (玄都), detailing the number of the deceased and requesting the descent of true officials to transmit the seals.

When inscribing these two seals, use light yellow and light green as the base, writing with *cinnabar* (丹砂). Burn incense, face north toward the *Beidou* (北斗) constellation, aligning with the *Taizun* (太尊) and *Tianhuang* (天皇) Jewel Stars. Recite the *Yùqīng* (玉清) incantation, then complete the inscription and blow *qi* into the seals. Thus, they may be transmitted to the underworld to absolve the sins of the deceased—none will fail to respond.

The *Jiu’ku* (救苦) Seal of Long Life should be inscribed on *bùmù* (栢木) tablets. For the *Congxiang* (丛相) Celestial Sovereign, heaven bestows sacred *qi*, nurturing eternal life. Human longevity is governed by the Three *Yuan* (三元), and among the Nine Earths, this wood is the most refined—comparable to gold and jade in its protective *qi*. Among all woods, *chun* (椿) is the Wood Sovereign. Wherever houses or wooden structures gather, if they attract malevolent *qi*, using *chun* wood for beams and pillars will dispel the evil.

Using *bùmù* as the tablet, it absorbs the pure *qi* of heaven and embodies eternal life. The spiritual officials revere its golden-wood essence, and the underworld values its capacity for rebirth. Hence, ancient coffins were made of *bùmù* to avoid the tortures of the Three Realms. The *Xu Huang* (虚皇) Sacred Seal states: "Using *bùmù* tablets is equivalent to gold and jade."

Many in the world use *zǐmù* (梓木), however, which is a wood of *sha* (煞) *qi*—unable to nurture life unless properly aligned, violating the precepts of the Sacred Scripture. Its use is forever prohibited.

The tablet should be nine inches long—symbolizing the Nine Heavens and Nine Yang, emerging from the Nine Yin of the deep abyss, ascending to heaven on the Nine Yang *qi*. Its width should be two inches and four *fen*—representing the Three Realms and Eight Sceneries, encompassing the *qi* of the Twenty-Four Divine Spirits. Its thickness should be two *fen*—emblematic of the harmonious union of yin and yang, embodying the singular transformation of heaven and earth.

Seal it in a green pouch, a color revered by the Three Officials as the beginning of purity. Burn it in green smoke alone, without mixing other fumes that might corrupt the pure *qi*. During the fast, after purifying with incense, use nine-times-refined *cinnabar* to inscribe the seals facing east, before the Three Treasures, according to the prescribed rites—only then will the seals align properly.

In recent times, many practitioners ignorant of ancient rites merely print seals on yellow paper and affix them to boards. The *Shangqing* (上清) Lord, pitying the souls submerged in the depths of darkness, fears that improper seals may hinder their transcendence. He specially dispatches the Spirit Officials to admonish: "The *Huangji* (黄箓) Nine-Yin Fast is no different from the Northern Yin—it relies entirely on the two True Seals. If one uses printed paper seals instead, the high crimes will befall the practitioners themselves. Moreover, if the inscriptions are careless, the seals improperly inscribed, deviating from the law, the underworld officials will refuse to use them—heed this warning carefully."

The *Yùcè* (玉策) states: All beings inherit the primordial *Taiyuan* (太元), their pure spiritual source. Though they borrow *qi* from matter and receive divine essence in form, fortunate are those who glimpse the celestial radiance, yet they fail to honor it. *Qi* clings to objects, giving rise to mundane desires, while spirits and demons scheme, their efforts daily diminishing. As *qi* erodes and the spirit fades, they cannot return to their origin. Entangled in the Five Bonds, they suffer in the underworld—some in the Five Mountains and great rivers, the Nine-Yin prefectures, the city gods and community deities, or the springs and sources of rivers. Others rely on orphaned spirits, cling to malevolent objects, wander dark paths, conspire with shamans to stir mischief, clinging to deluded minds and unaware of their past lives. When confronted with virtuous influences, their forms shift and their spirits wander, their hearts and forms inseparable, trapped in an endless cycle. The lofty path of humanity is thus exhausted.

The Most High, in boundless compassion, always rescues all beings, issuing seals to the underworld to benefit the lost, extinguishing the flames of suffering, absolving the burdens of past lives. The celestial waves flow deeply, refining and returning them to humanity. It is further said: For those who universally benefit the Nine-Yin orphaned spirits, the countless descendants across eons, conducting grand rituals to heaven and earth and submitting to the *Xuanzhen* (玄真), the officiant must first announce to the Three Realms, report to the *Xuanshi* (玄师), and inform the earthly officials.

Next, establish the *Huangji* (黄箓) Great Fast, presenting the ritual thanksgiving offerings. When inscribing the seals, enter the *Jìng* (靖) incantation, burn incense, and announce to the Three Realms, facing northeast. Write the *Jiùkǔ Zhēnsù* (救苦真符) on a *bùmù* tablet with red seals, inscribing the *Yuānshǐ Fùmìng* (元始符命) on the reverse, and seal it in a green pouch.

List the rank of the chief officiant and command the *Tiāolóng* (茭龙) and *Yìlì* (驿吏) to swiftly proclaim to the Ten Directions of the Boundless World, declaring the Five Agents. The old texts mention six agents—this corresponds to the *Jiǎshēn* (甲申) era of the *Shànghuáng* (上皇) reign, as seen in today’s inscriptions of the *Jiǎzǐ* (甲子) year.

Now, the revised text includes the year, month, and day as the sixth agent, using celestial seals and the *Yùqì* (阙支) stems and branches. Yet, to avoid mixing worldly script with the true brushwork, one may instead transfer the year and month declaration to the reverse of the tablet.

The *Jiùkǔ Zhēnsù* (救苦真符) is sealed in green paper, with the *Yuānshǐ Fùmìng* (元始符命) inscribed upon its reverse, and proclaimed to the Ten Directions of the Boundless World below, rendering two lines above the tablet’s clasp.

Then, summon the *Tiāolóng* (茭龙) and *Yìlì* (驿吏), together with gold coins to paint the dragon, and burn them in fierce flames.

The *Yùcè* (玉策) states: According to *Zhēn Gāo* (真诰), the *Zǐwēi Wáng Fūrén* (紫微王夫人) replied to *Yáng Sīmìng* (杨司命) in a written discourse: *"Permit me to explain the origin of this scripture: as with the Three Elements and Eight Assemblies, it is the imperial sovereign’s use of the Supreme Polarity, High True, and Pure Celestial Dao. The seals bear the luminous characters of the divine scriptures, which are the very letters seen in the sacred inscriptions of the gods today. In the age of the *Huá Jì* (华季), they falsely crafted intricate and vulgar strokes, descending to crude and profane characters. Abandoning the original for the counterfeit, this is but the filth of deceit and death. How could the True Celestial ones forsake the authentic, virtuous script and instead hand-paint the profane and chaotic characters below?"*

Now, within the *Chángshēng Fú* (长生符) are forty-seven characters; together with the two seals’ proclamations, the old texts all state that these are the luminous characters of the divine seals. Later generations, unaware of the distinction between true and mundane scriptures, simply substituted the worldly characters in their place. How could this not sully the sublime and refined sacred texts, and fail to observe the forbidden norms below?

The *Yùcè* (玉策) further declares: The *Tiāolóng* (茭龙) and *Yìlì* (驿吏) should respond to the command, meaning that one should not rely on written charms but instead transmit the seals directly.

For those who have yet to move the Mysterious Spirits (玄灵), one may draft a *Qǐngguān* (请关) petition. Seal the *Yìlì* (驿吏) talisman at the end of the petition, so that the command may reach the *Hán Sī* (寒司) officials.

Alternatively, one may take fresh *tiāo* (茭) reeds, bind them to a *Xiànglóng* (象龙) and *Xiàngyì* (象吏) effigy, and place the talisman within it, instructing them to carry the inscribed tablet. A separate petition must also be composed, addressing the *Tíng Dōu* (酆都) officials, and it is imperative to inform the Supreme Mysteries (上玄) of this.

If the *Yìlì* (驿吏) are not summoned, and one merely acts upon private intent, hastily proclaiming this talisman without proper authority, it is akin to the mortal world’s arbitrary pardons—something no subject dares to unilaterally decree. Thus, a grand *Chéngdiào* (醮) ceremony for Heaven and Earth must be conducted before this talisman may be used.

The *Xuānshī* (玄师) says: In the Thirty-two Heavens (三十二天), there are *Fēilóng Qíshǐ* (飞龙骑史), and in the *Xuāndū* (玄都), there are *Yìlóng Qíshǐ* (驿龙骑史). Hence, the scriptures say: *"The golden Tiāolóng (金龙驿呈) presents itself, receiving the divine proclamation."* Some ride upon the *Tiānmǎ* (天马), others upon the *Tiānjiāo* (天蛟), or harness the *Jīnlóng Jīnmǎ* (金龙金马) to proclaim to the Three Realms and Ten Directions, covering all in an instant.

The *Tiāolóng Yìlì* (茭龙驿吏) talisman: The *Xuānshī* (玄师) further states: In the *Tàixuān Dū* (泰玄都), there are twelve hundred thousand *Tiāolóng Yìlì* (茭龙驿吏) who oversee the transmission of commands and the opening of luminous pardons for offenses. When proclaiming the *Jiùkǔ Zhēnsù* (救苦真符), one must first inform the *Yùzūn Yùdì* (玉尊玉帝), then summon one of these officials.

At the time of inscribing the talisman, recite the *Yùdì Jié* (玉帝诀) while the *Bíyǐn Shī* (鼻引师) guides the *Qi* (炁) and *Máng* (芒) through nasal inhalation and oral exhalation. The *Qi* (炁) of the Five Stars and Three Luminaries (三光五星) should be drawn in through the nose and expelled through the mouth. The *Qi* (炁) of life and vigor, manifesting as clouds and mist, should be inhaled through the mouth and exhaled as directed. When inhaling and exhaling, ensure that the ears remain closed. If the ears hear, the *Qi* (炁) and *Máng* (芒) will not descend. One must also avoid prolonged inhalation, lest the breathing rhythm be disrupted. The key lies in concentrating one’s thoughts, controlling the *Qi* (炁), and harmonizing with the spirit. Within the dim and distant realms, the inhalation and exhalation will naturally align with the focused mind.

The light of the *Běijí* (北极) Star: This is not the sixth star, *Wǔqū* (武曲), within the *Dòu* (斗) constellation, but rather the *Tiānhuáng* (天皇)’s right *Běijí* (北极) star, *Tiāngǔ* (天枢). The strokes should encircle the seal, with yellow ink upon yellow paper dyed with light *Huáihuā* (槐花) hue.

During meditation, burn the talisman and summon the *Yìlì* (驿吏) to present it before the *Tiāolóng* (茭龙), placing the talisman within their body.

To the right, summon one **Xuan Du** (玄都) **Jiao Long** (交龙) courier official to fast and attend the **Yuan Shi** (元始) **Fu Ming** (符命) *Saviour of Suffering True Talisman*, illuminating and pardoning sins, just as the decree commands.

If the talisman is to be used first, then employ this rightward invocation. If only affixed to the *Guanzi* (关子) seal, no invocation is needed.

The **Xuan Shi** (玄师) says: *"In the **Tai Xuan Du** (泰玄都), there are 250,000 **Jin Long** (金龙) courier officials, overseeing the delivery of talismans and decrees, and conveying messages across the **Mo Tian Dao** (魔天道).*

For all **Longsheng** (长生) *True Talismans of Eternal Life*, one courier is assigned per decree. Write in red ink on blue paper, invoking the **Yu Huang Jue** (玉皇诀), and draw in the *Mang* (芒) of the **Tai Zun** (太尊) Star through the nose. Face south and north, gazing upon the **Tai Zun** Star, which lies within the *Dou Tou* (斗头), below the *Tai Fen* (台分), slightly angled north.

The **Tai Zun** (太尊) has four stars to its north, arrayed like a military well. To its south lies **Shao Wei** (少微), resembling the *Kang Su* (亢宿) constellation. The **Tai Zun** itself is yellow and luminous—know that it lies south of the *Huan Ji* (环玑) and *Er* (二) stars of the **Bei Dou** (北斗).

Write in encircling strokes, then burn and invoke as before. To draw the *Mang* (芒) of the **Tai Zun** and **Bei Ji** (北极) stars, wait until nightfall when the stars are clear, for only then shall their essence be true."

To the right, summon one **Xuan Du** (玄都) **Jin Long** (金龙) courier official to bear the **Yuan Shi Fu Ming** (元始符命) *Eternal Life Spirit Talisman*, to elevate the departed soul of [name], guiding them to the **Nan Gong** (南宫), just as the decree commands.

**Clarification on the Bearer:**
The **Lóngtóng** (龙童, Dragon Boy) is mistakenly depicted as a child, yet the **Lónglì** (龙吏, Dragon Official) resembles a **Lìshì** (力士, Celestial Warrior). As the scriptures state:
*"For those who have passed, if they receive and uphold the **Jīn Luó Bái Jiǎn** (金箓白简, Golden Sutra and White Tablets), the **Jiǔzhēn Miàojiè** (九真妙戒, Nine True Precious Vows), the **Chángshēng Língfú** (长生灵符), the **Jiùkǔ Zhēnfú** (救苦真符), the **Chámìng Tóngzǐ** (察命童子, Inspecting Fate Boy), the **Hùjiè Wēishén** (护戒威神, Venerable Guardian of Vows), the **Wǔdì Zhífú** (五帝直符, Direct Talismans of the Five Emperors), and the **Liùguān Yuànshì** (六官掾史, Six Officials of the Celestial Bureau), they shall naturally follow the tablets and protect those who receive the vows.
Thus, it is known that the **Lóngtóng** (龙童) should not bear the tablets—this is a lost tradition in transmission."*

**Universal Salvation Talismans – The Supreme Sovereign’s *Shēngtiān Bǎojù* (生天宝箓)**
The **Xuan Shi** (玄师) speaks:

Above the Nine Pure Ones stands the **Supreme Great Luo**—the **Yujing Golden Gate**—where the **Alliance of the Perfected** is enshrined in secret within the **Jade Repository**. This is the **Lingbao** method for universally salvaging the netherworld.

Since the **Chiming** opened its diagrams, the **Yuan Shi**—the **Supreme Emperor**—declared the **sacred scriptures of deliverance from suffering and expiation of crimes**, binding with all the Perfected and Saints in a solemn oath: to rescue the afflicted across countless eons. Thus arose the **Alliance of the Perfected**, comprising three grades:
- The **Upper Grade**: the **Shangyuan Golden Sutra** (上元金箓)
- The **Middle Grade**: the **Zhongyuan Jade Sutra** (中元玉箓)
- The **Lower Grade**: the **Xianyuan Yellow Sutra** (下元黄箓)

In summary, the **Lower Grade** is the foundation. The **Supreme Yellow Sutra of the Alliance of the Perfected**, enshrined in the **Jade Repository**, is the **universal salvation of the netherworld**—an **infinite great fast**.

The method of establishing the fast begins with **receiving the petition**, which is to accept the **sincere filial piety and loyal devotion** of the disciple observing the fast. Only if the petitioner is **without private gain** shall they be permitted salvation.

Now, for the **scholar**, I set forth the **ritual standards**—take heed not to recklessly reveal these to the unworthy, lest you **confuse the Three Elements** and incur **unforgivable retribution**. If you encounter the proper person, yet fail to transmit this, **blocking the Dao**, then **heaven’s punishment shall surely follow**. Seek one who embodies **Daoist mien and spiritual essence**, and only then bestow salvation upon them.

In accordance with the Master’s intent: those who **relieve the destitute, save beings of both human and celestial realms, uphold the precepts, and offer to the Three Treasures**—whether as **Three Teachers**, refining the True and nourishing the Spirit, yet whose merit remains insufficient, and who face **impending extinction**—must pass through **Taiyin** before petitioning the **Void Emperor** and submitting to the **Green Palace**. Only then may they **secretly perform deliverance**, invoking the **True Talisman of Rescue from Suffering**.

Externally, **bamboo tablets** are used to craft the **Talisman of Longevity**, petitioning the **Dan Heaven realm** to ascend to the **Imperial Hall of the Simplified** and the **Furnace of Spirit Refinement**. If a tormented soul lacks even a shred of virtue, or has no merit, and belongs to the human or celestial realms, **do not recklessly invoke the Talisman of Rescue from Suffering** or **hastily bestow the Golden Sutra of Refining the True**. Only the **Supreme Sovereign’s *Shēngtiān Bǎojù*** should be employed, allowing them to **behold the divine radiance** and **rebirth into the Yang realm**—thus receiving **ten thousand blessings**.

Therefore, the **Xuan Shi** declares: **unless it is a grand ritual, the Two Tablets shall not descend**. At the **opening of the altar**, before the **Talisman of Longevity** is unveiled, the **Talisman of Rescue from Suffering** must first be invoked, summoning the **Soul-Extracting Deity** to **pay homage in the Three Realms**. When the **merit is complete and virtue fulfilled**, the **Talisman of Longevity** is bestowed, enabling ascent to **Dan Heaven**. Should the **inscriptions or petitions be erroneous**, or the **filings and submissions flawed**, and if the **nether officials** act with **neglect**, failing to comply, the **merit shall vanish**, and the **suffering shall only deepen**. Thus, one must **scrupulously adhere** to these rites, ensuring the **netherworld prospers** and all **partake in the Dao’s grace**.

---
**Ritual Use of the Precious Sutra**
The **Precious Sutra’s Imperial Pardon** is declared to the **Nether Bureau**, releasing **karmic burdens**, a decree from the **Yuche Daojun** (玉宸道君).

To inscribe the **Precious Sutra**, first take **cinnabar**, facing east and **invoking the Qingxuan Emperor**. As per the method, **recite the Qingxuan Sacred Titles**, grinding the cinnabar **eighty-one revolutions clockwise and counterclockwise**, petitioning the **Qi of Qingxuan** to infuse the cinnabar. Then expose it to **sunlight for a day** and **moonlight for a night**, thus receiving the **pure Qi of the sun and moon**—the **refinement of yin and yang**.

When inscribing the Sutra, first recite the *Dùrén Jīng* (**Scripture of Salvation**) **once or ten times**, as the Scripture dictates. Then enter the chamber, **concentrating the spirit to self-refine**, and **long-kneel**, petitioning the **Yuche Emperor**, fully stating the intent. Next, perform **nine prostrations**, visualizing the **Heavenly Gate** opening.

The **Heavenly Gate** is the **triple Golden Gate**, radiant gold, within which lies the **Golden Gate’s Jade Palace**. There, the **Yuche Emperor’s divine form** is seen, with **attendant Perfected** arrayed before Him.

Next, **silently recite the petition**, beseeching the descent of the **Supreme Sovereign’s *Shēngtiān Bǎojù***, then **return to nine prostrations**. After a time, the **Yuche Emperor’s benevolent countenance brightens**, and **Jade Boys and Jade Girls** bear a **Treasure Box** upon **hundred-jewel light**, descending to the case before you. They **open the box**, revealing the **Precious Sutra**, which **merges with the one you have prepared**, its light **wandering endlessly above, boundless and infinite**.

Then, **face south**, silently recite the intent. After a time, perform **nine prostrations**, visualizing the **Six Stars of Nan Dou**, each like the **initial rise of the sun**, descending upon the Sutra and **merging with the six stars within it**. Each star contains **clear, legible characters**, all **translucent and radiant as one**.

Burn incense, **clench the teeth ten times**.

**Incantation:**
*"Greatly moving **dharma-qi**, encircling the Ten Directions.
Within are the **God of Salvation Without Death**, the **Lord of Eternal Life at the South Pole**, the **Great Marshal Who Governs the World**, the **Kindly-Generated Han Jun**, the **Southern Celestial Record-Keeper of Fate**, the **Venerable Who Extends Lifespan and Rectifies Destiny**, the **God Who Rescues and Revives the Corpse**.
**Infinite Salvation of Beings.**
As the **Supreme Emperor’s decree**."*

Upon completing the incantation, **again face the Heavenly Gate** and inscribe the Sutra, visualizing **spiritual officials and attendants** surrounding you—**the Left Hand Supervisor** sealing the decree, the **Right Hand** holding the brush. **Long-kneel**, recite the **Supreme Emperor’s Pardon Incantation fifty times**:

*"Supreme Primordial, Supreme Dao Emperor.
Command your servant to wield the talisman,
Illuminating the **Hell Realms**, freeing the dead souls.
As the **Supreme Emperor’s decree**."*

Take the **Qi from the northwest**, visualizing the **Three Qi** blowing through the brush. Then inscribe the **four characters: 唵吽咤哩 (Om Aṃ Rā Hum)**, counting only the **Jade Taboo** as the incantation, without tallying the strokes. Next, with **one stroke**, **lift upward** to seal the form.

**Incantation:**

*"By decree of the Primordial Origin,
Ascension occurs at every moment.
The departed soul undergoes purification—
Instantly attaining Heaven’s birth.
As swift as the Primordial Supreme’s edict."*

**Again, absorb the *Qi* from the Heavenly Gate through the brush,
utter the incantation,
as the four characters above—
the *Jade Taboo* of the Primordial Origin.
The Primordial Origin is the master of the *Jade Taboo*,
thus invoking its decree.
The departed, receiving this, shall without fail ascend to Heaven—
hence the *Supreme Emperor’s Ascension Sutra*.
The method of **erasing the stars** □
**transports to the Palace of Departure** □.
□
**Named "Sun of the Day"** □.

**The Sovereign of the Fire Emperor** □.
