**Aligning with the Yin-Yang essence** □.
□
**Honored at the Southern Pole** □.
□
**Molding the soul and tempering the spirit—
Dominance over all realms.**
Each station, **six revolutions of the brush**.

Recite: *"The Ministerial Officials, Liang and the Pivot of the Heavenly Axis.*
Absorb the *Qi* of the Southern Dipper.
**Again, incant:**
*Southern Dipper’s Six Truths, traversing the shadowy netherworld.*
By the Emperor’s decree,
Swiftly oversee the living souls.
**Register in the Southern Register—
Instantly return the wandering spirit.**
As swift as the Supreme’s edict."*

**Again, pray with the Sutra:**
*"Supreme Emperor’s Ascension Sutra,
Declared to the Netherworld’s officials,
Rescuing the departed souls,
Granting rebirth according to their merit,
Manifesting in human and celestial forms.
Just as the decree is proclaimed—
Wind and fire relay it instantly.
Once inscribed, hold the Sutra and incense aloft, praying:
*Supreme Dao Emperor,
Rescue and entrust to Kunlun’s peak.
With one stroke of the divine talisman,
Extract the dead souls.*
As swift as the decree."*

**The incantation is not counted by repetitions—
the more, the better.**
Take the *Qi* of the Heavenly Gate’s golden radiance,
**lift the *Jade Taboo* of the Celestial Pure**,
and **deploy the talisman above**.
When lifting the incantation,
**visualize the golden radiance of the Dao**,
bursting forth from the brush itself.

**The Supreme Emperor’s Ascension Sutra disperses its form—
Next, inscribe *Om Aṃ Rā Hum* fourfold,
one character per revolution,
nine revolutions total.**
**Incant:**
*The Primordial’s decree—
Ascension at every moment.
The departed, receiving this,
Instantly attain Heaven’s birth.
As swift as the decree’s command."*

**Again, take the *Qi* from the Heavenly Gate,
layering the inscription sevenfold.**
Recite: *"Beholding the radiant light,
Swiftly ascending to Heaven’s realm.
As swift as the Celestial Sovereign’s salvation."*

**Again, lift the *Ten Directions’ Rescue Suffering Incantation*,
ten revolutions,
ten strokes,
reciting: *Ten Directions’ Rescue Suffering Celestial Sovereign.*
**Then, three revolutions above,
one stroke,
declaring: *The Celestial Pure Emperor’s decree—
With one flash of wisdom-light,
The shadowy prisons fall silent,
Swiftly ascending to Heaven’s realm.*
Once the talisman is inscribed,
**visualize its radiance illuminating Heaven and Earth.**

**Again, recite:**
*The Celestial Pure Emperor’s decree—
With one flash of wisdom-light,
The shadowy prisons fall silent,
Swiftly ascending to Heaven’s realm.
The Celestial Pure Emperor’s decree—
With one flash of wisdom-light,
The shadowy prisons fall silent,
Swiftly ascending to Heaven’s realm.*

**Next, seal the Sutra’s true characters—
again take the golden radiance’s *Qi* to blow upon them,
imagining the Sutra’s surface shimmering with gold,
dazzling and luminous beyond measure,
the departed’s merit and virtue complete in nine out of ten cases.
Even if the ritual’s solemnity is lacking within the heart,
use the **second proclamation text**.
If **universally rescuing the orphans of the Nine Regions**,
stuck in their lingering spirits,
and not granting ascension,
then **the third proclamation text** must be used.
**None shall be interchanged.**
Supreme Primordial, Supreme Emperor’s Ascension Sutra."*

「By imperial decree, investigate the case of [Name] of [State/City/County], [Province], who petitions on behalf of the deceased [Name], born on the [day/month/year/hour] of [birth details], and who passed away on the [day/month/year/hour] of [death details].

We humbly pray that all may comply with the **Supreme Primordial’s Imperial Decree**,
And grant amnesty to the myriad souls within the prisons—
Those who have endured countless eons of **retributive cycles** (lúnhuí bàoduì),
Suffered torments and endured punishments in the **Five Dao and Four Generations** (wǔdào sìshēng),
And all **embodied beings with consciousness** (hánlíng bàoshí),
Including the deceased [Name] and others.

From ancient times to the present day,
All actions of the **Three Karma** (sānyè) and **Six Senses** (liùgēn),
And **evil karma, grudges, and transgressions** (èyè yuānqiàn),
Whether they have **defamed the Dao** (wǔbàng dàodào),
**abandoned truth for falsehood** (bèizhēn jiùwěi),
**harmed or mutilated kin** (shāngcán xiōngdì),
Or **plotted against teachers and masters** (móu jí shīzūn).
Or **violated the bonds of the Six Kinships** (liùqīn tōngtóng),
**Committed lewd acts with relatives** (yínfàn gǔròu).
Or **been bandits and murderers** (jié zéi),
**Slaughtered and harmed living beings** (túgē zhòngshēng),
Or **spared themselves while oppressing others** (zìráo yīshēn).
Or **pretended devotion to the Three Jewels** (fúhào sānbǎo),
**Lacking true commitment in their hearts** (zhíxīn bùzhuān).
Or **disrespected the Dharma** (qīngfǎshī),
**Defiled and mutilated sacred texts** (huìcán língwén).
Or **harbored malevolent thoughts** (xīn huái yīnzéi),
**Endured grudges and jealousies** (ānrěn jídù).
Or **slandered with double tongues** (èkǒu liǎngshé),
**Incited discord among the virtuous** (dòuluàn shànrén).
Or **killed and worshipped obscenely** (shāshēng yínsì),
**Exposed the Three Lights** (luǒlù sānguāng).
Or **engaged in wicked speech and deeds** (xīnshēng kǒuyǔ),
**Whether through their own actions or by teaching others** (zìzuò jiàotā).

All these sins, accumulated over countless eons,
Are either **long-suffered under harsh punishments** (jiǔbèi yánxíng),
Or **have generated good intentions without resolve** (kèshēng shànniàn),
With **no ability to persist in virtue** (wúyì gǔzhōng).
Or **borne of grudges and disputes** (chóuxì bīanzhèng),
**Dragging on for years without pardon** (yíngqiān jiùjí),
Or **having no posthumous commendations** (wúyǒu zhuīshí).

We pray that all these transgressions be **granted amnesty** (yuánxié),
And that each soul be **pardoned and released** (yuánshì).
For those **long detained in the Underworld** (jiǔzhì yīnsī),
**Enduring endless years without respite** (niándài miányuǎn),
Or **yearning for Dao teachings** (xīn sī dàofǎ),
**Begging for liberation** (qǐqià jiětuō),
May they now **escape from the prisons** (chūlí dìyù),
**Behold the light** (shòujiàn guāngmíng),
And have **all their sins cleansed** (wànzuì dàngchú),
**Grudges resolved** (yuānchóu héshì),
**Divine understanding opened** (shén kāi yìjiě),
**Their hearts and bodies at ease** (shēnxīn tàirán),
**Swiftly removed from the ledgers of guilt** (cíjí chuánchú),
**Extirpated of evil roots** (luòmiè ègēn),
**No longer detained** (bùdé jūliú),
**Ascending in rank at every moment** (shíkè shēngqián),
**Each attaining their due station** (gèsuí pǐngé),
**And being reborn in human or celestial realms** (tuōhuà rén tiān).

For those **not exempted by law** (kēlǜ bùgāi),
Or **whose crimes are decreed by Heaven** (shàngtiān zhuān jiàng),
**Forever unpardoned** (yǒngbù yuánxié),
Or **those who shall never be pardoned** (yǒngjié bùyuán),
Or **those who are thrice beaten without pardon** (zhōngliè bùyuán),
Or **those who are doomed for eternity** (zhōngtiān bùyuán),
May they still **receive the Sutra’s amnesty** (lǐjīng yīyuán),
**Have their sins measured and remitted** (liàngxíng chāiyòu),
**And be liberated from retributive cycles** (mièzuì zhuǎnlún).

Furthermore, we pray that all **meritorious deeds and virtues** (dàojiě gōngdé),
And **good actions performed in life and after death** (shēngqián shènghòu),
Be **collected and bestowed** (jǔxíng shōushì).

Thus, even if the deceased [Name] and others
**Have their *Qi* perfected to seven stages** (qīqì chéngzhēn),
**Their Five Elements harmonized in emptiness** (liùyí yùnxū),
**Their Five Spirits severed and extinguished** (wǔlíng xùjué),
**Their Two Brightnesses (sun and moon) exhausted** (èr yào fúkuí),
**Their revolving *Qi* (lúnqì) clinging to the void** (fēnguāng cèkōng),
**Their steps ascending to the Cloud Palaces** (fēibù yún gōng),
**Their embryonic souls taking form** (pēitāi yǒushǐ),
**Their dust-like existence without end** (chénjié wúzhōng),
**Their golden city nurturing their essence** (jīnchéng yùnzhì),
**Their jade cavern congealing their spirits** (yùdòng níngshén),
**Their true *Qi* internally cultivated** (zhēnqì nèiyǎng),
May they **become True Beings** (chéngzhēnrén).

They shall **ascend to the Six Emptinesses** (shàngrù liùxū),
**Descend to the hidden springs of the Underworld** (xiàdòng yōuquán),
**Dwell within the Cloud Palaces and Celestial Gates** (yún gōng bǎojiù),
Where their **true souls abide** (zhēnhún),
**Enter and exit the Land of Blessings** (zhōuxuán shēngmén),
**Feast on the Sacred Mushroom** (jǔzuǒ língzhī),
**Drink from the Golden Springs** (guànshì jīnquán),
**Bask in the Sweet Dew’s flowing streams** (gānlù chuānliú),
**Receive suspended nourishment in their elixir fields** (xuánshì dāntián),
**Bathe in the morning radiance of the Purple Mist** (zǐxiā cháo yìng),
**Their Three *Qi* congealing into mist** (sānyī níngyān),
**Transformed within the Jade Chambers** (qióngshì huàxiān),
**Sitting serenely on the Golden Lotus** (ānzuò jīnlián),
**Their true forms eclipsing the sun** (zhēnyí yǎnrì),
**Their dust-like existence spanning eons** (chénjié wéinián).

**Third Proclamation**
As before.

**Now, the Most High’s Imperial Edict of Salvation and Blessing is bestowed upon the living and ascending to Heavenly Treasures**—
**Edicting the Nine Regions and their Wilds, the Five Paths and Four Births, the wandering souls and lingering spirits.**
From the beginning of the past eon until this very day,
All who have not yet taken rebirth—
**Excluding those who stir up demons, deceive the Dao for private gain, live with a darkened heart, indulge in deceit and licentiousness, betray loyalty and filial piety, squander life and wealth, commit heinous crimes beyond legal measure—**
All other offenses are hereby pardoned.

For those who have long wearied of the netherworld and now harbor virtuous thoughts,
Or who, though mired in delusion, cling to the corpse mound,
Or who have perished by poison, blade, or fire,
Or who have died of famine, pestilence, or wild beasts,
Or who have taken their own lives in childbirth or suicide,
Or who have been tormented by lingering spirits or prolonged cruel punishments,
Yet now bear goodwill, repent their sins, or die without grave transgressions—
Even those burdened by karmic grudges across countless eons,
Whose sufferings words cannot fully recount—
All these souls shall now ascend and be liberated,
Swiftly erased from the register of sins,
Their evil roots extinguished,
No longer detained,
Ascending in rank at every moment,
Escorted by ten thousand spirits to the human and celestial realms,
Receiving transformation according to their merit,
And reborn in blessed lands.
As the proclamation commands,
Transmitted by wind and fire messengers.

**This sacred talisman is sealed and inscribed for delivery to the Eastern Peak, Taishan Palace.**
**The Nine-Dragon Talisman of the Eastern Extremity’s Mysterious Dao**
Follows the Master’s intent:
For all who dwell in mountain forests or cold abodes,
For all impoverished households of the lower earth,
To elevate the lost and refine the urgent—
Whether universally liberating the suffering of the netherworld,
Or elevating the virtuous dead through meritorious deeds,
Or all souls of the Four Births and Five Paths—
They must bear the Nine-Dragon Talisman,
Their hearts aligned with the *Nanchang* Eternal Gold Refining True Scripture,
Upholding the Nine Sacred Precepts of the Primordial Sovereign’s Wisdom,
And dissolving all sins committed thus far.
Thus shall they be inscribed in the Southern Celestial Registry,
Ascend to the ranks of immortals,
Their names removed from the ghostly ledgers,
And only then may the rites be performed.
This is the secret speech of the Celestial Palace,
The Mysterious Master’s compassionate instruction.
If one dismisses these words as false,
They themselves shall become guilty spirits—
How then could they liberate the suffering of the underworld?

Scholars who follow this shall be promoted to the Imperial Hall,
And swiftly attain Truehood.

**The Nine-Dragon Talisman’s Envoys,**
Following the talisman’s decree,
Shall respond to the nine hundred million destitute souls,
All granted rebirth and ascent to the Immortal Palaces.

If the urgent proclamation of the talisman’s assembly is required,
Only the Nine-Dragon True Talisman may be used—
Its mystic resonance unmatched,
Its auspiciousness to be kept secret.

**The proclamation talisman is to be worn; the proclamation text is not.**
Recite the Nine Precepts on the reverse.

Illuminating the darkness below,
Generating the Vermilion Mound above,
Transcending the Three *Yù*,
Facing the Wheel of Rebirth—
As the proclamation commands,
Transmitted by wind and fire messengers.

**To the Ten Directions, Three Realms, and Nine Wilds’ Earthly and Netherworld Officials,**
This talisman is inscribed in vermilion,
The proclamation on yellow silk,
Sealed in a square envelope and round seal,
Also inscribed in vermilion.

Facing east, in a secluded chamber,
Burn incense and kneel in solemn prayer,
Visualizing the Heavenly Sovereign in the Eastern Extremity’s Green Palace,
Within the Hall of a Hundred Treasures and Auspicious Light,
Clad in a crimson-feathered, green-clouded, dragon-patterned robe,
Wearing the Jade-Purity Precious Crown,
With five-colored lions of nine heads bearing a nine-hued lotus seat,
Their mouths spewing flames encircling the Sovereign,
And within the radiance, a nine-colored circular light like a rainbow,
A circular light around the neck like the sun,
A white *usnisha* radiance atop the crown,
Sharp as blades, spears, swords, and halberds.
Beneath the lotus seat are two smaller lotuses,
Upon which the Sovereign stands.
The left hand holds a jade crystal vessel like a bell or tripod,
The right hand grasps a green-feathered branch,
Golden in countenance, jade in form,
Embodiments of compassion and wisdom.

To the left stands the True Person of Great Mercy,
To the right, the True Person of Salvation,
With Vajra Deva-Kings, Heavenly Enforcers, Jade Maidens, and Spirit Officials,
The Eighty-One Divine Generals of the Supreme Unity,
And the Five-Directional Supreme Unity Bureaucrats and Soldiers,
Amidst five-colored clouds.

With clear visualization,
Recite the prayer again in silence,
Then chant the Sovereign’s sacred name eighty-one times,
Invoking the Sovereign’s command to the Right Attendant, the True Person of Salvation,
To open the *Zixiang* Nine-Light Treasure and bestow it upon me.

The Nine-Dragon Envoys, in order—
I receive the talisman with nine bows,
And the Sovereign showers nectar upon the Ten Directions.

After a time, the heavens and earth shine with a hundred treasures,
And suddenly, all is unknown.

I take the cinnabar brush,
Again chant the Sovereign’s august name nine times,
Drawing the talisman with *qi* from the East,
Then chant nine times more,
Drawing the *Yuqing* Decalogue with *qi*,
And beneath the Sovereign’s sacred seat,
Inscribe the talisman to break the Underworld’s gates—
Or, if not, it may be omitted.

After chanting the Ten Directions’ Sovereign names ninety times,
I gather *qi* from the Ten Directions to inscribe.

Next, the **True Person of Salvation** is invoked nine times,
Taking *qi* from the East to inscribe the talisman,
And reciting the *Yuqing* Decalogue.

Before the **Three Treasures**, the invocation is completed,
Then burned in the **Fiery Flame**.

The Nine-Dragon Envoys are invoked,
And the talisman is recited as commanded.

The **Nine Precepts of the Void Sovereign**—
The **Sovereign’s Disciple** declares:
*"I have received the Nine-Dragon True Talisman Precepts,
And now with a focused mind,
I reflect upon the **Zixiang Nine-Light Golden Talismans** from the South Star,
Also called the **Elixir of Longevity Talisman**—
The loftiest of sacred decrees,
The **Zixiang Nine-Light Treasure** itself.*

The **Celestial Refining Tablet** is inscribed in **Vermilion Heaven**,
With **Bright Mist** forming its essence,
Divine radiance descending,
Invoking the **Celestial Glow**,
Refining the **Crimson Heart**,
Nurturing the **Red Child**.

The recipient shall take the **Moon-Yang Odd Days**,
Preparing **Azure Silk** nine inches long,
Two and a half inches wide,
And inscribe the talisman upon it.
The talisman shall be **eightfold**,
Enclosed in a **scarlet pouch** of one inch,
Suspended over the **True Heart**.

Each day, after burning incense,
Exit the door facing east.
If obscured by clouds or rain,
Retire to a quiet chamber,
Concentrating the mind in emptiness,
Facing the **Round Net**,
Drawing in the **Crimson Mist**,
Penetrating the **True Heart** from head to foot,
So that the **Three Palaces** remain free of dust.

After meditating deeply,
Knock the teeth three times,
Swallow saliva three times,
And softly chant the incantation:

*"The Bureau of Records takes charge of refining,
The Minister of Fire governs the **Nine Palaces**.
The **Heavenly Butcher** presides,
Piercing the **Flame’s Radiance**.
The **Pivot Mechanism** aids and assists,
Stars arrayed in **Mysterious Scriptures**.
The **Great Brightness** nurtures the essence,
The **Red Chariot** ascends the **Sharp Peak**.
The **Divine Treasury** is refined,
Both exterior and interior flourish."*

Knock the teeth three times more,
Swallow saliva three times,
And cease.

Practice this for three years.
Later, when applying the **Upper Dao methods**,
One may gaze without obstruction,
Command the winds and storms,
Ascend the **Tilted Radiance**,
Flow through the **Purple Void**,
Turn toward the **High Purity**,
And walk the **Jade Capital**.

The decree states:
*"Moon-Yang refers to the six Yang months,
Odd Days to the **Yang Days of the Six Heavenly Stems**.
Later application refers to the **Upper Dao methods**.
It is not until three years of practice
That one may begin to wear the talisman and salute the **Pivot Mechanism**.
Burning incense and exiting the door
Refers to stepping beyond the courtyard gate,
Not to be confused with the **True Person’s Ritual** of exiting the **Perseus Gate**.
Azure Silk is bright and pure,
Not to be mistaken for white as the ‘plain’.
As the **Dao** says, ‘Crimson, Azure, and Scarlet’ are the **Three Pure Ones**."*

The decree further states:
*"One should inscribe the Nine-Dragon Talisman on the back,
And the **Nine True Precepts** upon it.
Use **Azure Brocade** as the pouch to wear,
And **Vermilion Brocade** as the outer pouch,
Wearing the **Elixir of Longevity Talisman** at the **Divine Treasury**.
Then burn the **True Talisman of Salvation**,
To redeem the **Lower Element’s** suffering souls,
And grant them eternal **Blessings and Longevity**.*

This is also said:
*"If one in a past life established the **Nine-Yin Great Fast**,
Received the **Nine True Precepts** inscribed on golden talismans,
Marked their name in the **Golden Register**,
And listed their character in the **Jade Decalogue**,
With virtue heavy and deeds lofty,
Their name shall be recorded by the **Ten-Directional Sovereigns of Salvation** across the **Heavenly Realm**.
With divine power,
I invoke salvation at will,
Receive their merit,
And rescue them from calamity—
A divine power beyond measure.*

*"I shall dissolve the **Nine-Yin Great Offenses**,
Marked in the **Nine Palaces Register**.
Thus shall the **Inspecting Fate Child**,
The **Guardian of Precepts and Warnings**,
The **Direct Talismans of the Five Emperors**,
And the **Six Palaces’ Officers and Clerks**
Follow the talisman’s script,
And shield the disciple who practices and receives.
Through the **Wheel of Causes and Conditions**,
One shall become a **True Person of the Nine Palaces**."*

The **Nine True Precepts inscribed on golden talismans** are most solemn.
If practiced correctly,
The blessings are boundless,
And the wearer shall receive **Nine Kinds of Blessings**:

1. If a land faces **endless war and calamity**,
   And the disciple invokes in accordance with the method,
   Then **weapons shall cease**,
   And the land shall be **greatly pacified**.

2. If a land suffers **plague and pestilence**,
   Causing the deaths of many,
   And the disciple invokes in accordance with the method,
   Then **evil spirits shall be repelled**,
   And both **heavens and humans** shall rejoice.

3. If entering **mountains and forests**,
   And **ferocious beasts**—tigers and wolves—
   Approach to attack,
   The disciple invokes in accordance with the method,
   Then the beasts shall **retreat in terror**,
   And never harm the disciple again.

4. If crossing **vast seas**,
   And encountering **great malevolent winds**,
   The disciple invokes in accordance with the method,
   Then the **waves shall calm**,
   And they shall safely reach the shore.

5. If caught in **battlefields amid blades**,
   The disciple invokes in accordance with the method,
   Then the **weapons shall still**,
   And no harm shall come.

6. If imprisoned in **stocks and chains**,
   The disciple invokes in accordance with the method,
   Then **wrongs shall be righted**,
   And they shall be **freed without fail**.

7. If tormented by **malevolent spirits and demons**,
   The disciple invokes in accordance with the method,
   Then the **spirits and demons shall vanish**,
   And the disciple shall be **healed**.

8. If one’s name is inscribed in the **Black Register**,
   And their soul descends to the **Nine-Yin Underworld**,
   Then by establishing a **Great Fast**,
   Their name shall be inscribed in the **Jade Tablet**,
   And by receiving the **Nine Precepts**,
   The **Black Ledger** shall be erased,
   All offenses dissolved,
   Their soul ascending to the **Upper Heavens**.

9. If one in a past life established the **Nine-Yin Great Fast**,
   Received the **Yellow Talismans and White Tablets**,
   The **Nine True Precepts**,
   And the **Elixir of Longevity Talisman**,
   They shall become a **Ten-Directional Sovereign of Salvation** across the **Three Realms**,
   Invoking salvation at will,
   And severing all **evil roots**.*

These **Nine Kinds of Blessings** are beyond reckoning.

If one harbors **doubt or blasphemy**,
They shall fall into the **Nine-Yin Underworld**,
And endure **endless suffering**,
A night without respite,
From which there is no escape.

If one initially receives with faith,
But later grows **arrogant**,
The **Jade Tablet** shall be erased,
Their name registered in the **Ledger of Death**,
And they shall meet **worldly evil diseases**,
Long descending into **evil destinies**,
Losing the **True Dao** forever,
With no chance for repentance.

At the outset of the **Fast’s establishment**,
One must measure their sincerity—
If their mind is entangled in **worldly affairs**,
And they cannot wholeheartedly receive and uphold,
Then after the fast concludes,
They shall return the **Jade Decalogue** to its treasure chest,
And the talisman to its sacred repository,
Expressing gratitude to the **Three Treasures**,
And still gain **later blessings**.

If one wears and upholds the talisman **for life**,
They shall surely **break the bonds of fate** and **ascend in flight**,
Their name inscribed in the **Purple Decree**,
And they shall be **transferred to the Southern Palace**.

The **Nine-Dragon Talisman of the Eastern Hua, Azure Palace**—
Invocation and talisman decree:

*"The **True Essence** unites with the **Sacred Assembly**,
The **Treasure Edict** commands all spirits.
The **Six Heavens** stack in darkness,
The **Nine-Yin Underworld** and its prisons.
The **Bureau of Records** in the **Gloomy Void**,
The **Three Officials** holding the **Nine Palaces**.
The **Divine Officials and Soldiers**,
All who govern the prisons.
Redeeming souls of **meritorious deeds**,
Freeing them from the **Three Torments’ suffering**.
The **Nine-Dragon Talisman of the Eastern Palace**,
Illuminating and breaking all **earthly prisons**.
The **Incense Furnace’s coals** bloom **Azure Lotuses**,
The **Blades of Judgment** become **Bamboo Groves**."*

The **True Essence’s Authentic Talisman for Breaking Earthly Prisons**—

Face north and kneel in reverence,
Burn incense and recite as prescribed.

The incantation reads:

*"The Most Venerable Divine Sage,
Already perfected in celestial truth.
Descendant of the Primordial Sovereign,
Progeny of the Most High.
Countless ancestors, past and present,
Liberate suffering souls in the dark abyss.
The Heavenly Lord’s Great Dao,
Turns the Wheel of Return tenfold.
The Red Script is inscribed,
Declaring to the netherworld’s depths.
The Jade Writing descends—
Crashing the iron fortress.
The talisman’s radiance pierces through,
Illuminating the layered shadows.
Blades transmute into jade groves,
Swords become bamboo forests.
Fiery flames birth lotuses,
Ice melts from snowy gates.
The Three Torments and Five Sufferings,
All Eight Hardships transcended.
Dark kings and infernal officials,
Prostrate in homage, escorting the departed.
The Jade Essence’s Primordial Mandate,
As prescribed, is now fulfilled.
Recite the incantation once,
Draw **qi** from the northwest,
Blow with the brush to inscribe the talisman.
Complete, then recite again—
Draw **qi** from the eastern quarter’s vitality,
Apply it to the talisman.
Recite once more—
Draw **qi** from the southern quarter’s vitality,
Apply it to the talisman.
When the talisman glows with ten thousand zhang of golden light,
Outshining the sun,
Recite its power before the **Three Jewels**,
Then consume it in fierce flames.
The **Grand Secretariat of the Auspicious Mysteries**,
Complies and honors."*

**Jade Essence’s Talisman for Extraction of Netherworld Spirits:**
Write the talisman,
Facing the northwest, kneeling in length,
Burning incense,
Commencing the incantation as per ritual.

To the **Three Heavenly Realms** [9] and Highest Jade Essence,
To the **Primordial Origin’s Sacred Scriptures**,
To the **Great Unity’s True Texts**.

By the **Primordial Dao’s Great Way**,
Decreed to descend upon **Yuchen** [10].
The **True Essence of the Celestial Caverns**,
Leads and governs the spirits of the departed.
The **Nine Abyssal Lords**,
The **Six Cavernous True Spirits**.

Accepting the True Talisman,
Extracting and liberating the netherworld spirits.
By the **Heavenly Kings’ Statutes**,
Swiftly executed by the **Yin Officials**.

Recite once,
Taking the **qi** of the northwest and blowing it upon the brush,

**Exposition of the True Symbol for Rescuing Lost Souls and Shattering the Netherworld**

As the *Yijing* states:
*"Essence and qi form matter; wandering souls bring transformation.*
The essence, when stagnant, becomes the lingering trace;
contained within qi and soul, all are sentient beings.
Blood and qi, rooted in the center, transform—this is called **divine mechanism** (*shenji*), sharing the same primordial qi as the Emperor’s first breath, unaffected by the changes of Heaven and Earth.

Those who grasp this **Dao** command the cosmos, giving birth to all transformations within themselves, observing Heaven’s laws. When intent moves, transformation follows—thus they endure alongside Heaven and Earth’s vast cataclysms. Those who lose this **Dao** see their spirit depart, their mechanism cease; this is called a **wandering soul**, subject to the shifts of yin and yang, bound by the molding of creation and destruction. Thus, those who emerge from death into life, transforming without limit, are beings with blood, qi, essence, and soul—endowed with innate awareness.

Therefore, with good and evil deeds, their fate is sealed within the **Netherworld’s creative mechanism**; thus, they undergo transformation in accordance with their karma. When good predominates, they belong to **yang** and ascend to the **auspicious path**. When evil prevails, they descend into **inauspicious fate**. If good is abundant and yang flourishes, they become **immortals**; if evil is rampant and yin dominates, they become **ghosts**. Pure good, without a trace of yin, makes them **transcendents**; a balance of yin and yang makes them **humans**. Pure evil, devoid of yang, plunges them into the **deepest abysses**. A hint of good remains, and the **yang-fire’s dry transformation** lifts them as birds. Heavy yin and lingering evil sink them into **water’s descent**, becoming beasts.

If evil deeds overflow and mingle with **malevolent qi**, their souls and essences scatter into the **damp transformations**. The calamity of evil is the destruction of form. Thus, the Six Paths of ascent and descent, the cycles of rebirth, all stem from self-made fate.

Grass and trees, though alive, lack awareness; their karma follows the shifts of Heaven and Earth’s four seasons, receiving essence and qi from yin and yang, without the rise and fall of wandering souls. Hence, the **Sage of Old** took pity, sharing the same primordial qi as the fallen, and lamented the wandering souls’ transformations across disparate realms. With **pure yang and benevolent qi**, he forged the **symbols and registers**, rescuing yin-bound, malevolent souls to ascend to the **auspicious path**.

Thus, the **starry constellations of dragons and phoenixes**, the **cloud-and-mist fire-haze scripts**, manifest in Heaven as forms; the **insects, fish, plants, and beasts’ talismans**, the **serpents, worms, and human seals**, take shape on Earth. Within lies the **hidden divine mechanism**, aligning with **spiritual transformations**—these are called **symbols**. Gathering **wondrous qi** in silent accord with the **Sage’s pivot**—these are called **registers**. All are the **Sage’s true models**, the **norms for the living and the dead**, passed down through ages to universally rescue the boundless.

This **Jade Purity’s Sacred Register – True Symbol for Rescuing Lost Souls** is also called the **Soul-Calling Symbol**.

The **Playchen Master** says:
*The **Jade Purity’s Sacred Register – Elemental Beginning’s威章** emerges from the **Nine-Luminous Purple Yang Jade Register**. The **Numenous Treasure’s Universal Rescue Sacred Script** is the **Netherworld’s binding contract**, the **Netherworld Officials’ assembly decree**.

*"Three Heavenly Realms, Grand Luo—*
*(as before)*

If summoning a soul, first write beneath the symbol:
*"Ten Categories of Masterless Wandering Souls and Lingering Essences."*
If it is a departed soul, first write *"Deceased Certain"* (*wang guo mou*), then the **imperial decree characters**. Upon completion, preserve the **Elemental Beginning’s original black qi**, blowing it into the characters. Recite the incantation again, and blow **south’s purple qi** once over the symbol, ensuring it radiates with **ten thousand *zhang* of golden light**, dazzling like the sun. Proclaim it before the **Three Treasures**, then burn it in fierce flames.

This symbol is proclaimed to the **Ten Directions, Three Realms, the Boundless Spirit Homeland, the Spring Curves’ Domain, the Northern Capital of Luo and Tang**, the **Three Officials and Nine Departments**, and the **Twelve River Sources**.

It releases the **soul of the Deceased Certain** and all **Six Paths’ Four Generations’ wandering souls and lingering essences**, the **kalpa-bound guilty souls**, swiftly erasing their offense ledgers, dissolving their evil roots, preventing their detention, and commanding their immediate ascent. All spirits escort them directly to **Human-Heaven**, where they are reborn in **Blessed Realms** as decreed, conveyed by **wind and fire couriers**.

**The Method of Summoning and Rescuing Departed Souls**

The Imperial Sage declares: The method of summoning and rescuing departed souls relies entirely on advance notification of transfer and elevation through the *Zhū Zhāng* (朱章), the *Jiùkǔ Fú* (救苦符) and ritual procedures. One month, half a month, or seven days before the ritual fast, select an auspicious site to erect the altar. Bind two *Jiāolóng Yìshì* (茭龙驿吏) with reeds, each holding a sword in their left hand and a banner in their right. On the banner, inscribe *Yùhuáng Shèzuì Tiānzūn* (玉皇赦罪天尊). They shall bear the *Qīng Xuàn Jiùkǔ Zhēnzhù* (青玄救苦真箓) on their backs. Alongside the *Jīnlóng Yìshì* (金龙驿吏) and the *Huángzhù Yuàn Gōngcáo Fúshì* (黄箓院功曹符吏), they shall proceed directly to the *Sānguān Tiān Láo* (三官天牢), the *Wǔdǒu Tiān Yī Běiyù* (五斗天一北狱), the *Tīngdū Chóngláo Yōuguàn* (酆都重牢幽槛), the *Tiěwéi Wújiān Dìyù* (铁围无间地狱), and other such places to rescue and elevate the departed souls, bringing them to the ritual altar.

The *Jiāolóng Yìshì*, alongside the *Dìdào Gōngcáo Fúshì* (地道功曹符吏), shall proceed to the *Wǔyuè Jiǔyōu* (五岳九幽), the *Shuǐfǔ Léitíng* (水府雷霆), the *Wēn Sī Shénmiào* (瘟司神庙), and the *Shè Lìng Láo Bì* (社令牢狴) to rescue and elevate the departed souls, bringing them to the altar.

The *Fúmìng* (符命) and the *Zhǔzhāng* for elevation shall be issued together with the *Shèzuì Wén* (赦文). First, command the *Yōuyīn* (幽阴) to absolve sins and release the departed, sending them to the *Chénghuáng Shì* (城隍司) to await summons and elevation. If practitioners do not first absolve and pardon, but instead pursue elevation at the last moment, the effect will be difficult to manifest.

For the *Jiùkǔ Fúmìng* is not the same as the *Huángzhù Bái Jiǎn* (黄箓白简) talismans. Within this method lies the *Qīng Xuàn Jiùkǔ Pò Tīngdū Zhù* (青玄救苦破酆都之箓), which must be carefully followed.

**The Standard for the *Qīng Xuàn Jiùkǔ Bǎozhù* (青玄救苦宝箓)**

The Imperial Sage declares: The *Qīng Xuàn Jiùkǔ Zhù* (青玄救苦箓) is the true-form talisman of the *Tàitiān Zūn* (太一天尊). Use three sheets of green paper, inscribed with cinnabar. On the first, write: *"Dōngjí Qīng Xuàn Jiǔlóng Jiùkǔ Zhēnzhù"* (东极青玄九龙救苦真箓). Below, inscribe the *Tiānshū Fúwén* (天书符文), then the *Tiānzūn Zhēnxíng Zhù* (天尊真形之符). Next, write the *Báyōuhún Pò Dìyù Zhēnfú* (拔幽魂破地狱真符), followed by the *Xiáowén* (檄文) at the end. In order, record the year, month, day, hour, and the *Xuántiānshī* (玄天师) title. Seal it in a square box with multiple layers and affix the seal. Entrust it to the *Jiāolóng Yìshì*.

Additionally, use three sheets of yellow paper, inscribed with cinnabar. On the first, write: *"Nánchāng Zǐwēi Liújīn Liànzhēn Zhù"* (南昌紫微流金炼真箓). Below, inscribe the *Tiānshū Fúwén*, then the *Tiānzūn Zhēnxíng Zhù*. Next, write the *Jīnyè Liànxíng Jiǔtiān Léiwén* (金液炼形九天雷文), the *Hán Jūn Zhēnzhù* (韩君真箓), the *Chāoshēng Jīnzhù* (超生金箓), and append the *Xiáowén* at the end. In order, record the year, month, day, hour, and the *Xuántiānshī* title.

When burning the talisman, assume the form of the *Jiùkǔ Tiānzūn* (救苦天尊), press the middle joint of your middle finger to your *Dīnggāng* (丁罡) facing east, strike your teeth nine times, and recite the incantation while burning it.

**Incantation:**
*"Qīng Xuàn Tiānzūn, chìfú jiùkǔ.
Dùtuō yōumíng, jiùqiān guǐhù.
Suíyuàn shēngtiān, bìng wú zǎngzú.
Língbǎo lǜlìng, kāiguān dìfǔ.
Bùxǔ jīliú, nìmìng zúi nǐ.
Óng chén hōng mǎo bǎo zǐ lí shēn tíng zǐ lǐ sì zhōng dā wèi hài."*
(*破箓都二十四狱元始威章*)

**The *Tàitiān Zūn Zhēnxíng Fú* (太一天尊真形符), also named the *Qīng Xuàn Tiānzūn Jiùkǔ Pò Tīngdū Zhù* (青玄天尊救苦破酆都箓).**

The Imperial Sage declares: This is the *Yùqīng Bǎoguāng Fán Zhēnyuánshǐ Wēizhāng Zhù* (玉清宝光梵真元始威章), derived from the *Jiǔguāng Zǐyáng Zhè* (九光紫阳之册), a scripture of *Língbǎo Chāodù* (灵宝超度) and a contract for *Yīncáo Héfú* (阴曹合符). When the officials of the Netherworld behold it, it shall be as if the Emperor’s decree has been fulfilled.

Use yellow paper inscribed with cinnabar, facing northwest in a long kneeling posture, and recite the *Shàngdì Jué* (上帝诀). If this talisman is to break the prisons, write the names of the prisons below in advance—using cinnabar on sunny days and ink on cloudy days, regardless of quantity.

When breaking the prison, the master shall hold the talisman to their chest. After the *Chànzhòu Pǔluò Dēng* (忏祝普掠灯), recite the *Língbǎo Jué* (灵宝诀) silently and chant the *Huàxíng Zhòu* (化形咒) once. Together with the talisman, burn it within the prison during the *Pǔluò* (普掠).

Then, mentally command: *"Hūn chìlǐ, jiàn guāngmíng sānbiàn, míngmù cún dēngguāng chéng bǎibǎo xiángguāng, shàngdá jiǔxiāo, xiàdá jiǔdì."* Visualize the talisman transforming into the *Wúliàng Tiānzūn* (无量天尊), traversing all prisons, absolving all guilty spirits.

**The *Huàxíng Zhòu* (化形咒):**
*"Wú shī Tiānzhōng Jiùkǔ Zūn,
Cháng shàn huàxíng shífāng jiè.
Yǐ cǐ wēishén chéng dàbēi,
Jì bǐ zhòngshēng wúliàng kǔ.
Jiǔyè chónghūn yōu’àn fǔ,
Pǔlìng lǎngzhào shēng guāngmíng.
Niútóu Yuèzú jǐn shēngxiān,
Yīqiè zuìhún gōng jiěshì.
Sān tú wǔkǔ zhū qiúsī,
Kǎoduì tíngxián shàng zǐqīng.
Jiànwén yǒuzhì jí yǒuqíng,
Gǎn cǐ jiē chéng wúshàng dào."*

**Completion of the *Jade Treasury of Boundless Salvation* Supreme Scripture, Volume 57**
**Secret Precepts for Refining and Liberating**

The **Mysterious Master** says:
*"Of old, the **Supreme Sovereign** pitied the souls of the lower realms, confined and tormented in the northern **Minghai Sea**, the **Qu Curve’s Domain**, and the **Nine Abysses of Eternal Night**. There was no means for them to transcend.*

Thus, the **Scriptures** were proclaimed to liberate all beings. The **Nine-Petal True Person** was appointed to the **Upper Hall of Nanchang**, overseeing the **hosts of the departed** in the **Nine Abysses**. There was also the **Nanchang Lord of Degrees**, who refined and liberated the dead.

Within was the **Court of Flowing Fire**, its blazing radiance illuminating the eight directions. The **essence of Flowing Fire**, when applied to the body, made it glow like jade—clear as the pupil. The **Southern Polarity True Person** also presided in the hall, attending to all **aspirants** whose **Dao/Way** was incomplete. They were summoned to the **Flowing Fire Court**, where the **Southern Polarity True Person** refined them with **fire essence** and **lunar yellow qi**, washing away filth so they might consort with the **True Persons**.

For those whose **living forms** were being refined, their **souls and spirits** ascended directly to the **Southern Hall**, undergoing purification in the **Flowing Fire Court**. According to their **depth of cultivation** and **duration of practice**, when the allotted time was complete, they were reborn—though years might pass like a single sleep, unnoticed. From then on, they were destined for **immortality**.

The **sacred youth** of the **Fire Pool** was named **Poni**. Each time the **aeon** turned, he would gather the **multitudes of Tuqiu**, measuring their deeds to elevate them to the **Vermilion Mound Palace**, where they became **blessed officials**—no small merit.

When **Red Clarity** opened the **aeon**, the **Primordial Origin** bestowed the title of **Brahman Liberator King**. The **Supreme Non-Being True Person** then resided in the **King’s Palace**, liberating the **souls of eternal night**, dispatching them to the **Upper Hall of Nanchang**.

The **officials and attendants of the Vermilion Mound Fire Realm**, bearing **various seals**, descended to the mortal world, transmitting these methods to **worthy disciples** to act on Heaven’s behalf, rescuing those in the **Netherworld**.

Those who received this **Law** supplemented the **refining officials of the Nanchang Upper Hall**, also overseeing the **Yellow Edict Bureau**. This is the **refinement of spirit by spirit, of qi by soul**. All who practice this **Great Law** vow that on the **Three Pure Ones’ Day**, they will establish the hall to refine and liberate, so that **all souls of the Five Paths and Four Births**, stagnant in the **Three Realms of Suffering**, may transcend and be reborn in the **Heavens of Blessed Beings**, perpetuating their **meritorious deeds**.

**Unrefined souls**, before undergoing purification, are no taller than three *chi*, **limping, lame, or deformed**, their forms incomplete and stained with guilt. Only after refinement do they regain their **full shape**, their **filth dispersed**, their **grievances resolved**, and their **bodies radiant**.

When the refinement is complete, **burn the scriptures, offerings, treasures, talismans, and edicts**, entrusting them to the **soul**. The **Celestial Dao Functionary** carries the **official documents**, delivering them to the **Yellow Edict Bureau** for verification. The **three-lifetimes’ records of guilt** are examined, and all **false accusations against Heaven, slander of Earth, disloyalty as subjects, unfiliality as children, harm to living beings, and robbery of the virtuous** are expunged. The rest are judged according to their **karma**, swiftly granted rebirth, and spared further stagnation—thus fulfilling the **Supreme Sovereign’s benevolence toward life**.

**Secret Precepts of the Primordial Jade Treasury for Natural Nine-Heaven Transformation and Refining the Netherworld**

**Light incense, face east, and perform nine prostrations**, declaring the **ritual intent**.

Perform **nine more prostrations**, then sit upright, **regulating the spirit and harmonizing the qi**. Recite the **Precious Chapter of the Living Spirit** nine times. With each recitation, **draw in a breath of qi**, directing it straight to the **elixir field**.

Then **cultivate the Nine Qi**, circulating them through the body. In the **water palace within the body**, gather the **light of the Nine Qi** into a **childlike form** resembling yourself. The child faces outward, seated firmly, its light enveloping heaven and earth. The **form and spirit radiate brilliance**, and in moments, the **five zang-organs’ five-colored qi** rise like clouds from below.

Next, **carry the child** along the **double spinal pathway** into the **cinnabar field**, transforming it into a **rice-grain-sized precious pearl**. The child becomes the **Primordial Origin**, and the **five zang-organs’ cloud-like qi** become the **Lion**.

The **Primordial Origin** then **sits in meditation within the pearl**, atop the **five-colored Lion**, emitting **hundreds of millions of billions of radiant light**, illuminating all **heavens and earths**, penetrating their depths.

Next, **visualize the Thirty-Two Heavens’ myriad saints and true ones** ascending from the void, all entering the **precious pearl**. Before the **Primordial Emperor**, they kneel in reverence, as if listening to the **Law**.

When the assembly is complete, the **Primordial Origin** suddenly emits a **white hair auspicious light** from between the brows, descending to illuminate the **Nine Abysses of Yin-Du**, shining from the **cinnabar field** down to below the **navel**.

Within each light, a **precious pearl** appears. Within each pearl, the **Thirty-Two Heavens** and **myriad saints and true ones** accompany the **Primordial Origin**, identical to the first pearl.

Within each light, the **Saviour of Suffering** appears. Following the light into the **Nine Hells**, wherever the **Heavenly Lord’s power** reaches, the **sunlight** instantly shatters the **darkness**, dissolving the **heavily veiled**, transforming them into **pure lands**.

「Next, the two kidneys are preserved as the gates of the **Yin-Du Palace** (*酆都宫*), causing all the **Nine Hells** (*九幽诸狱*) to open. From the inner kidneys downward—what are called the **stomach and intestines** (*大小肠胃*)—are all abyssal and veiled, where **True Yang** (*真阳*) does not reach, and thus are the **Hells**.

Once the prison gates open, the **Northern Emperor** (*北帝*) and the myriad **Yin officials and jailers** (*诸冥官狱吏*) assemble in ranks outside the palace gates, behind the **Yin-Du Water Bureau** (*酆都水府*), before the **lumbar vertebrae and spine** (*腰脊骨*).

After the assembly concludes, the **Ten Directions’ Flying Celestial Kings** (*十方飞天神王*) arrive in chariots, with **Golden Boys** (*金童*) as attendants at their sides, holding the **Primordial Origin’s talismans and decrees** (*元始符命*). Facing the Emperor, they receive the **Dao’s edict** (*道旨*), then descend upon the light, entering the **Yin-Du Hells** to address all **guilty souls** (*罪魂*), granting them universal pardon—whereupon they exit the prisons and gather before the **Yin-Du Palace**.

Next, the **Flower Pool** (*华池*) is preserved as the **Forest of Retribution and Purification** (*森罗浄霐*).

Next, the **precious pearls** (*宝珠*) are preserved, and the **myriad saints and true ones** (*千真万圣*) recite in unison the **Heavenly River Sutra of the Eastern Well** (*天河灌东井咒*).

Next, the **Primordial Origin Emperor** (*元始上帝*) commands the **Red Dragon** (*赤龙*) to beat its drum, stirring the waves of the **Spiritual Pool** (*灵池*), causing the waters to cascade down like a waterfall into the **Eastern Well** (*东井*).

Swiftly, the **tongue** is preserved as the **Red Dragon**, churning the **Flower Pool** until the **divine waters** overflow. The dragon then looks left toward the throat and plunges straight into the **Water Bureau** before the palace.

This is the **Heavenly River**.

Next, the **boundless ocean before the Water Bureau** (*水府前大海*), without measure or edge, is preserved. All guilty souls enter to bathe, enveloped by auspicious winds and harmonious *qi*, warm as spring. The waters permeate their four limbs, and none fail to rejoice, instantly abandoning greed and anger, turning their hearts toward the **Dao**.

After bathing, the **Primordial Origin Emperor** decrees that the **Golden Boys and Jade Girls** (*金童玉女*) each carry **pure garments** (*浄衣*), countless in number, to bestow upon the guilty souls. Once they are clothed,

the **myriad saints and true ones** within the **precious pearls** chant in unison the **Great Sutra of the Saviour of Suffering** in **Mahābrahmā language** (*救苦经大梵语*).

Next, the **Supreme Unity Saviour of Suffering** (*太一救苦天尊*) and the **Ten Directions’ Saviour of Suffering** (*十方救苦天尊*) descend upon the **auspicious clouds** (*步景云*), reciting the sutra as they sprinkle the souls with **Nectar Law Water** (*甘露法水*), granting them instant **coolness of body and mind** (*身心清凉*) and **unblocked throat** (*咽喉开泰*).

The **Ten Directions’ Celestial Lords** each hold **golden basins and jade ladles** (*金盂玉匙*), filled with **Nectar Jade Ointment** (*甘露玉膏*), scattering and feeding the souls from the **void of emptiness** (*玄空*), offering them **sacred sustenance** (*法食*). All are sated to fullness.

**The Chapter on Living-Body Transcendence**

The Master said: The **Five Refining Methods of the Soul Treasure for Living-Body Transcendence** (*灵宝五炼生身受度*) are named the **Return-to-Truth Cavern-Mystery Jade-Marrow Supreme Secret Essentials** (*返真洞玄玉髓无上秘要*).

In ancient times, the **Soul Treasure Heavenly Lord** received the **secret precepts** from the **Primordial Heavenly Lord**, who entrusted them to the **Purple Palace Supreme One of the Nine Darknesses and Nine-Hua True Person** (*太一紫府太阴九华真人*), who then transmitted them to the **Southern Palace Soul-Commanding Lord** (*南昌度命君主*).

This doctrine originates from the **Great Possessing Palace** (*大有之宫*), where **gold is refined into script** and **jade is carved into volumes**, attended by **spirit-children** and **celestial consorts**. It governs the **stabilization of heaven and earth**, the **regulation of sun, moon, and stars**, and the **nurturing of all things**. It is the **ultimate source of all Dao**, the most **supreme and exalted**.

At the dawn of **Red Clarity** (*赤明*), the **Most High** observed how all beings suffered through **three karmas and six passions**, dying and falling into hells, sinking for **ten thousand kalpas** without hope of transcendence—**deeply lamentable**. Thus, the **Southern Pole Soul-Commanding Lord** was commanded to receive the **mysterious scriptures** and refine the **living body**, so that **guilt and obstacles would be purged**, and at the end of a hundred years, they would **not be seized by the underworld officials**, their bodies **emanating jade-light**, and they would **consort with True Persons**.

Thus, **Living-Body Transcendence** ensures **eternal existence across kalpas**, **cycling with the cosmic wheel**, and **equaling the lifespan of heaven**. Through **lingering transmission** from the **Lingering Case Jade Classics**, this doctrine gradually emerged among mortals—**ever more profound, ever more boundless**, known as **"transcending all, accomplishing all"**—how could it be called a **minor remedy**?

Those who practice this **Soul Treasure Great Method** must **neither harbor jealousy nor resentment**, treating all with **equal compassion and love**, regarding **differences as kin**. Their **Dao shall surely succeed**.

If one **violates these precepts**, calamity will befall the **seven ancestral generations**. **Beware! Beware!** Thus concludes the **Fifty-Eighth Volume of the Supreme Scripture of Boundless Soul-Transcendence**.

**Ritual Platform Construction**

**Method for Establishing the Platform**
Strike the teeth three times, then focus the spirit as the **Red Clarity Harmonious Yang Heavenly Sovereign**. Press the middle finger to the middle of the palm, recite the **Pure Heaven-Earth Spell**, and draw **qi from the southeast**.

Recite the spell:
*"Mixed and boundless, the crimson scripture—
No peer, the Most High True One.
From the Primordial Ancestor’s kalpa,
Born, the myriad heavens arise.
Opening the Three Brightnesses,
This is called the Heavenly Root.
Above, no further Ancestor—
Only the Dao is the body.
The Five Scriptures unfold,
Universally planting divine spirits.
Without scripture, no radiance—
Without scripture, no clarity.
Without scripture, no standing—
Without scripture, no completion.
Without scripture, no transcendence—
Without scripture, no birth."*

Upon completion, visualize within the five viscera five-colored luminosity emanating from the mouth, illuminating the celestial realm.

Next, visualize the platforms:
- **Eastern Platform**, the **Jade Yang Hall**, like an empty cavern, its **verdant light** dazzling as jade.
- **Southern Platform**, the **Flowing Fire Courtyard**, its flames blazing like the sun’s hue.
- **Western Platform**, the **Golden Flower Platform**, where **true qi** intermingles, gleaming gold and illuminating the ten directions.
- **Northern Platform**, the **Nine Refining Corpse Platform**, where **emerald qi** holds the **Spiritual Water Officials**; their waters mirror the Milky Way, within which five-colored flowing clouds drift.
- **Central Platform**, the **Great Yellow Platform**, where **true qi** permeates the **yellow qi**, surrounded by five-colored cloud radiance. Each platform has palaces, with officials in **three-colored brocade robes** encircling the five altars.

The platform is constructed with **pure sand**, thirty inches high, thirty-two inches wide—symbolizing the **Thirty-Two Heavens**. Thirty-two banners, each inscribed with the **Thirty-Two Heavens**, encircle it, with thirty-two lamps arranged around the four quarters, centering the **Three-Colored Realm Heavens**.

Each platform requires an incense burner, water, and fire, along with a wooden plaque bearing its name. Proceeding by the **Southern Dipper’s array**, draw qi step-by-step: first **water refining**, then the **eastern direction**, then **south**, **center**, **west**, and **north**, refining the form while maintaining visualization—**never breaking focus**—known as **Great Yellow Form-Refining**.

Next, perform **golden liquid quality-refining**:
- **East**: **Jade Yang Body-Returning**
- **North**: **Spiritual Water Purification**
- **Then**: **True Fire Transcendence**, each step following the method.

**Divine Transformation**
To transform into the **Red Clarity Harmonious Yang Sovereign**—the **Southern Pole Life-Commanding Lord**—press the middle finger to the middle of the palm, drawing **eastern qi**, assuming the form of the Celestial Lord.

Visualize **Taiyi the Saving-Suffering Heavenly Venerable** standing atop the head, the **Master of Eastern Hua** before you, **Han Lord** to your left, with countless divine generals surrounding you, acting at will.

Protecting and transcending the **Netherford’s Effort**, gazing endlessly without bound."*

Then burn the seal over the two lamps and immerse it in water. Next, hold the lamp and ignite the **Fire Pool**, pouring water into the **Water Pool**. Invoke the **Great Transcending Heavenly Worthy of the Law Bridge**.

If the **Southern March Refining and Transcending Method** is used, proceed with the **Ritual**. If using the **Three Lights Refining and Transcending**, omit it.

Next, summon the departed soul before the Sage and offer incense. Then proclaim the **Refining Ritual of the Fire Palace Boy**:
*"I hear the **Cold Court** confines them, now pondering the **Mysterious Mercy** of transcendence.
The **impure qi** blooms like flowers—truly relying on the **Law-Water** to purge and dispel.
Thus, the Heavenly Worthy, moved with pity, the **Great Dao**’s compassionate benevolence, drenching all beings, rescuing them from suffering.
Unveiling the **Essentials of the Cavernous Mysteries**, bestowing the **Clear Rituals of Refining and Transformation**.
So they may bathe in the **Spiritual Ford**, ascending beyond the **Desire Realm**.
Then form and spirit both attain perfection; blessings and congratulations naturally arise.
You souls, pure and reverent, receive the refining with sincerity."*

Next, recite the **Refining the True Incantation**:
*"The Supreme High True One, the Nine Spirits’ Essence.
Make the soul fly as a **Xian**, ascending to the **Purple Court**.
Bathing in the Flowering Pool, body and spirit purified.
The **Essence** penetrates the **Great Void**; ten thousand **qi** spontaneously arise."*

Next, recite the **East Well Incantation**:
*"The **Heavenly River** irrigates the **East Well**; the **Stone Mirror Water Mother’s** essence.
The Round Light brushes the **Spiritual Luster**; the **Mysterious Luster** gleams high and bright.
**Primordial Origin** parts the **Double Night**; mortals and immortals give birth to the **Moon**.
Bathing in the **Lan Pool** above, the **Dragon** bears the **Longcheng Vessel**.
The **Golden Boy** scatters fragrant flowers; the **Jade Maiden** flows the Five Stars.
Donning the **Jade Girdle**, refining the Five **Xian** forms.
The **Perfumed Body** descends with ten thousand spirits; riding the **Scenery**, ascending to the **High Bright**."*

Next, invoke:
*"Souls and spirits, one **qi** blending, the Three Lights piercingly clear—no darkness remains unilluminated, the **Way** manifests in the seal.
Only hearing the **Suffering Sea’s** waves rise, the **Karmic Wind** fanning flames—
the accumulated **ignorance** of beginningless crimes—how could one encounter such **resplendent grace**?
Unwashed by dust, no hope of transcendent wisdom.
Today, I follow the **Primordial Origin’s** Dao edict, extending the **Sovereign’s** benevolence,
requesting the **True Fire** of the Three Lights to transcend the **Nine Layers of Darkness**.
You must take the **Great Vow**: to eliminate all **greed, hatred, and evil deeds** from beginningless time,
to cultivate a **pure body and mind** from today onward,
to sever the **Seven Emotions** across all **dust-sands and eons**,
to take **refuge in the Three Jewels** in all lifetimes and births.
All through the **Liberation Path**, entering the **Land of Effortless Wandering**.
We, the **Law Assembly**, share this resolve—
together with the souls, we sincerely turn toward it."*

Finally, chant the **Praise of the Dao Treasure**.

「Thus, the Dao/Way, formless and nameless, manifests through symbols and reveals itself,
moves with the sun and moon, encompasses heaven and earth—
effortless yet all-pervading, its essence ever-present in all things.
It is the mystery of all existence, the treasure of the virtuous,
the refuge of those who return, the revered Dao Treasure.»

**Next, the Praise of the Scripture Treasure:**
«The Jade Classics inscribed with seals, the Golden Tablets with luminous script,
eight-cornered and radiant, a square span of a thousand measures,
thirty-six divisions, five thousand precepts in four grades—
the Dao/Way bridges the Three Vehicles.
We reverently honor the Scripture Treasure.»

**Next, the Praise of the Teacher Treasure:**
«All beings in ignorance must be guided by instruction.
The Ten Directions’ sea of suffering requires the ferry of the Law.
We vow to establish the lineage of teachers,
to lead all to the true fruit of enlightenment.
With respectful homage to the Law Body,
we reverently honor the Teacher Treasure.»

**Threefold Homage and Praise:**
«Now, for the souls and all beings,
we take refuge in the Three Jewels.
We vow that in response to the call of the Ten Directions,
and in the Three Ages’ transformations,
all celestial beings, immortals, and gods of blessed lands,
the Ten Extremes’ demon kings,
and the countless holy assemblies—
they shall seek our voice to save suffering,
respond to our compassionate light,
and be guided away from confusion.
Together, we return to the unity of the Original Qi,
and restore the True Essence of the Primordial Origin.
The divine transformations know no bounds,
mutually blending, each perfecting in wondrous wisdom,
free from obstruction—
the radiance of sun and moon,
the brilliance of stars—
all arise from divine light,
fulfilling the merit of refinement and transcendence.
Having opened the gate of alchemy and liberation,
we now expound the profound mysteries—
you must quietly contemplate,
and deeply receive the Jade Precepts.»

**Next, chant the Nine Chapters,
then chant the Three Lights’ Alchemy of Refining the Jade Scripture Treasure Chapter.**

«The brilliance spreads wide and high,
illuminating the Original Void.
In response to the Nine Primordial Truths,
the transformations merge with the Great Diagram.
The Celestial Spirit constructs the text,
following the Dao’s sacred model.
The Tortoise of the West, the Dragon’s Head,
the Wind’s Dew and the Communal Hall—
all are transformed and unified,
their majesty self-evident.
The sun’s essence fills the heavens,
the moon’s shadow aligns with the earth.
The stars’ essence nurtures the alchemy,
the souls and spirits ever supported.
The Celestial Forest radiates authority,
reaching beyond existence into non-being.
The demon kings are subdued,
the Three Scenes free from constraint.»

**Then, the White Cloud says:**
«Indeed, the Four Births are mired in delusion,
the Six Realms steeped in darkness.
We refine the Three Qi in the Three Lights,
and gaze upon the Nine Yang in the Nine Dao.
The palaces of soul and spirit,
the ears and eyes, the vital essence—
all must now be transformed,
so that the divine may migrate and receive the alchemy.»

**Next, chant the Five Celestial Beings’ Scripture of Refining and Subduing Demons.**

«The Original Void radiates the Primordial Essence,
the Green Flower opens the Great Clarity.
The Red Flower dispels the Three Qi,
the Jade Pill nourishes the Celestial Spirit.
The Western Spirit returns the Seven Degrees,
the Great Void’s brilliance shines like a mirror’s bloom.
The Northern Mystery’s Three Refined Mists,
the Supreme Sovereign’s Purple Emperor’s True Essence.
The transformations merge into the Peak of Unity,
the Original Sovereign’s spirit encompasses all.
The demon kings are bound to the blood sacrifice,
the dead are recorded in the names of the living.
The Five Assemblies unite in one vow,
the Central Lord, the Great Arcane Sovereign.
The Wind’s Chariot serves as the subjugation,
all equally receive the ascending Green Qi.»

**Again, the White Cloud says:**
«Souls and all beings,
when you reach the altar,
whether scholar, farmer, artisan, or merchant,
whether kin, friend, or stranger,
whether father, mother, uncle, or elder brother,
whether elder sister, younger brother, or younger sister,
whether husband, wife, son, or daughter,
whether distant or near,
whether wise or foolish—
arranged by rank and ability,
distinguished by virtue—
then, according to their stations,
a thousand differences arise.
Yet, in this moment, the noble and the destitute are equal,
the wise and the foolish are the same.
For the heart is bound by its own divisions,
the spirit not yet extinguished—
still clinging to distinctions of high and low,
still harboring the hunger of suffering.
From ignorance, they have not heard the true teachings.
Now, through this instruction,
let them cleanse their delusions.

This Sacred Fast of the Spirit is the Primordial Sovereign’s supreme transformation—
returning to the Origin, achieving unity,
preserving the True and embracing the Spirit.
We must abandon all attachment to forms,
and enter the realm of boundless liberation.
Quietly return to boundless vision,
severing all mundane thoughts.
In profound stillness, the divine is born,
listening closely to the hidden melodies.
All true beings witness and verify the refinement.»

**Next, chant the Great Dharma’s Hidden Language,
then recite the second vow:**

«Indeed, the Ten Categories sink their souls,
long steeped in the realms of darkness.
The Three Lights’ true Qi joins in the alchemy’s work.
Having transformed the substance into Yang Crystal,
the divine now dwells in the Jade Scripture.
Born with fortune, do not return to delusion—
purified of all dust, forever gaining the unique treasure.

We vow that all true beings shall witness and verify the refinement,
the holy assemblies list in compassion.
May the virtuous nature, firm and unyielding,
ascend directly to the Immortal Realm,
untested by demons, entering the Celestial Gate.
Guiding the Spirit Consorts with compassion,
the Five Assemblies open the path of salvation.
Observing the fate of the child,
the Golden Dragon’s relay transmits the decree.»

**When the rites are complete, proclaim the Left Decree,
and chant the Hidden Names of the Thirty-Two Heavenly Sovereigns.**

**Next, proclaim the Right Decree,
and chant the Three Chapters of the Demon Kings,
then proclaim the Seal of Receiving Precepts.**

**The Sovereign’s True Form, the Jade Character:**
«The incantation reads:
*‘Scarlet Red, the Supreme Vermilion,
resplendent and solemn.
The true essence of Yang Qi,
purifying impurities in the Pool of Brilliance.’*»

**The Great Yin’s True Form, the Jade Character:**
«The incantation reads:
*‘Pure Round Jade Light,
ascending mysteries in celestial knots.
The luminous fusion of Yin essence,
nurturing souls and refining forms.’*»

**The Heavenly Ganges’ True Form, the Jade Character:**
«The incantation reads:
*‘The Ganges’ stars’ true Qi,
entwining sinews and encircling bones.
Piercing the muddy elixir,
opening the Yang’s towering peaks.’*»

**The Eight-Character Talisman of the Great Sun:**
*‘Scarlet Red, the Supreme Vermilion,
the Yang Essence refines the souls.’*

**The Eight-Character Talisman of the Great Yin:**
*‘Jade Light, the Mysterious Brilliance,
the true essence nourishes the spirits.’*

**The Six-Character Talisman of the Celestial Manifestation:**
*‘The Ganges’ stars’ true Qi refines the souls.’*

**These Three Lights’ Jade Talismans**
are answered to the Heavenly Sovereign’s decree,
written upon the Vermilion Peak’s Celestial Palace,
to receive the refining of the departed souls.»

**The Scripture *Soul Gem of Boundless Degrees* concludes in Volume 59 of the Great Dao.
The Scripture *Soul Gem of Boundless Degrees* concludes in Volume 60 of the Great Dao.**

**The Chapter on Receiving Refining in Nanchang (The Scripture *Soul Gem of Boundless Degrees*):**
*"The Imperial Sage declares: To receive refining of the departed souls, one must follow the original methods of the *Soul Gem*. First, one should go before the Holy Sage, burn incense, and recite silently. Then, seated in proper order, one invokes the ritual.

‘Here, the humble servant [name], having now burned incense, humbly petitions:
The Three Pure Ones, Supreme Sages,
The Ten Directions’ High Worthies,
The Great One of the Saving-Suffering Celestial Sovereign,
The Heavenly Pivot of the Three Provinces,
The Five Offices’ Masters,
The Three Celestial Ones Who Assist in Teaching and Uphold the Primordial Dao,
The Great Master of Rectification and Tranquil Response,
The Great Sage of Nanchang’s Upper Palace and Eternal Life,
The Nine Hua Worthies,
The True Sage of the Southern Palace for Refining,
The Southern Palace’s Supreme Sovereign,
The Illuminating Venerable Deity,
The High Worthies of the Fire Office,
The Immortal Saints of the Water Palace,
The Overseers of Refining,
The Celestial Worthies of the Yellow Banner Hall,
The Officials and Envoys of Merit,
The Divine Soldiers of Earth and Land,
The Flying Celestial Deities,
The True Worthies of Marvelous Practice,
The Nine-Light Child Immortals,
The Dragon-Wen Deities of the Eight Auras,
The Fire Pool Divine Generals,
The Water Pool Divine Generals,
The Messengers Who Capture the *Pò*,
The Chief Officers Who Refine the *Hún*,
The Officials of the Fire Office,
The Child Soldiers and Envoys,
The Fire Pool Child Immortals,
The True Sovereigns of Life and Death,
The True Sovereigns of Records,
The Venerable Deities Who Prolong Life, Increase Fortune, and Remove Calamities,
The Great Deities Who Return the Corpse and Resuscitate the Living,
The Five Path Deities,
The Great Deities of the Boundless Profundity,
The Great Refining Deities,
The Merit Officials of the Straight Day,
The Refining Soldiers and Envoys,
And all True Worthies.

*Humbly, we pray that the Cloud-Flying [Deity] descend temporarily from the Vermilion Celestial Heights,*
*and that the Feathered Chariot circle and descend upon the Dao-Realm.*
*With the Five Colors vibrant and the Compassionate Light pervading,*
*illuminating the Dark and Profound.’*"

The Four Symbols exhale their vast influence,
And the benevolent grace pervades the black earth.
Thus, may Your servant be granted enlightenment,
To rescue and uplift the lost souls.

Now, we humbly beseech Your boundless compassion,
To serve as eternal witness and testament.

Issuing the Soul-Calling Talisman,
Reciting the Hidden Names,
Invoking the Golden Threshold Transformed Body Celestial Worthy,
And conjuring the departed soul to stand before the tribunal.

We humbly reflect:
The heavens and earth bestow their nurturing virtue without favor,
And all things are born from this boundless generosity.
Yin and Yang govern the sources of fortune and calamity,
And must respond in kind to human deeds.

If one commits a single act of injustice,
Or performs a single unkind deed,
Though the world may not yet condemn them in life,
In the unseen realm, they cannot escape the ghosts’ reproach.

Thus, whether man or woman,
Commoner or official,
Serving their ruler or their parents,
Leading others or governing themselves—
If they defy the natural order of Heaven and Earth’s creation,
And ignore the radiance of the Three Lights’ illumination,
Failing to exhaust their loyalty in service to the state,
Or to deplete their filial piety at home,
Yet indulge in arrogance, excess, lust, and idleness,
Disregarding reverence and frugality,
Or flatter and scheme while abandoning the Middle Way,
Practicing deceit, envy, and malice,
While righteousness goes unheard,
And cruelty and murderous acts stand unchecked by benevolence and forgiveness—
Slanderous tongues twist truth into falsehood,
Partiality and malice defame the virtuous,
And those who covet honor and wealth
Lightly dismiss merit while greedily hoarding gains,
Or extort bribes, taking without measure while hiding excess.

They know not the origin of their very essence and breath,
Nor trace the source of their sustenance.
Abusing authority, they weigh justice lightly,
And wielding power, they act with tyranny.
They never take refuge in the Three Treasures,
Nor pity the Fourfold Birth,
Blaspheming the Dao and reviling their teachers,
Oppressing others and scorning all things,
Cursing and poisoning, openly deceiving,
Studying scriptures with doubt,
And scoffing before the deities,
Feasting on unclean foods without restraint,
Ignoring the rites of fasting and purification.
Their incense unburned, how could they offer sincere devotion?

All these transgressions are the seeds of Hell,
The causes of delusion across dust-swept kalpas.
Yet they cling to self-interest, believing in eternal life,
Until the Five Phases exhaust their measure,
And the Great Limit draws near.
Then, summoned by the grave’s accusations,
Confronted by vengeful spirits,
Plagued by misfortune and disease,
They perish in untimely death or childbirth,
Or suffer endless torment in the underworld,
Haunted by sorrow in eternal darkness.
Though time passes like a fleeting stream,
They remain bound by the karmic trials of rebirth.
How much more so for those yet unborn—
Even if they wish to reform, there is no path.

Unless they take refuge in the Three Realms’ Supreme Danheaven Emperor,
The Vermilion Mound Fire Office,
And the Refining Clarity Worthy,
Who alone knows the Dao’s compassion for life,
And rescues the utmost suffering of the deluded.

Now, the departed soul—[Name]—
Though once dwelling in the dusty world,
Still bound by mortal form,
Has not escaped the shame of past deeds.
Thus, through body, speech, and mind,
Greed, hatred, and delusion arise.
Though past transgressions may be many,
Redemption lies in this very moment.

From the Three Realms’ torment,
To the Nine Layers’ imprisonment,
All are saved by devotion,
And attain liberation.

With reverence, we recall the Great Luo Yuanbeginnings’ Sacred Treasure Compassionate Worthy,
Who manifested in the Dragon and Han eras with boundless virtue,
And revealed the jade-like clarity of their vision.
They expounded the vast and profound merits of countless kalpas,
And bestowed the towering virtue of the Great Brahman.

They inscribed the Five Scrolls in the Azure Palace,
And fully saved all sentient beings.
They hung the Eight Trigrams in the Vermilion Mound,
And guided all ranks to transcendence.
Thus, the dead souls undergo refining,
And attain the transformation into immortals.

Now, with the Crimson Script’s luminous ancestral *qi*,
We command the Nine-Light Child Immortals,
And the Refining Clarity Worthy,
To summon the lost souls,
And forge them in the flowing fire.
Thus, grudges shall be extinguished,
And karmic stains shall dissipate like smoke,
Ascending to the Vermilion Palace,
And their names inscribed in the Purple Register.

At this hour, we solemnly follow the Great Law,
The Refining Souls Ritual,
And reverently perform its observances,
Humbly praying for divine response.

Again, we offer incense,
And invoke the Ten Directions’ Saving-Suffering Celestial Worthy,
Holding the Yuanbeginnings’ Talisman.

Your servant has heard:
The Sacred Treasure Original Chapter
Pursues and refines the departed,
Ten times refining souls,
Nine times concealing the underworld’s melodies,
Opening natural enlightenment,
And descending through the void to manifest spirits,
Governed by the Three Primordials’ symbols.

The Jade Palace Great Saint,
High above the imperial throne,
Expounds the utmost mysteries,
And examines the causes and conditions.

The Yuanbeginnings’ Talisman descends,
Dragging souls from hidden prisons,
And universally saves all beings,
Refining ancestors and descendants alike.
Ascending to the Vermilion Palace,
They urgently inform the Three Officials,
The Mountain and Marsh Spirit Caverns,
And the Twelve River Sources,
To pardon and absolve all offenses,
Without delay.
A grand assembly is convened in the Mysterious Capital,
And all gods are swiftly summoned.

Among them:
The Eastern Pole Palace’s Responsive-Sensation Supreme One Saving-Suffering Celestial Worthy,
The Soul-Refining Transformed Form Lord,
The Great God of the Great Darkness’ Corpse-Refining,
The Great Compassionate Miao Conduct Worthy,
The Heavenly Mechanism Benevolent Life File-Chang,
The Life-Prolonging Fortune-Increasing Calamity-Removing Worthy,
The Soul-Summoning Mysterious Capital,
The Infinite Soul-Refining,
Today’s Record-Keeping,
All the Celestial Lords attending the hall.

We humbly invoke the Ten Directions’ Mighty Dragon Gods,
The Radiant Flower Gods,
The Dark Hero Gods,
The Refining Gods,
The Transformed Body Gods,
The Repaired Form Gods,
The Rectified Essence Gods,
The Fire Office Gods,
The Returned Form Gods,
The Returned Soul Gods,
The Transcendent Life Gods,
Their light shining brightly,
Illuminating all the heavens.

The Celestial Prime Minister,
The Immortal Lord Tao Gong,
Holding the talismans and registers,
All assemble before the Emperor,
Universally refining all beings,
And the souls of past lives.
By imperial decree, the Ghost Emperor is summoned,
To hear the teachings.

The Yan Capital’s Underworld Officials,
The Censorate Attendants,
Each holding the Black Registers,
Shall strike down the roots of guilt,
And not dare detain or oppress the ghostly multitudes.

All Yuanbeginnings’ Talismans are now sealed and activated.

Your servant, with utmost humility, prays thus.

Reciting the Supreme One Saving-Suffering Celestial Worthy,
Holding the Refining Souls Talisman,
And offering incense.

Your servant has heard:
The Eternal-Life Great Saint,
The Flying Celestial God-King,
At the dawn of the Red Clarity era,
When the Green of the Primordial began in the heavens,
And the mountains swallowed smoke,
They received the Sacred Treasure’s hidden melodies.

The ghostly spirits now perish and disperse,
As the wondrous *lingzhang* hymns resound,
Reviving the dead and restoring the decayed,
Manifesting the *Zhenren*’s virtue in guiding souls.
Seeking voices and responding to yearnings,
They follow wishes to be reborn.

With utmost humility, I beseech the Eternal-Life Great Saint,
The Flying Celestial God-King,
To bear the *Yuanbeginnings’* talismans and decrees,
And pardon the guilty souls of the Northern Capital.

Thus may the departed *Certain Person* escape demonic control and be exalted,
Ascending in due time.

Attendants and escorts shall all be counted among those refined by the day.
Roaming the *Jieyan* Platform of the blade-effigies,
They attain the fruit of *Dongxuan*’s mysteries,
Without passing through the underworld,
Directly ascending to the Southern Palace.

Free from the Five Sufferings and Eight Hardships, they wander at ease,
Offering homage to the Nine Ancestors and Seven Mystics in joy.
May they be unbound by constraints,
And fully fulfill the *Xuanke*’s sacred rites.
Your servant, with deepest reverence, prays thus.

Reciting the *Huolian Danjie* Celestial Worthy of the Fire-Refined Elixir Realm.

With fervent hope, I pray the Flying Celestial God-King,
And the divine officials and soldiers,
As in the past when the Primordial Green dawned in the heavens,
Within the *Lihuafahuo* assembly,
May they not forget the teachings of the *Yuanbeginnings* Celestial Worthy.

With deepest humility, I pray for the salvation of the departed *Certain Person*,
That their dead souls may be refined,
Transformed into immortals and reborn as humans,
Their living bodies delivered from suffering,
And eternal life granted through each eon.
All sentient beings shall ascend to the Dao’s shore.

Reciting the *Zhuling Duming* Celestial Worthy of Commanding Life,
Offering incense,
With middle fingers inscribed,
Summoning the *Shenshi* divine historians.

With solemnity, I summon:
The Left Marshal of the *Dantian* Celestial Army,
The *Zhiri* Functionary of the Sun,
The *Didao* Functionary,
The *Huanglu* Academy Functionary,
The *Dantian* Child,
The Chief Clerk of Soul-Pursuit,
The Functionary of Soul-Gathering,
The General of Soul-Capture,
The Messenger of Soul-Refinement,
The Fire-Pool Water-Marsh Divine Generals,
The Fire-Oven Divine Soldiers,
The Generals of the Refinement Bureau,
To come and fulfill their duties at the altar.

With reverence, I follow the Dao’s decree,
Refining and guiding the dead souls.
You divine powers shall act accordingly.

The Five Dao Masters of *Taishan*,
The City Deities and their overseers,
The Underworld officials and soul-guiding clerks,
Swiftly and respectfully obey the original pardon,
Summoning the departed *Certain Person*
To appear before the altar for refinement.

Reciting the *Liandu Nan Gong* Celestial Worthy of Southern Palace Refinement.

First, I invoke the *mao* character of the left hand—*Yundou Gongcheng* complete,
The eastern *qi* blown and struck.
Next, the *chen* character—*Yunxing Shengzhuan*,
The western *qi* blown and struck.
Next, the *San Tu* incantation—*Kehan Ming*,
The southern *qi* blown and struck.
*Duli Qian*, the northern *qi* blown and struck.
*Duihun Juhun*, *Gongdu Juhun*,
The central *qi* blown and struck.

After burning the *Yu Mi* talisman, I immediately inhale the *Gui Men* *qi* and strike,
Then extract the southeast *qi* to refine the departed soul,
And begin the *ti* incantation, followed by the *lun* incantation,
Silently reciting the *Gou Shen* incantation.

Transforming the Five Emperors’ talismanic incantations, I intone:
*"Qingdi"* protects the soul, safeguarding the Three Palaces.
Invoking the *zhen* character—*Hongxing*,
Absorbing the nine channels of eastern green *qi* into the mouth,
Channeling my own liver *qi* ninefold into the mouth to merge,
And strike the talisman with the incantation.

*"Chidi"* nourishes *qi*, with all spirits returning to the body.
Invoking the *li* character—*Moji*,
Absorbing the three channels of southern red *qi* into the mouth,
Channeling my own heart *qi* threefold into the mouth to merge,
And strike the talisman with the incantation.

*"Baidi"* attends to the *po* soul, smelting away malevolent *yin*.
Invoking the *dui* character—*Mozhen*,
Absorbing the seven channels of western white *qi* into the mouth,
Channeling my own lung *qi* sevenfold into the mouth to merge,
And strike the talisman with the incantation.

*"Heidi"* harmonizes the blood, with all spirits preserving essence.
Invoking the *kan* character—*Waoluo*,
Absorbing the five channels of northern black *qi* into the mouth,
Channeling my own kidney *qi* fivefold into the mouth to merge,
And strike the talisman with the incantation.

*"Huangdi"* the Central Sovereign, with all spirits unexcelled.
Invoking the middle finger’s character—*Lingbao*,
Absorbing the twelve channels of central yellow *qi* into the mouth,
Channeling my own spleen *qi* twelvefold into the mouth to merge,
And strike the talisman with the incantation.

Burning the *Qing Tianshi* talisman, sprinkling ambrosial dew,
And reciting the *Jiejie* incantation to dissolve impurities:

*"Shenling Tianzhen, Yuye Yuanjin.
Shangqing Huafang, Yuanshi Laojun.
Miao Ru Taixia, Guangyao Xuanwen.
Qi Shen Feiquan, Beitan Shouyan.
Wo Wei Shangwang, Bihe Guiqun.
Bawēi Tuhuo, Su Er Zunshen.
Qianqian Quzui, Xiang’e Bu Cun.
Wanwan Mowang, Baoming Huxing.
Ji ji ru lvling."*

Next, I recite the Fire Incantation three times,
Transforming the *Rizhun* talisman.
Upon completion, I direct the divine generals
To lead the departed soul to the Fire Pool for refinement of its form.

Again, I recite the Fire Incantation three times,
Then the *Yinyu* incantation once,
And within the Fire Pool, I burn the *Liujin Lianxing* talisman.
Burning the talisman with the incantation:

*"Yangming Jingjing, Huo Fan Ziting.
Bamang Langying, Hunpo Yiping.
Wuhui Sanzhuan, Qi Tong Taisheng.
Liufang Quzhu, Yinrun Cangsheng.
Guandai Jinmen, Huagen Xianming.
Fuyu Wujing, Shumuo Guanjin.
Shuntian Yunqi, Suiri Huaxiang.
Jiu Kong Naoming, Jietuo Benxing.
Ji ji ru Lingbao Dafa Lianhua Chengren lvling."*

Next, I recite the Water Incantation three times,
Transforming the *Yuejun* talisman with the incantation:

*"Yaoluo Danyang, Yuanjing Fuchen.
Chili Daming, Jiuqi Qi Bing.
Sanwu Yunjing, Erxiang Jiaochan.
Yupao Shiti, Liangu Fanxin.
Liuxia Xuanzhu, Shumuo Ningshen.
Hehun Roupo, Neiwai Tongyan.
Yangcan Yuehua, Kouzhe Rigen.
Lingzhi Yingyi, Mianfa Jinxian.
Yu Yue Tonggan, Yu Ri Tongcun.
Chengjing Feikong, Shangzao Dixin."*

Next, I burn the *Jiuchang* talisman of the twelve paths,

**The Method states:**
Take **reed stalks** to fashion a human form,
