First, erect the **altar**, perform the **Dao**, observe the **fast**, and set the **offerings**.
Petition the **Emptiness Emperor, Supreme Sovereign**,
Pass through the **Nine Fortified Gates, the Cold Courtyard of the Spring’s Bend**,
And only then summon the **wandering soul**—
Then the ritual may proceed.

At nightfall, the **Dao Official**, adorned in **solemn rites**,
Places the **reed effigy** at the **eastern-north Ghost Gate** outside the great door.
The **Dao Official**, standing at the **Earthly Gate**,
Transforms into the **Nine-Petal True Person**,
Steps upon the **Luo constellations**, stands at the **Luo’s tail**,
Gazing toward the **Heavenly Gate**, invoking the **True Qi**.
A **young acolyte** holds the **Soul-Summoning Banner**,
Standing at the **Heavenly Gate**.
The **Dao Official** gathers one **Qi**, transforming it into one **organ**.
Then, the **Dao Assembly** raises the **Golden Gate’s Celestial Deity’s** effigy,
Commanding the **acolyte** to circle and summon **True Qi**,
Distributing it into the **reed effigy’s body**—
Twelve **Qi** completed.

At the **Human Gate**, the **Dao Official** animates the **reed effigy** into human form.
The **Dao Assembly**, alongside the **Dao Official**, recites the **Hidden Words**,
Circumambulating the effigy three times with **willow-branch sprinkled elixir water**.
The **Dao Assembly** then leads the **Void-Step Procession**,
Lowering the effigy to the **altar’s base**.
The **Dao Official** proceeds in order to **refine and deliver** the **Twelve Primordial Rites**.

This method, inscribed upon **Nine-Yin Yellow Talismans**,
May be used to **deliver only three deceased souls**.
If applied to many, it shall not succeed.

**The Nine Refining Resurrection Technique:**

The Master says:
When the Three Lights illuminate, the Nine Suns circulate,
the *Hun Yuan* (混元) qi coalesces—
thus forming the *Lingbao* Three Primordials.

Counting the twelve divisions of the *Zhou* (周),
in Heaven, the Twelve Celestial Ministries;
on Earth, the Twelve Celestial Divisions;
in Man, the Twelve Meridians and Twelve Organs,
corresponding to the Six Yin and Six Yang.

If the departed undergo the Nine Refining Resurrections,
their inner and outer forms regenerate,
restoring human shape.
If they do not undergo the Nine Refining Resurrections,
their form remains incomplete,
bound by karmic defilements.

Thus, the *Lingbao* Secret Fast Method
first refines the departed’s soul through the Nine Resurrections,
returning the corpse-spirit to its original form.
Next, the divine protectors of the immortals,
those cultivating the True Way,
can stabilize their qi, preserve their form,
and through proper cultivation,
harmonize yin and yang’s transformations—
naturally aligning their spiritual qi with the Dao,
all arising from yin-yang’s interplay.
When yin is exhausted and pure yang remains,
they ascend to the True Realm.

Ordinary mortals, failing to honor their qi,
preserve their form, or cherish their spirit,
indulge in desires, exhaust their spirit,
dissipate their primordial yang,
destroying themselves, severing from their True Nature—
until their soul sinks into the Nine Nights,
their vital breath falls into the Three Abysses,
unaware, unable to achieve transcendence.

Thus, the Most High’s compassion,
the Primordial Sovereign’s pity,
established the Three Caverns’ salvation format,
revealed the Nine Resurrection Refining statutes,
universally salvaging the living and the dead,
relying on both the luminous and the obscure.

Scholars who chant the Golden Scriptures,
swallow these talismans,
cyclically repeating them,
will obtain the True Qi of the Nine Heavens’ Great Harmony,
flowing into the Three Palaces,
ascending the Lights to greet the Dawn—
the day is near.

Salvaging departed souls
removes karmic obstacles,
releases past lives’ suffering.
According to the Master’s intent,
from the *Long Han Mu* (龙汉木) Eon,
the *Unlimited Heaven of the Yù Shàn* (郁单无量天),

At **66,666,660 years**, reaching the **Eon of Extended Nourishment and Primordial Flower** (延康素华金劫),
the **Four Cardinal Directions’ Thirty-Two Heavenly Emperors** were established,
the **Twenty-Eight Constellations’ Boundaries** were set,

At **55,550 billion years**, reaching the **Eon of Opening Brilliance and Primordial Yang** (开皇元阳之劫)—

the **Five Directions’ Five Elders and Five Emperors** were born,

Thus, the **Nine Directions’ Nine Heavens**, the **Nine Exaltations and Nine Saints**, the **Nine True Ones and Nine Immortals**, the **Nine Subtle Paths and Nine Dao**, the **Nine Luminaries and Nine Stars**, the **Nine Palaces and Nine Fortifications of Nine Yin**—
all were transformations of the **Primordial Dao’s Upper, Middle, and Lower Three Elements** (三元),
the **Nine Qi of Azure, Yellow, White, Vermilion, Purple, Crimson, Jade, and Luminous** (青黄白丹紫绛碧景琅九炁).

Thus the scripture says:
*"Though these three names differ, they are all the ultimate of Heaven and Earth."*

The *Qīng Wéi Miào Fàn* states:
*"When qi is pure and refined, it ascends and forms the celestial realm.
When qi is turbid and congeals, it descends and forms the earthly domain.
When the two qi intermingle, yin and yang intertwine,
and the primordial qi coalesces harmoniously—
thus, the Dao of humanity is born."*

All who are born in human form
share the same essence and pattern as Heaven and Earth’s primordial creation,
never differing in the slightest.

The **Primordial Origin’s root** is the **mysterious qi without form**,
where **yang essence** first manifests,
the **divine valley** vast and boundless,
formless and undifferentiated,
without substance or appearance,
without sound or light—
this is the **root of the Great Divine Treasure of the Primordial Heavenly Spirit** within the human body.

When **fire ignites the latent palace**,
and **qi flows into the Cavernous Yang**,
the two qi blend and intertwine,
refining and transforming,
the **divine realm unites**,
and **essence and blood align**—
this is the **root of the Soul’s Divine Treasure**.

Once **yin and yang are established**, the body embodies the **two eons**.
According to the **Chi Ming method**,
the **embryo forms within the Central Yellow**,
the **qi circulates twenty-seven times**,
and the **embryonic spirit** contains **a hundred transformations**.

When the **three transformations** align,
the **primordial harmony** takes form,
and the **Great Polarity** is born.

At **thirty-six degrees**, the **metallic qi** nurtures the **soul**.
At **forty-five degrees**, the **Heavenly One and Great One** nurture the **spirit**,
the **five phases** take their positions,
the **five viscera** bloom with **color**,
the **upper Dan Tian’s Nine Palaces** form,
the **middle’s Three Elements and Six Organs** manifest,
and the **nine hues** complete the **human form**.

At **nine months**, the **celestial count** completes **eighty-one cycles**,
the **earthly count** reaches **thirty-six**,
and the **nine qi of the fetus** achieve fullness,
corresponding to the **Nine Qi Heavens above**.

with the **three realms** standing guard—

and thus, the birth of a human body,
how could it differ from Heaven and Earth?

Thus the scripture says:
*"If the Nine Heavenly Marshals do not descend with their registers,
and the ten thousand spirits do not chant their reverent assent,
then birth will not occur."*

At the time of birth, it is not considered vulgar.
Yet, if one cannot **preserve and nurture the Primordial Harmony**,
or **refine the Innocent Child**,

darkly inviting **guilt and calamity**—

the **soul and spirit are bound in the murky void**,
and **guilt and filth pollute the Three Fields**.
Unless one undergoes the **Nine Refining Resurrections**,
how could suffering ever cease?

It is fitting to **humble oneself in the dark paths**,
to **follow and practice reverently**,
and **pray for true response**,
lest one **neglect and defy Heaven’s decrees**.

**The *Shénhǔ* Pursues and Captures the Spirit,**
**The *Shénhǔ* Hidden Scripture,**
**The Supreme One’s Northern Dao/Way, the Great Unity’s Purple Primordial, the Mixed Primordial Jade Tablet,**
**The *Shénhǔ* Hidden Scripture’s author—**
In ancient times, when the Celestial Master **Yè Zhēnrén** attained the Dao/Way,
he concealed this hidden scripture within the **Lónghǔ Shān**’s **Bìlǔ Cave**.
Engraved upon a stone, it reads:

---
*The Jade Tablet of the **Northern Kāi**’s Mysterious Dao/Way,*
*The Supreme One’s Northern Dao/Way, the Great Unity’s Purple Primordial,*
*The Mixed Primordial Jade Tablet,*
*The *Shénhǔ* Hidden Scripture,*
Is secretly stored within the **Northern Kāi’s** **Xuānfàn Palace**,
Within the **Supreme One’s Purple Treasury**,
Among the **Nine Stars of the Northern Dipper**,
In the Nine Heavens.

*The *Shénhǔ* Nine Sovereign Consorts,*
Oversee the **Lower Primordial** and the **Eight Extremes** of noble and ignoble,
The **Ten Directions’ Kings and Officials**, myriad clans and all kinds of people,
The **souls and spirits** of life and death,
The **limits of longevity**—whether prolonged or shortened,
The **departure or retention of spiritual awareness**,
The **length of fortune and destiny**,
All are subject to their governance.

*The world’s people are fourfold:*
The **Yí**, **Bānmán**, and **Jiǔzhōu**’s **Shí Dào**,
The **Liùróng Wǔdí**,
And the **Twelve Celestial Divisions**.
Under the **Heavenly Canopy**,
All ten thousand nations and myriad peoples,
From the **Nine Terraces** above,
Are all under their dominion.

*When a person is born into the world,*
The **Northern Dipper** bestows one portion of its divine spirit,
Manifesting within the **form** as **thirty-six thousand true spirits**.
The **Spirit-Father** and **Spirit-Mother** oversee the **Primordial Destiny**,
With a **great limit** of thirty-six thousand days,
And a **life-span** of one hundred and twenty years.

*If one adheres to the **Three Norms** and **Five Constants**,
Nurtures the **souls and spirits** and preserves the **vital essence**,
Does not commit evil deeds,
Nor cultivates benevolent virtues,*
When the lifespan is exhausted,
The **true spirits** return to the **Dipper’s Celestial Bureau**.
One spirit departs each day,
Until thirty-six thousand are fulfilled—
This is called the **Heavenly Term of Life**,
The **Dipper’s Extremes** decree death,
The **Tàiwēi** removes life,
And the **Heavenly Talismans** descend,
Reporting to the **Earthly Officials**.
According to their dwelling place,
The spirits and deities comply.

*The **Yang** takes the **soul**,
The **Yin** seizes the **spirit**,
The **Earth** collects the **vital fluids**,
The **Heaven** takes the **qi**,
The **fire and wind** disperse completely,*
And the **form** returns to **Great Yin**,
The **spiritual awareness** flees to the **Void**,
Subject to the **transformative forces of creation**,
Following one’s deeds to receive retribution,
Returning to the cycle of life and death,
Endless through the **ten thousand kalpas**.*

*If one cultivates virtue and performs meritorious deeds*
Upon the day of birth,
The **Jade Talismans** increase the calculations,
And the **Heavenly spirits** descend with benevolent **qi** into the body.

*If one commits evil and creates offenses,*
The **Earthly Officials** remove the calculations,
And the **spirits** flee with malevolent **qi** into the body.

*When returning to the **Dipper’s Bureau**,
Great evil diminishes lifespan,
Great virtue extends lifespan,
Minor evil removes the calculations,
Minor virtue adds to the calculations.
One calculation equals three days,
One lifespan equals one year.
A **memorial calculation** of twelve days,
A **memorial lifespan** of twelve years—
If the calculations are exhausted, the lifespan is removed,
And the **true spirits** depart.

*If one commits great evil,*
The lifespan is exhausted and the calculations are severed,
The **true spirits** depart and the **spiritual awareness** returns to suffering.
*If the evil deeds are not great,*
The lifespan is diminished and the spirits are collected,
Demons and ghosts invade,
Benevolent spirits retreat,
And the **empty corpse** wanders in peril,
Suffering distress and calamity,
Haunted by its form.

*Even minor evil deeds*
Reduce the calculations and remove the spirits,
Disturbing the **souls and spirits**,
And the **malevolent qi** brings illness.

*If one can repent, abandon evil,*
Cultivate virtue and perform meritorious deeds,
Establish **virtue/power** and practice **benevolence**,
Observe **fasting and purification** with earnest cultivation,
And move the **August Sovereign**,
The **true spirits** descend anew,
The **spiritual awareness** becomes luminous,
The **souls and spirits** find peace and joy,
And all spirits rejoice in attendance.

*With days and years accumulated,*
All spirits surround the body,
And the spirit can **ascend in form**.

*Greatly, one ascends in broad daylight as an Immortal,*
*Moderately, one attains **spirit-body dissolution** and the Dao/Way,*
*Slightly, one prolongs life for many years.*

This is what is called
**Heaven’s Assistance to Virtue**,
**Heaven’s Aid to the Virtuous**,
**Distant yet Hearing the Lowly**,
**Responding Like an Echo**.

*The **Supreme One’s Secret Edicts** state:*
“Doing good, benevolent **qi** arrives;
Doing evil, malevolent **qi** arrives.”

Each palace and bureau contains
**hundreds of millions of Nine Sovereign Celestial Officials**,
**Hundreds of millions of Embroidered-Robe Envoys**,
**Hundreds of millions of Golden Boys and Jade Girls**,

Recording the **virtues and vices** of all people under the ten thousand nations,
Without the slightest discrepancy.
Among them, the most honored are the
**Nine Sovereign *Shénhǔ* Consorts**,
The **Great Saints** on either side of the *Shénhǔ*,
The ***Shénhǔ*’s Spirit-Mother** overseeing life and death,
And then there are the
***Shénhǔ* Envoys Pursuing Souls**,
***Shénhǔ* Officials Pursuing and Capturing***.

*If one can cultivate virtue and perform meritorious deeds,*
Abandon malevolence and restrain desires,
Eliminate falsehood to support the true,
Their names will be listed in the **Heavenly Bureau of the Supreme One**,
And their station will oversee the **Supreme One’s Northern Dao/Way**.

They can then
**Invoke the descent of myriad spirits**,
Assist the **Great Dao/Way**,
**Revive the dead and restore the departed souls**,
**Sever demons and rebuke the Netherworld’s officials**,
**Command the Underworld’s bureaucracy**,
**Record fortunes and extend life**,
**Avert disasters and repel calamities**,
To earn **Heavenly Merit**,
And upon completing their virtues,
Ascend in broad daylight as an Immortal.

**The Five Dipper’s Mysterious Bureau**

*The Sovereign of the **Huángrén** states:*
*The **Eastern Dipper**, the **Calculating Sovereign**,
Is the **Emerald Yang’s** Primordial **Qi**’s bureau,
Where the **Emerald Spirit** and the **Nine-Qi Heavenly Sovereign** preside.

*The **Western Dipper**, the **Recording Sovereign**,
Is the **Luminous Spirit’s** bureau of nurturing and purity,
Where the **Luminous Spirit** and the **Seven-Qi Heavenly Sovereign** preside.

*The **Southern Dipper**, the **Upper Life-Sustaining Sovereign**,
Is the **Scarlet Flame’s** bureau of **Danling** and the **Great Abyss**,
Where the **Danling True Spirit** and the **Three-Qi Heavenly Sovereign** preside.

*The **Northern Dipper**, the **Descending Sovereign of Death**,
Is the bureau of **Yùjué**’s **Mid-Heaven** and **Harmony**,
Where the **Five-Qi Heavenly Sovereign** presides.

*The **Central Dipper**, the **Great Kāi Sovereign**,
Is the bureau overseeing all spirits,
Where the **Yellow Spirit** and the **One-Qi Heavenly Sovereign** preside.

*The **Eastern Dipper**, the **Calculating Sovereign**,
Bestows one portion of **Qi** upon a person when they are born,*
And the **Five Emperors** supervise life,
The **Earthly Officials** record names,
The **Celestial Bureau** oversees the registers,
The **great** becomes **lifespan**,
The **small** becomes **calculations**.

*All who are born into the world*
Are granted a **lifespan of one hundred and twenty years**.

A single *jì* (cycle) spans twelve years—
a thousand two hundred *suàn* (fates) in total.

Should the **Earthly Officials** assess deeds of great virtue or transgression,
they shall present them to the Celestial Bureau for review,
and thus extend one’s *suàn*—
three hundred sixty for the grand,
one hundred twenty for the lesser.

Should the **Earthly Officials** determine crimes grave and manifold,
they shall confiscate one’s *suàn*.
If crimes are not yet deep,
they shall merely reduce it.
Thus, years are added or subtracted,
each case graded with precision—
no discrepancy, not even a hair’s breadth.

The **Calculating Sovereign** of the Eastern Dipper,
clasping the seal and bearing the banner,
holds authority most stern and weighty.

For when a person dies,
their *yin* soul is claimed by the **Northern Void**,
and if their *tian shù* (heavenly measure) is unfulfilled,
or if crimes were committed,
they are confined to the **Fighting Dippers**,
known as **Tian-Yī Běi Zuò** (Heavenly Unity’s Northern Punishment).

Then the living bear their guilt—
the wealthy lose their heirs,
the poor multiply descendants;
men meet violent ends,
women suffer miscarriage or childbirth woes;
some are dragged through lawsuits,
their fortunes wasted;
others fall to plague or festering sores,
years of hardship,
decades of suffering—
all these are the departed’s *yin* souls undergoing judgment,
bringing calamity to the living world.

Yet if one performs meritorious deeds,
rectifies the heart and follows the Dao,
with unwavering loyalty and filial piety,
accumulating *yin* merit,
their name is inscribed on the **Left Register**,
and the **Magical King** recommends them—
the heavens rejoice in celebration.

Then the soul ascends to the **Southern Dipper**,
the *po* (corporeal soul) refines in the **Cavern of Yang**,
pardoned from the *yin* world’s soul-trial,
redeemed from the *yang* world’s karmic debt.

If one dies young,
and if guilt is measured—
whether crimes were committed—
they are detained at **Southern Peak**,
assigned to the mortal realm,
temporarily governing a locality,
awaiting their term’s end,
passing through the **Northern Dipper’s Wénqǔ Palace**.
There, they receive the **Great Brahman’s** celestial decree,
the *zhēnwén* (true scripture) of fate’s accord,
and are sent to the **Southern Palace**,
where their fortune is weighed—
and they are reborn in the human world,
their noble or lowly, male or female form determined.

But if one dies of old age,
with no deeds to record,
no conduct to commend,
their sins piled like mountains,
no virtue revealed—
then they are directly imprisoned in **Tángyōu**,
to endure the *yin* judgment,
through countless *eons*,
never seeing light again,
their form reshaped into strange beasts,
forever losing their human essence—
truly a cause for sorrow and lament.

The **Primordial Emperor of Supreme Origin**, moved by boundless compassion, observed all beings—few doing good, many committing evil—sinking into the **Five Paths**, condemned to servitude in the **Three Realms**, enduring suffering across ten thousand *eons* without end.

Thus, He manifested **Great Compassion and Mercy**, transmitting the **Great Law**, dispersing the **Primordial Qi** of the **Mixed Void** and the **Jade Tablets’ seals**, scattering the **True Scripture of the Celestial Writings**, the **Secret Edicts of the Immortals**, inscribed on **Jade Tablets and Golden Books**. He entrusted the **Soul-Catching Net of the Numinous Treasure**, marking the chapters to be followed.

Those of the **Dao** act as His agents, transforming and universally rescuing the deluded. Though the **Law’s** methods vary—whether through talismans, officials, or spells—all obey the **Emperor’s Command**, invoking the **Cauldron’s Decisions** and **Magical Incantations** to summon and seize from the **Mystic Chief of the Northern Darkness**.

This is the **Boundless Salvation of All Beings**—none left uncrossed, none left unfulfilled.

Thus, practitioners of the **Dao** must know this:

When summoned, preserve your body like a **dead tree**, both hands holding the **Jade Purity Decisions** to your heart. Focus within on the **True Fire** blazing fiercely, burning to ashes. Then reverse your left hand to **Wu**, right hand to **Zi**, clasp your waist, and visualize the **True Water** in your kidneys churning like a wheel, mingling with the fire. Suddenly, a gust of wind scatters the ashes—**not a trace remains**.

Then strike your teeth **twelve times**, face the **Heavenly Gate**, and inhale the **Primordial Ancestral Qi** twelve breaths. Retain your breath briefly, and visualize a **purple cloud** entering through the **Heavenly Gate**, ascending to your **Forehead Palace**. Next, sense within your **Middle Palace** the **yellow and white qi**, spiraling outward to merge with the purple cloud.

Imagine your body as the **Primordial Emperor of Supreme Origin**, donning the **High Purity Crown and Robes**. Then visualize the **Grand Sovereign of the Supreme One** from the **Eastern Extremity Palace**, descending from the void before you, seated upon a **Nine-Headed Lion Throne**, holding a **willow branch and pure water**.

Again, take the **Green Primordial Qi** from the **Supreme Sovereign’s** crown and merge it with the **Primordial Qi**. This transforms into a **radiant treasure-light**, enveloping your body. Then visualize the **purple cloud and jade mist qi** arriving before you, where **divine officials, tiger-headed deities, jade boys, and jade girls**, along with **talisman scribes**, appear, bearing seals and nodes.

You then wave the **Decisions** over their **ears and eyes**. When the **drumming ceases**, channel your qi forward, burn incense, and declare your purpose.

Strike your teeth again, advance **twelve Ding-Gang steps**, turn to face north. Both hands form the **Divine Tiger Seal**, thumbs and middle fingers interlocked. Recite the incantation:

*"Om GuShaLuQiRongZha [missing character] She!"*

Upon completion, loudly summon:

*"I invoke the **Divine Tiger Lords, the Chief Marshal, and the Officials**—or the **Three Department Soul-Pursuers**—to come before this altar and hear my decree."*

Then visualize the invocation:

*"I bear the **Primordial Emperor’s mighty seals and dragon-script decrees**, wielding the **Numinous Treasure of the Mystic Origin** and the **Divine Tiger’s Nether Realm**. You must heed my command—**terrifying in might, fierce in presence**—dispelling the **darkness of the Underworld**, distinguishing the **paths of life and death**. Though the suffering may not yet be transcended, you must act with **compassion and seize the souls**. Following the **Jade Tablets’ edicts**, proceed directly to the **Heavy Springs**, gathering the **yin-souls** to restore their bodies, returning the **yang** to complete their forms. Reveal their **karmic retributions**, making them manifest before the **Mystic Altar**. Let all qi align with the **Immortal Way**, universally receiving salvation and liberation. Open the **Eight Gates of Marvelous Dao**, extracting them from the **Nether Pass**. Do not falter in resolve, lest the **True Primordial Teaching** be abandoned. **Urgent! Swift execution!**"

**Seven Divine Celestial Maidens’ Soul-Summoning Talisman**

Each day, inscribe one talisman, burn it to ash, and mix with a small amount of **poria** and **cinnabar**, boiling into a decoction for ingestion. The summoning shall take effect immediately.

**Sixth Celestial Maiden (Zhang Xin):** Governs souls of death by fire, scalding, windstroke, epilepsy, paralysis, carbuncles, and dysentery.
**Seventh Celestial Maiden (Xu Ming):** Governs souls of death by famine, wild beasts, insects, snakes, and all wrongful or violent deaths.

first order the novice to ingest **ice-cold water** (角冷水先令服之).
Turn the **Arcane Star** (魁罡) into the **Divine Holy Army** (神圣兵).
**Chen** (辰) and **Xu** (戌) turn the **Cosmic Seal** to the left—**Green Dragon** (青龙) is in **Jia** (甲) and **Yi** (乙).
**Mao** (卯) turns to the right—**White Tiger** (白虎) is in **Geng** (庚) and **Xin** (辛).
**Yi** (酉) precedes **Red Bird** (朱雀) in **Bing** (丙) and **Ding** (丁).
**Wu** (午) follows **Xuanwu** (玄武) in **Ren** (壬) and **Gui** (癸).
The **Zi** (子) sentence is placed above—**Chen Fu** (陈覆) is written.
**Chen** (辰) is coiled below—**She Pan** (蛇蟠) is invoked.
At **Si** (巳), I solemnly invoke the **Supreme Sovereign’s Decree** (奉上帝勑) to the **Six Celestial Generals** (六神),
urgently descending to pursue and refine the departed soul (某人真魂) of the deceased.
The **true spirit** (真魄) attaches to the novice’s body, connecting to the **Yang Compliance** (阳眷).
Swiftly, swiftly (疾疾).

「Right Ritual: First, secretly promise the novice a sum of money, then declare:
*"Supreme Sovereign’s divine grace—with me, swiftly enter the body and restore the soul!"*

Right hand inhales **qi** once, harmonizing the incantation and striking the novice’s forehead, visualizing the soul and spirit together entering from the novice’s body, passing through the **Mystic Gates** (眾妙門) into the Five Zang Organs (五臟) and Six Fu Organs (六腑), the Four Limbs (四肢) and Eight Vessels (八脈), and also from the deceased’s soul and spirit.

Among the three people, the one inside who trembles violently is kept, and the ritualist commands:
*"The spirit shall urgently hasten the departed—attaching to the novice’s body, tremble swiftly and violently!"*

With the incantation, gently stroke the novice’s **Yi** (伊) position below the heart, saying:
*"Clearly and swiftly transmit the message."*

After reciting, declare:
*"The departed shall urgently return to the **Yin Court** (陰府)."*

If the deceased has not yet awakened, chant the **Awakening Soul Incantation** (醒魂咒):
*"Three souls return, seven spirits rejoin.
Heaven and Earth grow dim—
the divine soul descends with urgency."*

Take **Gui qi** (亥炁), and blow it upon the novice’s face.

To summon the soul before its appearance in the **San Tu** (三涂, Three Realms of the Dead) and **Wu Ku** (五苦, Five Torments), recite:
**Hong Xing** (紅杏),
**Mo Hei** (墨黑),
**Mo Zhen** (磨真),
**Mie Lian** (篾臈),
**Ling Bao** (靈寶).

*"The task is accomplished—
**Qie Jiao Zhen** (切角鎮),
**Xing Sheng Zhuan** (興生轉),
**Du Li Qian** (獨隸遷),
**Ke Han Ming** (可韓明)."*

To gather the soul and complete the task, summon the **Eight Directions Swift Messengers** (八方捷疾使者), the **Heavenly Gods and Earthly Spirits** (天神地祇), and all **sentient beings** (萬靈) to return and unite under the **Bright Emperor of Heaven’s decree** (合明天帝日).

Reverently petition the **Eight Great Daoist Deities of the Bagua** (乾坎艮震巽離坤兑八卦大神):
*"Swiftly gather and restore the departed soul of [the deceased’s name], entrusting it to my paper mirror.
Urgent and swift, manifest its form!"*
**Swiftly, swiftly!** (疾疾)

Preserve the **Three Characters of Heaven, Earth, and Man** (天地人三字) upon the mirror.
With **Xun qi** (巽炁), blow upon the mirror and the person’s face, and repeat the summoning:

「Before the face [of the deceased],
Recite the **Sutra of Gathering the Soul and Manifesting the Three Realms of Suffering** (摄魂未现三涂五苦诀咒):
*"Hóngxìng* (紅杏) wings the lodging and spits,
*Mòhēi* (墨黑) is pierced by the Five Peaks Sutra,
Break it and preserve my left [hand].
*Mózhēn* (磨真) is folded and subdued,
*Lièdiān* (篾臈) is beaten at the relay station.
Break *Língbǎo* (灵宝),
Gather in my hands.
The errant soul is pursued and examined;
If it passes the relay station, it is judged as a ghost.
Swiftly, swiftly!

**Right Method of Hóngxìng** (紅杏法):
To drive away the ghostly evils within a person’s body,
When they refuse to reveal their true names upon interrogation,
Use this palm to burn the *hóngxìng* (紅杏) and the *lièdiān* (篾臈) water.

Again, [recite] **□□□□□□** (急急), swiftly manifesting their form!
The **True Qi of the Heavenly Gate** (天門真炁) descends,
Swiftly hastening to the altar.

Seven crossings lead to dispersal;
[Recite] **□□□□□□** (朝太一), all sentient beings unite and return.
Again, [recite] **□□□□□□** (朝太一), fiery brilliance illuminating their form!
Again, the **Sutra of the Subdued Soul** (幽魂受正法) is invoked,
All sentient beings unite and return!

**Pursuit Soul Talisman of the Great Yin—Hun Yuan of the Three Realms** (太阴混元三界追魂符),
**Talisman of the Jade Purity Pursuit Soul Swift Messenger** (玉清追魂使者符),
**Talisman of the Upper Purity Pursuit Soul Swift Messenger** (上清追魂使者符),
**Talisman of the Supreme Purity Pursuit Soul Swift Messenger** (太清追魂使者符).

All these talismans must be paired with the **Jade Seal of the Five Peaks Sutra** (掐玉诀),
To extract the **Qi of the Three Purities** (三清炁).

**Offering to the Divine Tiger Altars** (供养神虎坛范):
*"The establishment of the Divine Tiger and Ghostly Officials’ altars
Requires the Five Directions to deploy their Five Talismans (五方用五篇敷落),
And place the grand **Fúlí Tu** (浮黎土) diagram at their center,
To summon them and make them stand forth immediately.
If this diagram is absent,
Then the Divine Tiger and Ghostly Officials lack their corresponding **contractual light** (契合之光),
And they cannot arrive.

Moreover, on the day of the ritual,
One must recite the **Three Chapters of the Demon King** (魔王三章),
And burn the **Red Book of the Jade Seal** (赤书玉字) and the **Two Chapters of the Eight威威龙威威威龙文** (龙文).
The **Heavenly Gate Talisman Officials** (天门将符吏)
Cannot be summoned unless the **original ancestral script of the Heavenly Qi—True Seal of the Jade Seal** (天元祖炁真文玉字) is invoked.
These two chapters are the **prohibited secrets of the Mysterious Capital** (玄都至禁),
By which the **Primordial Sovereign of the Beginning** (元始天尊) summons all the Heavenly Emperors,
the **Three Realms of Sentient Beings** (三界万灵).
When these chapters are recited,
And their **true script** (真文) is inscribed,
All the **Ten Thousand Saints** (万圣) will see the **jade light** (玉光) and come forth.

The **Língbǎo Upper Dao** (灵宝上道) is not a minor technique;
Its entirety lies in **refining the form and purifying the self** (思形炼已),
**preserving the Qi and guarding the spirit** (守炁存神),
And **refining the body as the Primordial Sovereign’s true form** (炼身如元始天尊之真身),
To achieve **enlightenment equal to that of the Heavenly Sovereign** (与天尊而同慧).
Only then can one attain **harmonized success** (同达).
If one does not comply with the ritual norms,
Or lacks deep contemplation,
All prior efforts will be in vain,
And no effect will be seen.
Instead, one will invite **retribution from the High Worthies** (反招谴谪),
And only incur their **blame** (徒怨於高真).

**Divine Tiger Seal and Talisman** (神虎印章):
*"Performing the Divine Tiger Jade Seal to pursue the soul,
There are four seals in total, to be used during the sacrifice.
If there is a talisman but no seal,
It is like having soldiers without a commander.
If there is a seal but no talisman,
It is like having a commander without soldiers.
Without the seals and talismans,
The **steps of the Bagua** (步罡) cannot summon the spirits,
And the **ritual officers** (发役) cannot drive them forth—
Omitting even one is unacceptable.
Thus, the **Língbǎo Method** (灵宝法) is fully complete,
And there is never any failure.

The **First Seal** (第一印) is the **General Supervisor Seal of Ghosts and Gods** (总监鬼神印),
Which serves as the **overall command** (总制) of the *Língbǎo* Method.
Its text reads: **‘General Supervisor of All Spirits’** (总监众灵四字).
When used, pinch the **General Supervisor Seal** (总监印),
Extract the **Qi of Língbǎo** (灵宝中炁),
Blow upon it and apply.

The **Special Seal of the Jade Seal** (专印玉札总监诀) is pressed with the middle finger,
Straight and centered.
This seal is held by the **Great Demon King of the Five Emperors** (五帝大魔王).

The **Second Seal** (第二印) is the **Inner Taboo Seal of the Northern Marquis** (北魁夫人内讳之章),
Which is the **sole authority** (专权) of the *Jade Seal* (玉司).
This seal is used for **Special Summoning Talismans** (摄召等旛).
When applied, use the **Bagua of the Dipper** (斗罡),
Pinch the **Dipper Seal** (斗诀),
Extract the **mysterious Qi of the North** (北方玄炁),
And blow upon it before use.

The **Third Seal** (第三印) is called the **Northern Marquis Mysterious Seal** (北魁玄范之印),
Or the **Jade Seal of the Left Wing** (雄左玉印).
It is worn on the **left elbow** (左肘),
To summon the **Divine Tiger Marshal** (神虎主伯),
And to press the **True Form Talisman of the Marshal** (主伯吏真形符).
These three seals are **offered to the Yang-Yào Altar** (供养於阳耀坛中).
After use, they are stored in a **stitched pouch** (缝袋).

The **Fourth Seal** (第四印) is called the **Jade Seal of the Right Wing** (雌右玉印),
Worn on the **right elbow** (右肘).
It is used to summon the **Marshal Officials** (主吏),
And to press the **True Form Talismans of the Marshal Officials and Jade Maiden Functionary** (主吏使者，玉女功曹真形符).
These three seals are **offered to the Yin-Jīng Altar** (供养於阴精坛中).
After use, they are stored in a **stitched pouch** (缝袋).

**General Supervisor Seal of Ghosts and Gods** (总监鬼神印),
**Divine Tiger Inner Taboo Seal** (神虎内讳印).」

**Divine Tiger Yin-Seal** and **Divine Tiger Yang-Seal**, as well as the **Right-Standing Seal**, are to be inscribed on *jiǎzǐ* days when the heavens are clear and the *qi* is serene. They are carved from peachwood.

**Ritual for Inscribing Seals**
The ritual requires tea, wine, and nine kinds of fruits, divided into nine portions. On an auspicious day, in a purified chamber, the offerings are made.

The officiant faces north, recites the *Divine Tiger Manifestation Mantra*, and with the left hand, presses the middle finger against the base of the thumb, then reverses to press the thumb against the base of the middle finger. Taking three steps forward toward the *Dīng* direction, he chants the incantation, inhales *qi* twelve times, and blows it forth.

Visualizing beneath the Northern Marshal a ninefold *zǐhuán qi* descending into the seal, he bows and invokes the spell. Upon completion, he anoints the seal with wine, places it in a purified basin, and lets four *fen* of gold coins settle upon it. Then, he stores it in a secluded, pure place—never to be seen by others, lest its power fade. After twelve years, it must be re-carved and formally reported for replacement. The old seal is discarded in a remote cave where no one treads.

**Incantation for Inscribing the Seal**
*"Heavenly One of the North, Supreme One of Purple Primordium,*
*Divine Tiger Marshal, Great Sage of the Dipper,*
*Jade Maiden of Soul-Pursuit, Ten Ten-Thousand Precision Soldiers,*
*Follow my command, descending in response—*
*One call, one [obedient] breath.*
*Enter my seal, transforming into myriad forms.*
*Original, Benevolent, Auspicious, and True—*
*Swift as the Divine Tiger’s decree!"*

Recite this fourteen times, focusing the sacred position and the ascending *zǐhuán qi* with the incense smoke into the seal. After the ritual, store it in a stitched pouch.

Whenever the *yuèdàn* (first day of the lunar month) arrives, the master wears the seal, taps his teeth, and chants:
*"The Divine Tiger Seal—mighty, responsive, and numinous!*
*I now wear it always, that I may endure.*
*Pursue souls, subdue spirits—*
*Instantly reveal their True Forms!*
*Swift as the edicts of the Jade Purity Supreme Deity!"*

**Ritual for Sacrificing to the Seal**
The *Huángrén* states: *"The ritual for sacrificing to the seal requires twelve cups of jujube broth, twelve cups of purified tea, twelve lamps, and twelve *fen* each of gold coins and horses, arranged beneath the Celestial Gate. When the star hosts appear, the officiant dons his robes and cap, focuses his mind, and offers incense. He recites the Transformation Mantra of the Divine Tiger, drawing the ten-directional *qi* with his middle finger and left hand into his body, transforming himself into the *Lingbǎo Tiānzūn*.

Standing *Dīng* and facing south, he walks the eight trigrams toward the Heavenly Pole, turns to face the Celestial Gate, and pays three obeisances before rising. In silence, he petitions the Supreme Deity, stating his transmitted ritual matters: ‘Today, I select this day to perform the sacrificial rites in accordance with the law. I humbly pray that the Three Venerables, in their compassion, descend the three *qi* into the seal. Dispatch the Gold Boy and Jade Girl attendants—twenty-four each—to serve as guards. May my use of the seal be responsive, its effects manifesting as I will. May all the Ten Directions’ Holy Ones bear witness.’

He bows three times, inhales the three *qi* of the Celestial Gate, and blows them forth. Then, kneeling at full length, he holds each seal with both hands—*dàshà* and *wén* gestures—pressing it to his forehead and recites:*

*'Essence of the Manifested, Radiant and Numinous,*
*Subtle Might, Heavenly Splendor,*
*Heavenly Form, Resplendent Sound,*
*Great Transformation, Primordial Axis,*
*Great Stability, Enduring Auspiciousness.'"*

When the incantation is complete, he takes in *qi* and exhales it three times, strikes the spell-seal, and recites the Great Brahman’s hidden mantra once before storing it away.

**The Sixty-Seventh Scroll of the Great Method of the *Lingbao Scripture* for Deliverance of Innumerable Beings is concluded.**
**The Sixty-Eighth Scroll of the Great Method of the *Lingbao Scripture* for Deliverance of Innumerable Beings: The Refining and Deliverance of Talismans**

**The Method of Descending the Supreme Lord’s True Water and Fire**

The Imperial Sage declares:
*"The realm of the departed is a land of darkness and obscurity;*
*suffering souls linger, their spirits stagnant, their bodies foul and impure, bound like prisoners at the well.*
*Without the *qi* of Heaven and Earth, without the refining and deliverance of the Method, how could they attain awakening?*
*Thus, the Mysterious Sovereign, moved by compassion, bestows this text of molten fire and smelting, so that those who follow the Law may embody the Primordial Origin’s transformative form,*
*gather the primordial *qi* of Yin and Yang,*
*harmonize the three *tians*’ radiance,*
*borrow the three *qi* of the Southern Fire,*
*ascend and descend the pure and turbid,*
*sever the Ghostly Gate,*
*purge filth and defilement,*
*until inner and outer shine with clarity,*
*and the hundred limbs glow with light—*
*only then may they realize the Dao of Non-Action."*

Thus, when summoning souls, one must first use the *Beidou* scriptures to gather their spirits and sever their corpses, then employ the *Nanji* seal to register them in the celestial ledger. Hence, the Southern Star and Northern Dipper mold souls and cast spirits, enabling them to return to form, traverse the Great Void—this is the supreme Dao of the *Lingbao*.

The Imperial Sage declares:
*"The Law Officer, holding the tally and preserving transformation, pays homage as prescribed, silently petitioning the Supreme Deity to descend the Supreme Lord’s True Water and True Fire."*

First, one must purify the body of defilement, walk the Nine Phoenix *gang* formation, reaching the *doukou* (mouth of the Dipper). There, pinch three times to offer incense, bow twice, and proceed as the Method dictates.

**The Nine Phoenix *Gang* Formation**

The Imperial Sage declares:
*"The left hand holds the Master’s spell-seal, the right grasps the Talisman of Purifying Defilement, maintaining the body while stepping through the *gang*, ingesting the talisman, and advancing with single steps of the left and right feet."*

**The Nine Phoenix Talisman of Purifying Defilement**
**The Talisman of the Pure *Fanyin* of the Verdant Deeps**

The Imperial Sage declares:
*"This talisman is inscribed with both hands using the *Chen* spell-seal, one covering, one uplifted, drawn from the heart to the hairline.*
*Close the eyes, envisioning the Primordial Origin, a round symbol arising at the nape—*
*holding the *ruyi* scepter, a nine-hued radiance emanating from the forehead,*
*transforming into a five-colored lion throne,*
*purple clouds enveloping the body,*
*inner and outer luminous,*
*all Ten Directions’ worthies paying homage.*
*Then, channeling *qi*, inhale the three *qi* onto the brush.*
*Next, pinch the middle joint of the middle finger, stand facing east, and complete the inscription.*
*Then, strike the teeth nine times to unblock them, swallow saliva nine times.*
*Afterward, gather the five *zang*-organs’ colored *qi* and infuse them into the talisman, bowing to present the petition, seal, and inscription.*
*This is swallowed with a bamboo-shoot decoction.*
*When inscribed upon the altar, it can summon the worthies of the Ten Directions to descend."*

**Verbal Petition for the Water and Fire Rites**

*"The humble servant [Name], unworthy and defiled in body, presumptuously receiving the Master’s transmission, has obtained the Sacred Scriptures and follows the true teaching to save the living and deliver the dead, fulfilling my vow.*
*With sincere words, I humbly petition—*
*may Heaven hear."*

**"With trembling sincerity and great fear, I kneel and bow my head to speak reverently.**

Now, in accordance with the solemn vows of fasting, I, the humble servant [Name], undertake the refining and liberation of the departed soul(s) of [Deceased], not daring to suppress or extinguish the compassionate wishes of the Imperial subjects. I earnestly present my petition to:

- **The Grand Celestial Sovereign, the Northern Pole’s Purple Microcosm Heavenly Emperor (祖师北极紫微大天帝)**
- **The Grand Celestial Sovereign, the Southern Pole’s Regenerating Emperor (祖师南极注生大帝君) before whom I bow**

I humbly pray that **Divine Benevolence** may specially bestow **Illuminating Decrees** upon the **Water and Fire Departments** and the **Five Peaks’ Supreme Commanders**, beseeching them to descend the **Essential Roots of Yin and Yang**, the **True Water** and **True Fire**.

On this very day and hour, let them descend to the altar’s sacred precincts to refine and liberate the departed souls, so that their **spirit and soul may be clarified and rectified**, their **ten thousand *qi* eternal**, their **forms and bodies complete**, and they may regain **radiance and light**, ascending to the Heavenly Treasury. May they rely upon **Heavenly Might**, be **clearly discerned by Divine Wisdom**, and be liberated.

I, the humble servant, prostrate in reverence, await **Heaven’s Manifested Favor** with boundless gratitude. My longing for Heaven’s blessings and my devotion to the **Sacred** are most fervent; I await punishment for my crimes with utmost humility.

**The Imperial Decree for the Ritual Officials:**
Hold the **Divine Tablet**, strike the teeth nine times, **preserve the spirit**, and silently petition the **Northern Emperor’s rites** with three bows. Then silently petition, facing **east-north**, and recite the **Water Science**. Burn the **True Water Talisman** and the **True Fire Talisman** together, completing the process before proceeding with the refining and liberation.

**The Supreme True Fire Decree:**
*Leap of the Tiger (寅) upon the Hare (卯), the Hare upon the Tiger—wind and fire intertwine. When the **Perverse Fire** (巽午) is purged, first inhale the *qi* of the **Southern Fire** three times, then blow it into the **charcoal fire**.*
Use the **Great General of the Master Fire Talisman**: first burn it within the **ritual compass**, then face **south-east** and summon it to the altar’s base.
**Incantation:**
*"I humbly request the Great General of the Master Fire, one army, to descend and manifest the **True Fire** for refining and liberating the departed souls. With the *qi* of the South, I blow into the fire pit, and the fire rises with **half-green, half-red *qi**."*

**The Supreme True Water Decree:**
*With the left hand, hold the **Child Diagram** (子文); with the right hand, hold the **Hare Diagram** (亥文). First inhale the *qi* of the **Northern Pole** five times, then blow it into the **water pool**.*
Use the **Great General of the Master Water Talisman**: first burn it within the **ritual compass**, then face **north-east** and call it to the altar’s base.
**Incantation:**
*"I humbly request the Great General of the Master Water, to descend and manifest the **True Water**, for refining and liberating the departed souls. With the *qi* of the North, I blow into the water pool."*
**Second Incantation:**
*"I humbly request the **Seven Ancestors of the Supreme One** hovering in the void, the **Northern Yin’s Mysterious Officials**, and their messengers to swiftly descend the **True *Qi****. Again, I inhale the *qi* of the North once, blowing it into the water, and preserve the **black *qi* rising within the water**."*

**The Sacred Treasure of Pure Heaven and Earth Talisman**
*Burn the talisman on yellow paper with vermilion script, reciting the **Heavenly Emperor’s Decree** three times.*
**Incantation:**
*"Divine Spirits of Heaven’s True Essence, the Jade Purity’s Primordial Truth.
The **Upper Pure’s** Splendid Abode, the **Primordial Lord’s** Ancient Sovereignty.
Entering the **Wondrous Azure**, the **Luminous Mysterious Text** shines forth.
The **Seven Spirits** flow like springs, the **Northern Du** receives the smoke.
I, the **Supreme Sovereign**, compel the **ghostly multitudes** to align.
With **Eight Awe-inspiring** decrees, I expel poison—revered and solemn, the **Thousandfold** impurities depart, and all malevolence is annihilated.
The **Ten Thousand** demon kings are subdued; their **life-essence is severed** and their forms clipped.
Swiftly, as the **Sacred Edict** commands. Let all violators be exterminated.
Swiftly, as the **Sacred Treasure’s Great Law** decrees to save the departed souls."*

**The Stone Scene Water Mother’s Jade Essence Talisman**
*Attach the **Supreme Stipulation of Bathing in Truth**. First recite the incantation, then inscribe the talisman.*
**Incantation:**
*"The **Eastern Well’s Yellow Blossoms**, the **Stone Scene’s Jade Essence**.
The **Mysterious Water Mother** ascends, the **Golden Nectar’s Jade Springs**.
Torrents flow endlessly, the pools and pavilions never dry.
The **Nine Dragons** irrigate and refine, the **Three Lights** descend their essence.
The **Immortal** exhales moisture, refining and liberating the **souls**.
Within and without, **brightly illuminated**, the **exterior and interior** are **clearly discerned**.
The **Hundred Passages and Nine Abysses** are **nourished by the Primordial *Qi***.
The **Five *Zang*-organs and Six *Fu*-organs**, the **Ten Thousand Spirits** arise naturally.
The **fetal sacs and embryonic nodes** open with the water, as the gates are unlocked.
Death does not bring **final annihilation**; evil is **absolutely severed** from **sinking into ruin**.
Now I refine and transform—**the corpse’s *qi* gives birth to the soul**.
Returning to its original form, the **jade body and golden visage** are renewed.
Through **transformation and refinement**, impurities are purged, and it ascends to the **Purple Court**.
Swiftly, as the **Great Emperor’s Command** decrees."*

*After reciting, inhale the *qi* of the North and the **current day’s Great Yin *Qi*** into the brush, **close the *qi*** while inscribing the talisman, and invoke it with the **Eastern Well’s Hymn and Decree**.*
**Incantation:**
*"The **Heavenly River** irrigates the **Eastern Well**; the **Stone Scene’s Water Mother’s Essence** shines.
The **Mysterious Light** sweeps across the **Soul’s Radiance**, the **Round Luster** reflects upon the **High Clarity**.
The **Primordial Lord** dispels the **Heavy Darkness**, and **Heavenly Humans** are born anew with the **moon’s cycle**."*

**The Primordial Lord’s Stipulation for the Departed:**
*"The **Primordial Heavenly Sovereign** resides in the **Seven Treasures’** Forest of Cypress, emitting **Great Radiance** to illuminate all above and below—those with **unfulfilled vows** who do not see the light, **stagnate** and are lost in the **marsh of confusion**, drifting in the **bitter sea**, with no means to escape.

Thus, the **Heavenly Sovereign**, moved by pity, descends these **Sacred Stipulations** to rescue and liberate the **culpable souls**, enabling them to ascend to the **Dao-realm** and **forever escape suffering’s causes**.

Those who receive the **Law** must **purify their hearts and clear their minds**, focus their thoughts on the **Supreme Way**, and follow the **Law’s injunctions**. Only then will the **Netherworld’s** souls be **salvaged and delivered**.

**The Upper Pure’s Sacred Treasure Primordial Stipulation:**
I solemnly declare to the **Three Officials of Heaven’s Prison and Earth’s Barrier**, the **Superintending Spirits**, and the **refining and liberating** deities: *"I supercede and liberate the departed soul(s) of [Name], enabling them to ascend to the **Pure and Subtle Heaven**.*

The **Hundred Spirits** blend harmoniously, **transforming and manifesting as True Essence**, forever departing from **Death’s Domain**. Their **bodies become Jade-Light**, and they **hold the Jade Talismans**, attending at the **Dragon’s Chariot**, just as the **Stipulation commands**."*

**The Primordial Lord’s Edict:**
*"The **Sacred Luminance** of **Purple Orchids**, the **Supreme Purity’s High Void**.
The **Supreme Truth’s Mysterious Dawn**, where the **Three *Qi*** float upon **Jade Purity**.
With **Eight Observations**, the **wondrous paths** are **clearly illuminated**, and **Nine Crossroads** reveal **marvelous enlightenment**.

**Translation:**

**Humblest Compliance with the Dao’s Command**
On this, the **certain day and hour of the current month**, the **establishment of the following decree** is proclaimed: to **extract and elevate** the soul of the departed **[Name of the Deceased]**, as well as the **lonely and lingering spirits** of the Six Paths and Four Generations, guiding them to **rebirth in the Celestial Realm**.

By the **Supreme Jade Decree of the Primordial Origin**, a **Universal Proclamation to the Three Realms and Ten Directions** is issued to all **Sovereigns of the Boundless Divine Realm, the Ministry of the Waters, and the Northern Capital of Luo[h]en**, the **Three Officials and Nine Offices**, and the **Twelve River Sources**:

**To absolve the departed [Name of the Deceased] of their karmic burdens spanning countless eons**, to **erase their boundless sins**, to **swiftly remove their names from the Black Registers**, to **extinguish their evil roots**, so that they may **not be detained or forced into the ranks of malevolent spirits**.

As commanded in the proclamation, **transmitted by wind and fire couriers**.

**Right Universal Proclamation to the Three Realms**
In accordance with the **Supreme Jade Decree of the Primordial Origin**, the **elevation and guidance** are hereby executed.

**Urgent as the Lingbao Great Dao’s Legal Decree.**

**Document Issued**
**Lingbao Great Dao Master’s Office** hereby **dispatches the Celestial Dao Functionary** (*神道功曹*):

On this, the **certain day and hour of the current month**, a **sealed decree** is issued—passing the **Celestial Gates**, with the **seal complete**, presented before the **Sovereigns of the Boundless Divine Realm of the Three Realms**, and transmitted by **exclusive emissary**.

**Right Decree to the Celestial Dao Functionary** (*神道功曹*): You are commanded to **deliver this decree** as written, to **clearly and promptly convey** its contents, and to **faithfully execute** the **commanded proclamation**, without delay. Thus, the decree is issued.

**Decree of the Earthly Spirits’ Seal**
**Celestial Gate-Passing Seal**
**Universal Proclamation to the Three Realms Seal**
**Soul-Liberation from the Cycle of Birth-and-Death Seal**

**Jade-Pure Crimson Script**, transmitted to the **Purple Court Above**, by **Heaven’s Benevolent Pardon**, to the **mysterious spirits of the Three Realms**:

Across the **Ten Directions of the World**, in the **Nine Abysses of Guilt**, to the **countless ancestral souls**, to the **suffering and wandering essences**:

**To erase the records of sin**, to **extinguish the roots of evil**, to **swiftly depart toward the realm of birth**, to **rest the vital essence in tranquility**.

**Ascend to the Celestial Hall**, to **purify the substance and refine the spirit**.

**With true heart illuminated**, to **dispel the obscurations of darkness**.

**Enter the Dao and attain Truehood**—
**As commanded in the proclamation.**

*To extract the suffering soul from the Rounded Gate.*

*After [name] receives and upholds [them],*
*to become a citizen of the Great Dao,*

*Now, facing the Yellow Altar’s transmission,*

*The Dao is hidden and nameless,*

*The *qi* is resonant with form,*

*it is bound by the karma of causes and effects.*

*Now, for the departed [name],*
*whose life has ended,*
*whose spirit disperses into the dark tribulations,*
*not without worldly transgressions,*
*and surely with accumulated sins of past lives.*
*Thus, the officials of the Luó and the Nine Abysses*
*hold authority to examine and punish.*
*Considering this suffering soul,*

*Today is a great auspicious day,*
*and all submit to absolution.*

*The soul departs the Court of Eternal Night,*
*The sin is extinguished from the suffering of evil roots,*
*and wearing the Seal to receive the Dao,*
*to continue life and transcend rebirth,*
*to penetrate and understand the Hope of the Void,*
*and to ascend the Marvelous Dao,*

*The Mysterious Master says:*
*Above the Nine Purity,*

*Since the opening of the Crimson Bright’s diagram,*
*The Original Beginning’s Heavenly Sage has spoken,*
*The scripture for saving suffering and extracting sins,*
*and with all the myriad saints formed a pact and sworn,*
*to vow in countless kalpas*
*to save and liberate suffering souls,*
*thus it is called the Alliance of the True.*

*The Alliance of the True has three grades.*
*The highest is the Upper Primordial’s Golden Edict,*
*The middle is the Middle Primordial’s Jade Edict,*
*The lowest is the Lower Primordial’s Yellow Edict.*
*In summary, the ritual implements are complete in the Lower Primordial.*

*Now, the Most High Alliance of the True’s Yellow Edict,*
*for the boundless liberation of the dark and bright,*
*—is fully prepared.*

*For the sake of the practitioners,*
*the rites are meticulously outlined,*
*and must not be carelessly revealed to unworthy individuals,*
*lest the Three Primordials be confused,*
*and sins be invoked without pardon.*

*If such individuals are encountered,*
*do not transmit the rites,*
*lest the Dao’s grace be obstructed,*
*and Heaven’s retribution swiftly arrive.*
*Heed this warning carefully.*

*The Nine Heavenly Edicts.*
*The Middle Primordial’s Golden Script, the Nine Heavenly Edicts.*

*The Supreme’s Edict,*
*proclaiming to the Three Officials,*
*the Heavenly Prisons,*
*the Earthly Underworld’s chief deities,*
*and the Great God’s liberating decree,*
*for the departed [name].*
*All receive the Edict,*
*and guard the form and spirit.*

*The Edict is received,*
*and ascends to the Heavenly Court.*
*Sins and grudges are harmonized,*
*and the soul merges with the Dao,*
*ascending to the Jade Gate,*
*undergoing refinement,*
*and enduring forever.*
*—As decreed in the proclamation,*
*transmitted by wind and fire messengers."*

Year　　Month　　Day　　Hour—*Proclamation Issued*

At the time of writing the Edict, face the northwest in a long kneel, burn incense, and invoke the Nine Celestial Sovereigns of the Nine Heavenly Dao. Dress as the Emperor in *guan* crown and vermilion clouds with emerald robes and flying feathers. After silently petitioning, chant the *Nine Celestial Birth-God Chapter* nine times. Take the *Nine Qi* radiance to blow upon the brush, inscribe the talisman, then chant once more. Blow the *Qi* onto the talisman as before, and together with the *Yuqing Decisive Formula*, recite before the Three Treasures, then deliver to the departed to be burned in the blue smoke.

The Edict text spans four lines, with the year and month on one line.
*The Edict is inscribed in vermilion on yellow paper, while the Proclamation may be written in ink on plain paper or silk/brocade—just as with worldly edicts and imperial decrees.*

After the *Degree of the Soul* is proclaimed at night, it is given to the departed spirit.

**Law-Alcohol Talisman**
*The Imperial Sage says:* After refining and purifying through water and fire, bestow the *Law-Alcohol* and refine it. When inscribing the *Law-Alcohol Talisman*, use yellow paper of seven *cun*, face southeast, and recite the *Three Heavenly Hidden Names*. Take its *Qi* to inscribe the talisman. Burn it to ash, mix with alcohol, and offer it to the departed soul to drink.

**Extracting the Southern Palace to Ascend the Heavenly Treasure Voucher**
Year　　Month　　Day—*Extracting and Degreeing [Name]*, refining and ascending to the Dao realm. Servant [Name] carries out the law.

*The Voucher is sealed with green paper at the corners, inscribed in red, three *cun* wide and seven *cun* long.*

**Seal Cover**
*Heavenly Treasure Voucher for Ascension*
*Delivered to the departed [Name] to wear and ascend to the Celestial Court.*
*Servant [Name] respectfully seals and proclaims.*

*By the Imperial Court’s swift decree, as the Supreme’s Sacred Legal Command.*

**Back Talisman**
*The Imperial Sage says:* This Treasure Voucher is the Emperor’s decree to extract and degree the departed soul of past lives—it must not be omitted. Store it in a crimson pouch and deliver it to the received soul to carry into the next life.

**Constructing the God-King’s Ascension Palanquin**
*The Imperial Sage says:* Use colorful silk to craft a purple carriage, with two God-Kings flanking the wheels and five horses pulling the palanquin. Place the departed within, awaiting the time of the *Degree Bridge* to burn it. Do not send with the departed’s banner.

*At the time of refining, summon the white banner, burn it in the water pool, then replace it with a red banner for the fire pool. After refining, burn the red banner and replace it with a yellow banner to follow the carriage, with a child guiding the soul through the Heavenly Gate.*

**Incantation for Burning the Carriage**
*Pinching the Supreme’s Formula:*
*Heavenly Lord’s mighty spirit-force,*
*Extracting and saving all souls.*
*Auspicious smoke fills the dead’s gate,*
*Joyous clouds open the birth door.*
*Return the Heavenly *Qi* to command,*
*To govern the Nine Heavenly souls.*
*Merging utterly with the Primordial One,*
*All become natural beings.*
*Riding the purple cloud-carriage,*
*Ascending to pay homage to the Mudan Lord.*
*No obstruction in the Three Realms,*
*Forever freed from the Wheel of Rebirth.*

**Incantation for Burning Paper**
*Fire-bell blazes, transforming the eight directions.*
*Ten thousand spirits guard in attendance,*
*Forever banishing ill fortune.*
*Swift as fire-bell’s celestial decree.*

After chanting, visualize the Heavenly Lord bestowing a precious pearl, its radiance spanning ten thousand *zhang*, guiding the ascent to the Heavenly Realm.

*The Mystic Sage says:* The above talismans and vouchers are first called *Rescue and Degree*, the second proclamation *Superior Degree*, and the third *Ascension Degree*. If it is a universal degree, it is also called *Extracting Degree*.

**Green Emperor Soul-Guard Talisman**
*Green Emperor Talisman Song:*
*Eastward gazing, bowing twice with hands raised,*
*Turquoise Emperor, Jade Sovereign Lord.*
*Divine wind stirs the celestial lock,*
*Nurturing all things, spreading primal spring.*
*Cloud-dragon harnessed in solemn drive,*
*Jade guards encircle the jade wheels.*
*Blessings permeate, benefiting all,*
*Great virtue knows no exclusion.*
*Ten thousand immortals sing of the Dao,*
*Intricate admonitions for heaven and man.*
*If the heart’s root is lost in delusion,*
*Bow and kneel, don the Great Benevolence.*

*The talisman guards the three souls of those who attain the Dao, making them luminous and clear. Write it in blue on white silk and wear it on the day of the Spring Equinox, swallowing three copies inscribed on bamboo slips.*

**Black Emperor Blood-Harmonizing Talisman**
*Black Emperor Talisman Song:*
*Formless yet encompassing all things,*
*Deep as the Supreme’s heart.*
*The Dao unfolds without opening,*
*Mysteries hidden in transformation’s machine.*
*Fear that leakage may persist,*
*Dark thoughts seeping unchecked.*
*Endless wheeling through suffering’s waves,*
*Lost in the path’s deceptive maze.*
*Though bound by a thousand years’ discipline,*
*In an instant, all is submerged.*
*No plunge into ghostly realms,*
*Calamity’s blame cannot be borne.*

*The talisman nurtures those who attain the Dao, ensuring their blood and vessels flow freely, their bodies radiant and unobstructed. The Black Emperor is the Water Emperor of the Great Void—water in the body is blood. Write it in black on blue silk and receive it on the Winter Solstice. If swallowed, inscribe one copy on a bamboo slip.*

五篇玉章
*The Five Scrolls of Jade Chapters*

皇人曰：五篇者，乃元始天尊自然飞英，至精虚无混沌之炁，凝结而成玉章。
*The Celestial Sage says:*
*The Five Scrolls are the natural emanations of the Primordial Sovereign,*
*Congealed from the utmost refined, empty, and chaotic Qi,*
*Forming into the Jade Chapters.*

镇於大罗之上，昔上皇时星辰交错，恶曜加临。
*They are stationed above the Great Netherworld,*
*In ancient times when the Celestial Sovereign’s era saw constellations disordered,*
*And malevolent influences oppressed.*

上犯三天，曾命真梵真人赍持五篇，付於五帝，镇於天元，以制其天政。
*When the transgressions reached the Three Heavens,*
*The Celestial Sage was commissioned to bear the Five Scrolls,*
*Passing them to the Five Emperors,*
*Stationing them at the Heavenly Primordium,*
*To regulate their celestial governance.*

又命真如真人赍持五篇，付於五岳，以镇於地纪，以御其地祇。
*Again, the Celestial Sage of True Thusness was commissioned to bear the Five Scrolls,*
*Passing them to the Five Sacred Mountains,*
*Stationing them at the Earthly Primordium,*
*To command their terrestrial spirits.*

又命妙行真人赍持五篇，付於名山主者，以侯成道之士，敷扬教法，下度生死。
*Again, the Celestial Sage of Wondrous Practice was commissioned to bear the Five Scrolls,*
*Passing them to the masters of the Named Mountains,*
*To await those who attain the Dao,*
*To propagate the teachings,*
*And to guide beings through life and death.*

盖五篇之炁其功甚博，上可以消於天灾。
*The Qi of the Five Scrolls is vast in power,*
*Above, it can dispel celestial calamities.*

中可以保镇国祚，下可以度於人民。
*In the middle, it can safeguard the nation’s fate,*
*Below, it can guide the people.*

如召三界五帝，建诸坛陛，当以土旺之日，
*If invoking the Three Realms and Five Emperors,*
*And establishing the various altars,*
*Do so on the day of Earth’s predominance.*

青素朱书五篇，敷落五方，
*With blue silk and cinnabar ink,*
*Inscribe the Five Scrolls,*
*And scatter them in the Five Directions.*

则万灵振伏，招集群仙，召之即至，靡有不从。
*Then all spirits will tremble and submit,*
*Summoning clusters of immortals,*
*Who come immediately—*
*None refuse the call.*

如书时当於浄室，面东方，再拜长跪，
*When inscribing, be in a pure chamber,*
*Facing east,*
*With two bows and a long kneel.*

存身为元始天尊，万神侍卫，身有光明。
*Conceive yourself as the Primordial Sovereign,*
*With myriad deities as attendants,*
*Your body radiant with light.*

乃取五方五色之炁，手握玉清诀，
*Then gather the Five Directions’ Five Colors of Qi,*
*Your hands grasping the Jade Purity Mantra.*

鼻引九天炁，入口九咽，
*Draw through your nose the Qi of the Nine Heavens,*
*And swallow it nine times.*

存运丹田之炁，上冲泥丸，
*Concentrate the circulating Qi of the Elixir Field,*
*And surge it upward to the Mud Pellet.*

周流一身，遍於百窍，
*Let it circulate through your body,*
*Permeating all hundred orifices.*

放大光明，照见诸天诸地，日月星宿。
*Emit vast radiance,*
*Illuminating all Heavens and Earths,*
*The Sun, Moon, and constellations.*

然后默诵密咒十二遍，
*Then silently recite the secret incantation twelve times.*

取炁吹笔，起身再拜，执笔，
*Collect the Qi and blow it into the brush,*
*Rise, bow twice, and take up the brush.*

叩齿三十二通，随散形咒而书之。
*Knock your teeth thirty-two times,*
*And inscribe according to the incantation of the scattered form.*

书符毕，上以星斗盖形，
*After completing the talisman,*
*Cover its form with the Starry Dipper.*

存诸天星宿日月光明，与元始五篇之炁，相接交映，内外藏之。
*Conceive the radiance of all celestial stars, hosts, sun, and moon,*
*And let it intermingle with the Qi of the Primordial Five Scrolls,*
*Illuminating within and without,*
*And seal it away.*

如用当朝天门再拜，焚香，
*When using, face the Heavenly Gate,*
*And bow twice,*
*Burning incense.*

具白事因，奏於元始前，
*State the matter clearly,*
*And present it before the Primordial Sovereign.*

再拜长跪而取之，
*Bow twice and kneel long,*
*Then take it.*

可以禳度厄运。
*It can avert misfortune and guide through calamity.*

及五炼生尸之法，焚而用之。
*And for the Five Refining methods for reviving the dead,*
*Burn and apply them.*

如生人受炼，则佩负在身度世，
*If a living person is refined,*
*Then wear the talisman,*
*And traverse the world,*
*Forever free from sickness and misfortune.*

永无疾厄。
*Never again to suffer illness or calamity.*

身过之后，地司奉迎，不经地狱，
*After death,*
*The earthly officials will escort them,*
*They will not pass through the Underworld.*

即得返形，游行太空。
*They will immediately regain their form,*
*And wander through the Great Void.*

如幽魂受炼，得遇玉文，
*If a wandering soul is refined,*
*And encounters the Jade Texts,*

Those who practice the **Lingbao** Great Dao/Way,
dwelling in the refined essence of those who receive alchemical transformation,
how could they fail to encounter this scripture,
wearing and carrying it upon their person,
or enshrining it within their secluded chamber?
Then ten thousand demons dare not approach,
and malevolent spirits dare not cross its boundary.
Naturally, they earn the reverence of the Ten Thousand Celestial,
with divine luminaries guarding the gate,
illuminating within and without—
no calamity shall touch them.
Truly, they safeguard against cosmic upheaval,
ensuring eternal existence beneath Heaven.

The five secret incantations of the scripture are:

*"Mixed Sovereign of the Imperium,*
*Eightfold Circumference, Ninefold Birth.*

*Jade Dawn, Golden Splendor,*
*True Texts Unfurled.*

*Winged Gale, Jade Wheel,*
*Great Primordial Essence Refining.*

*Lingbao Celestial Root,*
*Six Directions, Cavernous Spirit.*

*Jade Texts of Nature,*
*Woven into True Script."*

Now I inscribe the seals—
the **Primordial Sovereign’s qi** is divided.
Ten thousand spirits converge their qi,
all assembling at the Imperial Court.

**The Diagram of the Primordial Green Transformation**
*The Heavenly True Man, with a purple brush,*
*Records the qi of the **Lingbao**,*
*Interweaving the qi of **Primordial Green**—*
*The Symbol of Transformation.*
*Mastering the Dao of life for all beings—*
*Human, Heaven, Earth, and Ghosts—*
*It stores and nurtures vital qi,*
*Embraces the soul, refines the spirit,*
*Thus attaining True Reality.*

*Its omens may be possessed,*
*Inscribed in green upon bamboo or silk,*
*Worn facing northwest,*
*Preserving life, extending years,*
*Qi and spirit undispersed,*
*Securing the Dao of life.*

*Worn, the spirit-qi returns to the body,*
*Reversing age, restoring youth.*
*When the cosmic cycle fades,*
*The body traverses the Great Yin,*
*Wearing the Diagram of Primordial Green Transformation,*
*The Primordial Green Emperor joins with the omen,*
*Adrift in the boundless void.*

*For refining and liberating the departed spirit,*
*Its wisdom lies in the omen’s application.*

*This Diagram governs the spleen and stomach,*

**Ritual for Fasting and Receiving Offerings, Inviting the Teacher.**

**Ritual Precepts:**

To open the path for salvation of both mortals and deities,
To rescue and protect all beings,
To uphold and establish the rites of fasting—
Without the Teacher, this cannot be accomplished.
One must be fully prepared:
Receiving talismans and seals,
Mastering the rituals and procedures,
Knowing the etiquette of bowing and rising,
Understanding the rules of advancing and retreating,
Focusing the spirit and contemplating the True One,
Opening and closing the gates of invocation,
Repelling evil without error,
Conducting the rites in proper order,
Allying with Heaven as a disciple,
Embodying the Dao without limit,
Widely opening doors and windows,
Universally rescuing the submerged and lost—
The Teacher’s virtue and merit are unmatched.

If a **Dharma Master** wears the **Three Caverns**,
Or an **Official** practices the **Mystic Cavern**,
They may be appointed accordingly.
Where positions are vacant,
A **Mystic Cavern** adept may serve as **Dharma Master**,
And a **Zhongxu Zhengyi** initiate as **Official**.

The fasting rites originate from the **Lingbao**, belonging to the **Mystic Cavern**,
And their principles align with its teachings.
Other **Ten Precepts White Scroll Daoists** must not be arbitrarily assigned ritual roles,
Nor falsely claim titles.

For those wishing to perform fasting rites to offer sacrifices,
To save the living and rescue the dead—
At the outset of preparations,
One must first seek a virtuous and diligent adept,
Either dwelling in a **Qingcheng** hall
Or secluded in mountains and forests,
Whose Daoist standing is exalted,
Whose reputation in the Mystic Gate is revered,
Whose appointment is unanimously agreed upon,
And whose divination yields favorable omens.

Afterward, purify body and mind through fasting,
Select an auspicious day,
Recite the **Heart-Sincerity Pledge** and submit to the Dao,
And present the fasting offering in devotion.

If the initial petition fails to meet the sincere invocation,
One must renew the plea with utmost sincerity,
With resolve unshaken,
And rites limited to three attempts.
Only upon receiving approval
Should the construction proceed.

For the vast Heaven and Earth,
The hidden realms and netherworlds,
The boundless lands of the Ten Directions,
The immeasurable Three Realms—
Without a **Master of High Merit** whose virtue and deeds are profound,
Whose conduct is pure and clear,
How could the hidden and manifest be fully communicated,
How could mortals and deities be harmonized without division?

Thus, those who delve deeply into the **Highest Learning**,
Who master the **Mystic Profound**,
Serving as the bridge of life and death,
As the eyes of mortals and deities—
Only they may be called **Masters of High Merit**.

But if they are merely superficial practitioners,
Lowly scholars who seek only profit,
Blindly performing rites with muddled intent,
Wasting spiritual energy and treasures—
Few escape the censure of the **Three Officials**,
How much less can they hope for divine response?
