The **Three Pure Ones**—the Jade Emperor of the **Sanqing**—commanded, and the talisman arrived for execution. The transmission of the **Dao** was conferred upon the **Way**-possessing official of the **Sanqing**, surnamed [blank]. In the year of the **Taisui** [blank], month [blank], day [blank], hour [blank], the proclamation was issued below.

The **battle talisman** was delivered to the **transmission tablet** of the **Lingbao Dao**, and the **Way**-transmitting elder [blank] solemnly proceeded to the altar beneath, receiving the **Supreme Pure Lingbao Dao**, its scriptures, secret precepts, talismans, seals, and inscriptions as a single lineage. With oaths and aspirations, he upheld the **Dao** without ceasing.

Having already petitioned the **Heavenly Court** for approval, he was permitted to transmit the **Way**. In accordance with the sacred decree, he presented the **holy division talisman of the Sanqing**, swore the **battle oath**, received the **sacred scriptures**, delivered the **Way-transmitting tablet**, and issued the **battle talisman** to the disciple [blank] for verification.

One **Supreme Pure Lingbao Dao** scripture, talisman, and jade seal decree is hereby conferred. One **Lingbao Dao** seal, **Dao Lord** seal, **Heavenly Treasure Lord** seal, **Refinement and Transmission** seal, **Yellow Talisman Office** seal, **Green Mysterious Salvation of Suffering** seal, **Eight-Power Dragon Script** seal, **Crimson Book Jade Character** seal, **Great Mysterious Capital Province** seal, **Divine Tiger’s Sacred Taboo** seal, **Northern Arcub** seal, **Divine Tiger’s Yin-Yang** seal, and the **Superintendent of All Spirits** seal, along with the **Seal of Unity with the Dao**, the **Five Emperors’ Great Magic** seal, the **Severe Oath of the Northern Du** seal, and the **Mixed Seal of the Hundred Deities**, are all hereby bestowed.

One **battle oath tablet**, one **Dao decree**, one **tablet of edicts**, one **battle talisman**, one **holy division talisman**, and one **battle staff for breaking prisons** are delivered. A **ten-direction memorial** is also presented.

One **Supreme Pure Lingbao**—the **Middle Heaven’s True Emperor**, the **Divine King of the True Lord**, the **General Officer**, the **Spirit Soldiers**, the **Boy Attendants**, the **Jade Maidens**, and the **Functionary Talismans**—along with the **Spirit Soldiers and Horse Cavalry**, totaling **hundreds of billions of spirits**, are hereby recorded. The tablet is prepared as before and delivered to the disciple [blank].

He shall inherit the **Dao’s duties**, reverently uphold the **sacred scriptures**, strictly observe the **precepts and rules**, diligently accumulate **meritorious deeds**, and advance through the **rankings of the Daoist stages**. Should he violate the oath and bring misfortune upon himself, let there be no blame upon the **teacher and lineage**. This is the solemn **battle talisman**.

In the year of the **Taisui** [blank], month [blank], day [blank], and hour [blank], the **talisman** was issued. The **Feizhen** **Chao** **Yuan** **memorial** is hereby submitted.

The **Supreme Daoist of the Cavernous Mystery, the Third Sage Disciple**, and the **Certain Imperial Master of the Certain Prison**, who reverently practices the **Sacred Treasure Dao**, the **Chief Official of the Refined Palace in Nanchang** and **Attendant of the Five Emperors**, respectfully submits this memorial:

**The Five Emperors’ Prison-Breaking Talisman and Battle Scepter**—
The **Golden Review** manifests its form, the **True Qi** circulates as it should, the **Wisdom Light** shines resplendent, and the **Golden Tiger** breaks the prison with its name.

**The Sacred Treasure Circular Talisman**—
The **Imperial Sage** decrees: *"The tablet shall be made of magnolia wood, twelve inches long. Let white powder be its foundation, with green ink marking the four directions, and the ranks and titles inscribed in black at its center."*

For the **Prison-Breaking Tablet and Battle Scepter**, use magnolia wood, twelve inches long, nine inches high. Let blue be its foundation, with red ink for the characters and yellow ink for the talisman. The **scepter** shall be made of yang wood, thirty-six inches long, with a circumference of five inches and four *fen*, its four faces engraved with incantations, wrapped in a yellow silk pouch.

On the day of **transmission of the Dao**, arrange them before the **Highest True Sage**. After the ordination is complete, the disciple shall collect them and place them before the **Sacred Sage**, offering daily reverence.

When used, bow twice and request the **Circular Talisman**—craft it with two *liang* and two *qian* of silver, its center engraved with the talisman, in red ink.

**The Supplementary Officer-Soldier Tablets**—
The **Sacred Treasure Dao’s Attendants**.

The **Supplementary Officer-Soldier Tablets**—
*"The Sacred Treasure Dao’s Attendants"*—

*"The Tablet for Newly Appointed Auxiliary Officers and Soldiers*
To those newly commissioned to assist the **Dao’s Generals, Officers, Soldiers, and Hosts**,
I, [name] of the **Ordaining Master**, formerly submitted a petition to the **Degree Master** [Certain Master], seeking protection and recommendation for transmission of the **Highest Clarity Sacred Treasure Dao**, including its talismans, diagrams, seals, and incantations—all under the **Sacred Scriptures**.

The **Degree Master** has now, on the [date], recommended me to the **Heavenly Court**, and I have been granted the **Celestial Office**. Today, I arrive to assist the **Generals, Officers, Soldiers, and Cavalry**, and must be registered and stationed under the **Sacred Treasury**. Should any matter require this tablet,

**By this decree,**
The newly appointed auxiliary **Generals, Officers, Soldiers, and Hosts** must comply with these orders:
- Issue commands clearly,
- Maintain strict discipline in the encampment,
- Repair and ready the implements,
- Invoke the incantations as needed,
- Assist in rectification and achieve merit.

Should future merits be established, they shall be duly recommended—without exception.

**Breaking the Seal Formula**
*Completes Volume 71 of the Sacred Treasure Infinite Salvation Scripture*
*Completes Volume 72 of the Sacred Treasure Infinite Salvation Scripture*

**Ritual for Observing the Fast and Receiving the Precepts**
**Formula for Transmission and Ordination"**

**Translation:**

---

**Prayer for Transmission and Ordination**

*On the day of the month’s beginning in the year of the Great Age,*
The humble **Certain Person of [Place] lineage**, having purified with fasting and ablutions,
With utmost reverence and fear,
Prostrates twice and humbly submits this petition.

*This petitioner, having heard of the Profound Mystery’s teachings,*
Which open the **Dao/Way** of delivering the living and saving the dead,
*And the Sacred Treasury’s revealed texts,*
Which contain the wondrous **Logic/Principle** of shedding the mortal shell and ascending as a transcendent,
*Knows not to be a fortunate one born with such blessings,*
Nor one who casually stumbles upon such truths.
*To attain the ranks of the True Ones,*
One must rely upon a **Master/Teacher**.

*This petitioner seeks to:*
First, alleviate the sufferings of those who have passed,
Then, rescue the wronged souls trapped in the stagnant waters of existence,
So that even the lowest life may live without concern,
And all may preserve their bodies and escape calamity.
*Though I have once sworn,*
I have yet to meet a True Master.
*Now, I humbly encounter **Certain Master/Teacher**,*
Who does not conceal the **Mystic Passages**,
But opens wide the **Compassionate Dao/Way**,
And grants transmission to one such as I—
*Thus, I submit this earnest plea,*
And present gold and treasures to pledge my sincerity,
*Establishing a Sacred Altar*
And making my solemn appeal,
*To receive the Sacred Treasury’s Great Dao/Way’s secret teachings for refining and delivering souls,*
*And vow to uphold them from beginning to end,*
Never daring to forget the Master’s guidance.
*Should I ever breach this covenant,*
May I willingly sink into ruin.
*I pray for mercy,*
And hope the Master will grant me transmission,
So that my labors may bear fruit,
And I may join the ranks of the True Ones.

*Humbly, I submit this plea,*
And prostrate before the altar,
Awaiting the Master’s decree.
*This petitioner, with utmost reverence and fear,*
Prostrates twice and humbly submits this petition.

---

**Formula for Transmission and Ordination**

*The subject hears of the Primordial Ancestor of the Eons,*
Who transformed and gave birth to all the **Heavens**,
And concealed the **Song of the Azure Palace** within the void,
Yet spread the **Luster of the Purple Abyss** with vibrant splendor,
*Opening the three radiant lights,*
And nurturing all **Divine Beings/Spirits** with universal growth.
*By spreading the Five Scriptures,*
The **Heavens** are preserved within the cycles of the **Eons**.

*The Master sits upon the five-colored lion,*
And delivers the **Dao/Way** of salvation.
*Residing in the Seven Treasures’ cypress grove,*
He transmits the **Sutras** and entrusts them to the world.
*All the **Sages** bow in homage,*
And the **True Ones** attend in reverence to take refuge.
*These are the hidden melodies of the **Heavens**,*
Not the common songs of the mortal realm.
*The **Sacred Wind** carries the keys,*
And halts the sun and moon in their courses.
*The **Golden Mouth** expounds broadly,*
And stills the **Divine Wind** in its movements.
*With one recitation,*
All the **Heavens** acclaim its virtue.
*With ten repetitions,*
Even dried bones become living beings.
*Thus, it is known:*
The **Mystic Dao/Way** is unfathomable,
The **Profound Virtue/Power** is boundless—
*A treasure of the **Heavens** above,*
Not passed down to the world below.
*When encountered by a **Noble One**,*
With a **Red Heart** offering gold and treasures in pledge,
And receiving the **Heavens’** watchful transmission,
With all the **Sages** bowing in homage,
And the **Heavens** safeguarding the **True Doctrine’s** propagation,
While the **Demons’ King** upholds its **Dao/Way** as proof,
*Only then may one follow the **Profound Virtue/Power’s** essence,*
And be permitted to spread it further.

*Now, this successor-disciple of the **Dao/Way**,*
With accumulated blessings of past lives,
Encountering the **Sacred Wind**,
Pledges with heart and hands at the **Pure Court**,
And devotes **Sincere Intent** to the Great **Dao/Way**.
*Beating my head and cheeks,*
With prostrations and kneeling before the altar,
*I humbly follow the Formula of Transmission and Ordination,*
And abandon all attachments to worldly ties.
*Offering gold and treasures,*
And swearing with blood and elixir,
*I seek the Great **Dao/Way’s** support,*
And wish to join the ranks of the **Immortal Hosts**.

*The subject has early received the Master’s guidance,*
And been entrusted with the **Sacred Texts**,
*To originally refine and deliver beings,*
And meet **Noble Ones** without concealing the **Dao/Way**.
*Having accepted this earnest supplication,*
And reported it to the **Heavens** above,
*The subject has already received a blessed response,*
And now, on this auspicious day,
*Transmits the **Dao/Way’s** talisman and teachings,*
And receives the **Precepts** to command the **Hosts**.

*I pray that the Sacred Treasury’s **True Ones** and Profound Mystery’s **Heavenly Emperors***
May show compassion and deliver beings,
With **Convenient Means** and **Dao/Way** transmission,
*So that this disciple may:*
Surpass the dusty world,
Forever leave illusions,
Purify the **Six Senses** and attain **Calm Stillness**,
Escape the **Eight Difficulties**’ cycle of rebirth,
Awaken to the **Mystic Mechanisms**,
Walk the **Dao/Way’s** path of wonders,
Accumulate the **Three Thousand** merits of virtue,
And gather all **Immortal Hosts**.
*Subduing the **Five Emperors’** **Demon Kings**,
All **Spirits** tremble in awe.
*The subject, along with the successor-disciple,*
Humbly prostrates twice.

*Next, the disciple submits the petition and receives the **Sutra**.*

*According to the **Sutra**’s text:*
*Those who study and practice this **Sutra***
And penetrate its subtle mysteries,
Shall attain flight to the **Southern Palace**,
Avoid the **Hell Realms**,
And deliver all without limit—
*All **Heavenly Beings** and mortals rejoice in its blessings.*
*The boundless blessings of life and death,*
And the **Heavens’** grace—
*A treasure not passed down to the world below.*
*When a **Noble One** offers gold and treasures with sincerity,*
And pledges with the **Heavens** to transmit,
*Yet reveals the **Dao/Way** lightly or with arrogance,*
The curse extends to the **Nine Ancestors**,
And eternal servitude in the **Ghostly Offices**.
*With the **Five Emperors** and the **Sutras**,*
Twenty-four **Jade Boys** and **Jade Girls** attend,
Guarding the **Sacred Texts**,
And protecting those who receive the **Sutra**.
*After the invocation is complete,*
The disciple kneels to receive.
*Next, the **Dao/Way** is transmitted.*

The Sovereign hears that the Dao/Way functions naturally, its efficacy unchecked, its essence most wondrous, its transformations boundless in the formless.

With reverence, I behold the **Lingbao** Great Law, its golden script most profound.
It is the **Primordial Origin’s** mysterious subtlety, the **Most Refined’s** tranquil void.
Its depths are unfathomable, its mysteries inexhaustible—
Sealing the **Great Luo’s** golden celestial gates,
Descending the **Floating Azure’s** pearl-like edicts,
Where all heavens bow in awe, and ten thousand sages guard it.
Only those with inherent virtue may glimpse its profundity.

All know that the Dao/Way is proclaimed by humans, yet humans are established by the Dao/Way.
Now, this disciple, [name], with sincere devotion, prostrates and vows to receive the sacred keys.
First, I reveal the ten directions, pledge in the three realms,
Wishing to exhaust ultimate truth, embody the Dao/Way, and deliver others.
With reverence before the sacred presence, I receive and uphold the Great Law.
I humbly pray that the **Golden Gate’s** Most True One,
The **Jade Capital’s** Mysterious Elder,
May open the nine nights of auspice, pierce the eight dark abysses,
Dispatch the **Jade Girls** with flying scrolls,
Present the golden tablets for wide proclamation,
Command the **Golden Boys** to extol virtue,
Unfold the **Jade Registers** for transmission.

Thus may this disciple’s spirit and essence be purified, eternal qi preserved,
Free from suffering, radiant in body,
Guarded by the three realms, welcomed by the Five Emperors,
Honored by ten thousand spirits, named in heaven’s records,
Merits fulfilled, virtue complete—ascending to **Upper Clarity**.

After the invocation, the disciple bows to the ten directions, then thanks the teacher.
Next, the teacher holds the **elixir water** and sprinkles the disciple’s body:
The first sprinkle—**Three Pure Ones**’ supreme deliverance.
The second—**Ten Directions’** ultimate truth’s deliverance.
The third—**Three Realms’** myriad sages’ deliverance.

Next, the teacher holds the **ring token** and recites the incantation:
*"Heaven and Earth unite in trust, the ring token as oath.
Practice loyalty and filial piety, the heart pure and even.
With compassion and reverence, words straight and chaste.
Consistent to the end, the Dao/Way aligns with the divine.
Avoid flattery, lest greed and wrath arise.
Harm the body, corrupt virtue—the three realms will not obey.
Now divided is the ring token; its meaning is unbreakable as gold."*

Next, the ring token is given to the disciple, along with the **scrolls, talismans, seals, and certificates**.

The **Lingbao** scriptures are revered by ten thousand heavens.
Today’s reception of the transmission is followed by the three realms.
All heavenly records name you among the **Immortal Lords**.
The **Emperor of Saints** proclaims to the **Primordial Expanse**:
*"Measure all beings, let our Dao flourish."*

After the invocation, the disciple bows twice and retires.

---
**Transmission of Gratitude and Vows**

Before the cosmos was distinct, the void congealed into brilliance.
Auspicious clouds gathered in the heavens, forming the **Flying Mysteries** at the celestial pole.
Sacred winds played their melodies, **dharma-qi** radiant.
Thus the pattern was inscribed, hidden through countless kalpas.
From the **Primordial Origin’s** descent, each leaf was passed down.
Until the **Orthodox Unity’s** propagation, the lineage remained unbroken.
Now, to establish vows at the **Sacred Altar**,
And universally benefit the mortal world.

Severing malevolent roots, dispelling calamitous fate,
Convenient for aiding beings, without regard to direction.
From coarse to subtle, its depths are unfathomable.

I, unworthy, inherited past blessings, born among mortals,
Living in the age of prosperity, meeting the **Mysterious Subtle** at its zenith.
With a purified heart, I uphold the precepts, prostrate in sincerity.
I wish to unfold the **Treasure’s** teachings,
And advance to the **Immortal’s** ranks.
To govern my body and harmonize the world, I follow the received transmission.
To rescue the sick and aid the perilous, I dare not forget the sacred pledge.
Should I violate the **Mysterious Prohibitions**, I willingly await the **Nether Judgments**.

---
**Sacrificial Rites**

With reverence, I acknowledge that the **Hundred Demons** conceal their rhythms,
Their separations and unions governed by nature.
As the three luminaries shine, the **Great Procession’s** dharma-qi unfolds,
The **Supreme Great Luo’s** realm—
The **Primordial Origin’s** sovereign abides.
To transmit the Law and deliver beings, there is the subtle art of **returning form**.
To propagate the scriptures and benefit the world, there is the true function of **reviving the dead**.

Those who uphold the scriptures are guarded by the eight-directional mighty spirits.
Those who uphold the Law are protected by the heavenly sages above.
The **Five Emperors** and **Great Demons** are entrusted with it,
The **Ten Directions’** flying immortals bear it.

Now that the supreme teaching has been transmitted and pledged,
The **Demons’ King** acknowledges its efficacy.
Following the **Heavens’** prohibitions, I reveal the sacrificial rites at the **Sacred Altar**,
Summoning the ten directions, commanding the earthly spirits with the **Essential Decisions**.
Wielding heavenly authority, subduing demons and ghosts with the **True Scripts**.
When this scripture is recited, all heavens gather.
When its practice is subtle, ten thousand sages attend.
Those who assist the Law enter **Non-Existence into Existence** upon hearing the incantations.
Those who aid the Dao/Way, upon receiving the **Symbols and Commands**, depart death and enter life.

The **Eight威威** dragon scripts can safeguard against calamitous fate.
The **Red Scripts with Jade Characters** can avert disasters.
Mingling with the hundred spirits, the **Three Realms’** demon kings prostrate.
Harmonizing the five **qi**, the ten thousand true sovereigns submit.

Now, according to the ritual vows, I humbly present these offerings.
I pray that the **Lingbao** officials and **Law Officers**,
Receiving the solemn sacrificial offerings,
Enjoying the concentrated rites,
May exalt the teachings, assist the Dao’s functions,
Subdue below to protect the mortal form,
So that demons have no power to interfere.
Wielding the **Symbols**, grasping the **Talismans**,
Suppressing ghosts so they dare not act malevolently.
The divine overseers are present.
The sacrificial rites are now complete.

---
**First Offering**

With reverence, I acknowledge that the **Lingbao** original scripture
Is the boundless means of delivering beings.
The highest and most wondrous—
The root and source of the Great Law.
Sometimes transmitted in the human realm,
Sometimes hidden in the heavens.
Those who revere and uphold it receive blessings;
Those who reveal it lightly or with arrogance invite calamities.

I, [name], with past merit, now reverently participate in the Great Law.
Having received the transmission from the teacher,
I must perform the sacrificial rites to present the offerings.
I pray that the officials’ wisdom may discern these humble rites,
And that their august presence may, though distant, aid the **Mysterious Altar’s** rectitude.
The **Spiritual Constructs** are gracious, assisting the **Primordial Merit** in the **Lesser Manifestation**.

Though I am but a novice of low rank,
I have encountered the true teacher.
Though I rely on the Great Law to subdue demons,
I fully depend on the mighty spirits’ assistance—
Severing a thousand thousand heads of calamity,
Subduing ten thousand ten thousand forms of monsters.
Wielding the **Golden Axe’s** fierce slaughter,
Beheading the **Ghostly Heroes**.
Displaying the **Great Heavenly Empress’s** punishing might,
So that winds and fire do not cease.

The **First Offering**—
Some cross the **Underworld’s** depths, resolving ancient karmic debts.
Some are cured of chronic ills, regaining form in this very moment.
**Virtue** shines, and all share its glory;
**Merit** is complete, and all partake in its rewards—
Let none grow slack, lest prior efforts be undone.

Hear my words with reverence, and do not neglect them.

**The Second Offering**—
I humbly submit: organize the ranks, maintaining strict discipline in the encampment.
Array the banners and flags, and ensure the weapons are in order.
Proclaim the commands clearly, inspecting the **Ghostly Legions**.
Reward and punishment must be impartial, benefiting the **Five Sovereigns**.

When **ghostly monsters** are vanquished and plagues dare not spread,
The **Divine Ones** guard the gates, and all strange portents retreat to distant realms.
If the **Omen** follows its **Way**, then all are equal and upright.
If you assist the **Dao**, then you will be disciplined yet bold and loyal.

Together, accomplish the greatest of deeds,
To aid the **Uncarved Block’s** transformation.

Now, having presented our sincere prayers and offerings—
Libations poured thrice, unbroken in sincerity—
We rely entirely on the **Divine Ones’** discernment.
The **money and horses** offered shall be recorded as pledged;
Once the rites conclude, we pray for their return to their proper order.

**The Final Offering**—
Proclaim the **Divine Edict** and the **Sacred Decree**.

「With profound reverence, I retreat and bow twice.

Now, the **Sacred Talisman** shall be inscribed—
**Book of Talismans** and **Sacred Edict** proclaimed:
*"Om! Ye Zha Tu Ju He Le Zhan Ju Po Yi Zhi Di Sa Zha!"*

Pinching the middle finger, ten **Dao/Way** are written,
Distributed across the ten directions,
Each bound with yellow parchment and red paper,
And dissolved with a single gold coin per talisman.

**Dissolution Incantation** proclaimed:
*"Ten thousand harmonies merge, a hundred thousand coalesce,
Fusing all spirits divine.
The **Divine Sovereign** accepts the mandate,
Overseeing all celestial beings.
Demons kneel in submission, all spirits cowed—
Guard the truth and uphold life,
To deliver countless souls.
In death or life, their reliance is fixed;
Their blessings boundless.
No merit or fault unrecorded—
Preserve and elevate your essence.
Swiftly, as the **Lingbao Precepts** decree."*

**The Lingbao Supreme Method**—
*Only with the Heavenly Jade-Sealed Imperial Edict,
Can one penetrate the profound and obscure.
If mere mortal script is employed,
No more than what the True Master transmits,
Then labor is in vain, and no gain shall follow.
Moreover, the Lingbao Jade Seal—
In ancient times, the **Primordial Sovereign of the Dao** (元始天王) refined his **marvelous qi** (妙炁) into true seals,
All carved from **jade of emerald hue** (碧玉).
Named the **Golden Chapter, Jade-Sealed Edict** (金章玉重),
Descended upon the **Heaven of True Spirits** (真灵之天),
And entrusted to the **Dao Sovereign** (道君).
Later bestowed upon the **Celestial Sovereign of the Void** (虚皇天尊),
The **Celestial Sovereign of the Void** passed it to the **Imperial Sovereign of the Golden Gate** (金阙帝君),
The **Imperial Sovereign of the Golden Gate** conferred it upon the **Great Emperor of Heaven** (天皇大帝),
And the **Great Emperor of Heaven** first bestowed it upon **Xuanyuan** (轩辕).
Xuanyuan thereafter encountered the **Great Master of Mystic Dao** (玄中大法师) and the **Celestial Sovereign of Serenity** (静老天尊),
Each expounding their own scriptures, each with distinct classifications.
Xuanyuan earnestly sought their teachings,
Thus the Mystic Master instructed him in **method** (法) and **ritual procedure** (式).
Hence, the **Lingbao Supreme Method** is under the Mystic Master’s authority.
Since then, generation after generation has established rites,
Each **region** (方方) transmitting scriptures,
Yet without meeting the true adept,
The seals were often concealed in **Bright Mountains** (明山) and never revealed.
Later, when **Immortal Adepts** (神仙) emerged,
Encountering this sacred text,
The **Celestial Sovereigns** (天尊) in compassion,
Entrusted them with the seals,
Thus transmitting them to future ages.
Those who study it earnestly, as if meeting the adept,
Shall guard and cherish it,
Never lightly passing it to others,
Lest its power be squandered.
The **Highest True Ones** (高真) of the **Three Realms** (三界) who behold it,
Often mourn in sorrow, unwilling for its revelation.
To reveal it invites retribution and calamity—
Deeply lamentable.
Now inscribed in this scroll,
See it, revere it, and keep it secret—
This suffices.*

**Lingbao Supreme Method Seal of Jade Authority** (上清灵宝大法司玉玺):
*The right seal may be transferred to talismans and edicts,
Displayed throughout the Three Realms,
Ghosts and spirits recognizing it as an authentic talisman.
If transmitted and registered after rites of deliverance,
The incantations may be invoked.*

**Seal of the Bureau of Refining and Delivering** (炼度司印):
*The right seal is bestowed by the **Supreme Deity** (上帝) upon the **True Sovereign of Nanchang** (南昌受炼司真君),
Who oversees the refining of deceased souls.
It may refine and deliver departed spirits,
Exclusively sealing **Water-Fire Talismans** (水火符篆),
And matters pertaining to the Bureau of Refining and Delivering’s petitions and edicts.*

**Seal of the Yellow Talisman Academy** (黄箓院印):
*The right seal is bestowed by the **Supreme Deity** upon the **Yellow Talisman Academy’s Officer** (黄箓院使相),
Overseeing the **Lower Primordial** (下元),
And delivering spirits from the **Upper World** (上世).
When establishing a **Grand Ritual Hall** (大斋宝坛),
Summoning and binding **Celestial Generals, Marshals, and Soldiers** (君将史兵),
The talismans and edicts shall be sealed with this.*

**Seal of the Celestial Sovereign of Treasure** (天宝君印):
*The right seal is the **Primordial Sovereign’s** (元始上帝) teaching authority,
Capable of pacifying the **Heavens and Earth** (天地),
Directing the **yin and yang** (阴阳),
Influencing **transformation and creation** (造化),
And summoning all spirits.
When practicing the **Supreme Method** (大法),
This seal shall be placed at the **ritual site** (治所),
All **Sages** (万圣) revering it as if at court.
The **Primordial Sovereign’s** seal radiates with ten thousand **zhang** (丈),
Illuminating all demons,
And may also be used to seal talismans and edicts.
This seal was lost during the **First Emperor of Qin**’s (秦始皇) reign.
Later, in the **Han Dynasty**, the **Celestial Master** (天师) used mundane seals instead.*

**Seal of the Dao Sovereign’s Jade Authority** (道君玉印):
*The right seal is the **Dao Sovereign’s** (道君) teaching authority,
Controlling all **celestial stars and constellations** (星宿),
And the **fateful cycles** (劫运) of the Three Realms and ghosts.
When practicing, this seal shall be worn,
Transforming the adept into the **Celestial Sovereign of Lingbao** (灵宝天尊).
It may also be used to seal talismans and edicts.*

**Seal of the Jade Emperor’s Salvation of Suffering** (青玄救苦印):
*The right seal is bestowed by the **Supreme Deity** (上帝) upon the **Celestial Sovereign of the Eastern Extremity** (东极救苦天尊),
Delivering all suffering souls from the Three Realms and Ten Directions.
When invoked, it manifests the **Hundred Treasures of Radiant Clarity** (百宝光明).
The **Prison Officials** (应狱司) and all spirits recognize this seal’s light—
It dispels darkness and directly leads to **Extreme Bliss** (极乐).
It may be used to seal talismans and edicts.*

**Seal of the Grand Registry of Great Mysticism** (泰玄都省印):
*The right seal is bestowed by the **Jade Emperor** (玉帝) upon the **Celestial Master** (天师),
Overseeing petitions and registries of the **Grand Registry of Great Mysticism** (泰玄都省).
When summoning **Functionary Talismans** (功曹符吏),
Gathering all **celestial soldiers and steeds** (兵马),
And performing **ritual supplications to stars** (醮奏星辰),
This seal shall be used for official seals and edicts.
In the **Han Dynasty**, the **Celestial Master** used mundane seals instead,
His ancestral **secret seals** ascending with **Zhengyi’s** (正一) ascension to Heaven,
Now exclusively held by the **Grand Registry of Great Mysticism** (泰玄都).*

**Seal of the Eight-Threatened Dragon Script** (八威龙文印):
**Seal of the Crimson Script and Jade Characters** (赤书玉字印):
*The right seal is bestowed by the **Primordial Sovereign** (元始上帝),
Exclusively controlling the **true jade characters and seals** (玉字真文篆) of all Heavens.
When performing **ritual supplications** (醮奏) at the **ritual altar** (坛墠),
The **true characters** (真文) are revealed in **crimson script** (赤书),
And this seal shall be used for sealing.*

**Seal of the Union of Dao and Truth** (与道合真印):
*The right seal is bestowed by the **Supreme Deity** (上帝),
To be worn by those who attain the Dao,
Ascending to Heaven.
At the **Golden Gate beneath the Three Heavens** (三天金阙门下),
It serves as the **authentic verification seal** (印信).
When delivering spirits to the **Underworld** (地府),
Registering **merits and deeds** (功德案文牒),
Sealing **inner petitions** (内封) with matching **Union Talismans** (合同符契),
The **Underworld’s shadow spirits** (阴府冥灵) shall recognize it as **Supreme Deity’s personal decree** (上帝亲诏),
No one daring to delay or obstruct.*

**Seal of the Five Sovereigns’ Great Demon** (五帝大魔印):
*The right seal is granted by the **Supreme Deity** (上帝),
To be worn by those who practice the Dao.
It subdues all **demons** (万魔),
Pacifies **evil forces** (凶治恶).
With resolute intent, wearing this seal,
The **Five Sovereigns** shall stand guard,
All demons bound in form.*

**Seal of the Fusion of All Spirits** (混合百神印):
*The right seal is granted by the **Supreme Deity** (上帝),
To be worn by those who practice the Dao.
It commands all spirits.
Wherever this seal is placed,
All spirits shall pay homage,
The Three Realms standing guard.
For **summoning talismans, officials, and celestial marshals** (干召法中将吏符篆),
Sealing with this shall immediately evoke response.*

*All the aforementioned seals are crafted from **seven treasures of gold and jade** (七宝金玉),
Or with **dates’ pitted hearts** (赤枣心),
Or **peachwood from the sacred grove** (桃栢木),
Ordered by artisans under **solar fire** (阳火) on auspicious days,
And revealed to the **Heavenly Light** (露天) under **lunar water** (阴水) for one night before being collected.*

*The **Lingbao Infinite Method of Deliverance** (灵宝无量度人上经) concludes here, the seventy-second scroll.*
